dialogue_jp: さすがは　経験者

dialogue_en: It's all...so much...
dialogue_jp: わあ　きれ～！

dialogue_en: isn't it?
dialogue_jp: きれいだね

dialogue_en:
You surprised me at first.
You were just like him, and...
dialogue_jp: はじめはね　そっくりだったから気になった

dialogue_en: It wasn't your face or your clothes─it was you.
dialogue_jp: ぜんぜん別人なんだけど　そっくり

dialogue_en: The way you walked...the way you carried yourself...
dialogue_jp: 歩きかた　手の動かしかた

dialogue_en: Whenever I looked at you...I saw him.
dialogue_jp: あなたのなかに　彼を見ていた

dialogue_en: But you're not him.
dialogue_jp: でも　ちがうの

dialogue_en: And that's okay.
dialogue_jp: いまは　ちがう

dialogue_en: Because right now, I wanna be with you.
dialogue_jp: あなたに　会いたい

dialogue_en: And I'm trying so hard to find you.
dialogue_jp: あなたを　探しているの

dialogue_en: But I'm right here.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　ここにいる

dialogue_en: Yeah, you are, but...
dialogue_jp: うん　でもね……

dialogue_en: Hey, did Tifa talk to you? About...um...
dialogue_jp: なあ　ティファから聞いたか？

dialogue_en: Hey, um, Aerith?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　あのね――

dialogue_en: I talked to Cloud. He said he remembers Zack.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　ザックスのこと思い出したみたい

dialogue_en: How they were friends five years ago.
dialogue_jp: ５年前のザックス

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en:
I don't think so?
At least, not about anything important.
dialogue_jp:
なんだろう
とくべつなこと　話してないと思う

dialogue_en: Oh.
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Aerith?
dialogue_jp: エアリス？

dialogue_en: Just till the ride's over.
dialogue_jp: 下まででいいから

dialogue_en: Think we can steer with this?
dialogue_jp: これって　ハンドル？

dialogue_en: Worth a try.
dialogue_jp: まわせばわかる

dialogue_en: Here goes!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Wow...
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: どう？

dialogue_en: Nice save.
dialogue_jp: さすがだ

dialogue_en: Hey, over there. See that?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウド　見て！

dialogue_en: Being a jockey looks so fun.
dialogue_jp: 近くで見ると　すごいね

dialogue_en: That's definitely not what the races are like.
dialogue_jp: チョコボの上は　こんなものじゃない

dialogue_en: I guess I'll just have to see for myself.
dialogue_jp: 今度　私も出てみようかな

dialogue_en: It's beautiful.
dialogue_jp: きれい……

dialogue_en: So...have you talked to Aerith?
dialogue_jp: エアリスには　話したのか？

dialogue_en: Hey, um, Aerith?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　あのね――

dialogue_en: Not yet.
dialogue_jp: まだだよ

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Touchy subject, huh?
dialogue_jp: まだ好きなのかな

dialogue_en: She must still have feelings for Zack.
dialogue_jp: エアリスは　ザックスのこと

dialogue_en: I think it's a little more complicated than that.
dialogue_jp: そんなに　単純な話じゃないと思うな

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: It's kinda weird─us being here like this, isn't it?
dialogue_jp: クラウドとこんなふうにしてるなんて　不思議

dialogue_en: Is it? I mean... I guess it is. Kinda.
dialogue_jp: そうか？　いや……そうだな

dialogue_en:
Ever since we left Midgar on this crazy journey...
Ever since we were kids, even...
dialogue_jp:
子供の頃のことを考えても
この旅が始まってからのことを考えても

dialogue_en: I can't remember a time like this.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　不思議

dialogue_en: A time when we were this close.
dialogue_jp: こんなに　近くにいる

dialogue_en: Or am I getting ahead of myself again?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　また流されてる？

dialogue_en: "Again"?
dialogue_jp: また？

dialogue_en: Yeah... Again.
dialogue_jp: うん　また……

dialogue_en: Not one bit.
dialogue_jp: しっかり　つかまれ

dialogue_en: Okay... Uh-huh, uh-huh...
dialogue_jp: なるほど　ナルホド～

dialogue_en: Haha! That's so cool!
dialogue_jp: あははは　すごーい！

dialogue_en: Let's take a break.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　キューケイ……

dialogue_en: Great idea.
dialogue_jp: はしゃぎすぎだ

dialogue_en: Un-freakin'-believable!
dialogue_jp: すっごーーーい！

dialogue_en: So, I heard you and Tifa go way back.
dialogue_jp: ティファとは　幼なじみなんだよね

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
I also heard she used to have
a pretty big crush on you.
dialogue_jp: ティファの　初恋の相手なんだってね？

dialogue_en: ...That so?
dialogue_jp: さあ

dialogue_en:
Well, not at first. Apparently, even as a kid
you had that "weird loner" vibe.
dialogue_jp:
クラウドは変わり者で
どっちかというと　嫌なヤツだったけど

dialogue_en: But then, one day...bam! She caught the love bug.
dialogue_jp:
ある日　とつぜん
好きだって気づいたんだって！

dialogue_en: Were you into her?
dialogue_jp: クラウドは　どうなの？

dialogue_en: Don't remember.
dialogue_jp: 忘れた

dialogue_en: Really?
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Though I guess that makes sense. Tifa said she was so busy after the move to Midgar that she forgot all about you too.
dialogue_jp:
ティファも　ミッドガルに移ってからは
忙しくて忘れてたって言ってたけど

dialogue_en: Dunno what it is about you guys, but...I get it.
dialogue_jp: アタシの初恋の相手　ソルジャーなんだよね

dialogue_en:
I had a thing for a SOLDIER once.
Least I think he was a SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: 戦場で出会った　たぶんソルジャー

dialogue_en:
I wanted to prove myself,
so I hit him with my best moves.
dialogue_jp: その頃の　アタシの最高のワザを出したんだ

dialogue_en: Sih, sih, hah! Hmph.
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュシュって

dialogue_en: Was like I was firin' energy blasts!
dialogue_jp: こぶしから　波動が出てるつもりだった

dialogue_en:
After a few salvos, he shouted "Ya got me"─
and at the time, I totally bought it.
dialogue_jp:
だからアタシは　あいつが『やられた～』って
倒れたときも　本気にしちゃってさ

dialogue_en: Of course, he was just playing along for a dumb kid.
dialogue_jp: でもぜ～んぶ　文字どおりの子供ダマシ

dialogue_en:
And once I realized that, I was pissed.
I couldn't stop thinkin' about him.
dialogue_jp:
それに気がついてから
もう　あいつのことばかり考えちゃって

dialogue_en:
I swore to myself that one day I'd blast
that jerk for real! Did some hardcore training
so I could give him a beatdown.
dialogue_jp:
いつか　本物の波動をブチこんでやるって
ありえないくらい　修行がんばったんだよね

dialogue_en: But eventually, it dawned on me: he was just being nice. Like, he was a really nice guy!
dialogue_jp:
でもさ　よく考えたら優しいよね
ふつーにイイヤツだよね

dialogue_en: And the more I thought about it, the more I realized─wow─I liked him. Y'know?
dialogue_jp:
そんなこと考えてるうちに
ああ　好きかも～ってさ

dialogue_en: Maybe it's because of those feelings that I still can't fire energy blasts.
dialogue_jp:
そのせいかな
まだ　波動は出ないよ

dialogue_en: I can help.
dialogue_jp: 手伝ってやる

dialogue_en: With the energy blasts? Or my feelings?
dialogue_jp: しゅぎょー？　こい？

dialogue_en: The former. Feelings ain't my thing.
dialogue_jp: 恋なんて　俺にはわからない

dialogue_en: Think we both kinda suck in that department.
dialogue_jp: あ～あ　残念なアタシたちだね～

dialogue_en: I-I mean, th-that is the sorta thing you're supposed to do in these situations—
dialogue_jp:
いや～　その　なんか
そ～ゆ～フンイキかな～？

dialogue_en: It was just practice.
dialogue_jp: って思ったわけよ……

dialogue_en: So...so don't go thinkin' it means anything, okay!?
dialogue_jp: とくに　深い意味はないから

dialogue_en: Say something!
dialogue_jp: おい　なんとか言え～！

dialogue_en: "Something."
dialogue_jp: ナントカ

dialogue_en: Are you kidding me!? I do something nice for you and that's what I get!?
dialogue_jp:
なんだ～それ！
自分だって　よけなかったくせに

dialogue_en: You're so annoying!
dialogue_jp: ああ　憎たらしい！

dialogue_en: Hey, if I ever see that guy again...what should I do?
dialogue_jp: 次　あいつと会ったら　どうするべき？

dialogue_en:
That's up to you. But if it were me...
I'd let him have it.
dialogue_jp:
そのときはそのとき
たぶん　それが正解だ

dialogue_en: What's this?
dialogue_jp: なんだこりゃ

dialogue_en: Whoa...
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Get down!
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: 待て！

dialogue_en: You tryin' to break it?
dialogue_jp: 壊すつもりか

dialogue_en: Just messing with ya.
dialogue_jp: 冗談だよ

dialogue_en: In-kweh-dible!
dialogue_jp: クエーってか！

dialogue_en:
When I was about your age...
I decided I'd had enough of the mines.
dialogue_jp:
おまえぐらいのとき
炭坑で働くことがイヤになっちまってよ

dialogue_en:
Wasn't much interested in any kind of work.
I was young and wanted to enjoy my youth.
dialogue_jp:
かといって　やりたいことがあるわけでもなくて
プラプラと遊び回ってたんだよ

dialogue_en:
And then I met a sweet girl named Myrna.
Knew right away she was the one.
dialogue_jp:
そんなときさ　ミーナと知り合ったのは
ひとめぼれってやつだ

dialogue_en: But Myrna, she wasn't buyin' what I was sellin'.
dialogue_jp: 最初はまったく　相手にされなくてよお

dialogue_en:
Told me she was "in the market for a man,
not a selfish little boy."
dialogue_jp:
一人前になってから出直しておいで坊や
ってなもんよ

dialogue_en:
If I was gonna win her heart, I had some
growin' up to do. Otherwise, she'd never
give me the time of day.
dialogue_jp:
それからは　心を入れ替えて働いたぜ
ミーナに認めてもらえるように

dialogue_en: Funny enough, our first date was at a theme park.
dialogue_jp: 最初のデートは　遊園地だったな

dialogue_en:
Nowhere near as big as this place, of course─
just a travelin' fair with a handful of rides.
dialogue_jp:
といっても　ここみたいなデカいとこじゃなくて
こじんまりとした移動遊園地さ

dialogue_en: We ended up ridin' these wooden chocobos round and round, laughin' our asses off.
dialogue_jp:
木でできたチョコボに乗ってグルグル回されてよ
ゲラゲラ笑い合ったよ

dialogue_en: Look at me, boring you with my old stories.
dialogue_jp: オレの自分語りなんて　つまんねえよな

dialogue_en:
Wouldn't be the first time.
Don't worry─I'm used to it.
dialogue_jp: いまさら　あんたはいつもそんな感じだ

dialogue_en:
Yeah, well...the lesson here is once you find
your soulmate, you never let 'em go.
dialogue_jp:
とにかく　おまえも運命の相手を見つけたら
ぜってえ逃すんじゃねえぞ

dialogue_en: Although, seeing as you're stuck ridin' this thing with me, I'm thinkin' ya prob'ly already did.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　オレとこうしてるってことは
すでに逃してるかもしんねーけどな

dialogue_en: Hey, you invited me.
dialogue_jp: あんたが　誘ってきたんだろ？

dialogue_en:
Right! 'Cause I learned to make the first move...
which is exactly what you gotta do.
dialogue_jp:
まず　おまえが動けって話だ
待ってるだけじゃなくてよ

dialogue_en: Duly noted.
dialogue_jp: 覚えておこう

dialogue_en: So, who is it? Hmm?
dialogue_jp: で　どっちだよ？

dialogue_en: Who's what?
dialogue_jp: なんの話だ

dialogue_en:
You know damn well what I'm talkin' about.
Why do you always have to overthink things?
dialogue_jp:
おまえは考えすぎなんだよ
そのうえ　うしろ向きときてやがる

dialogue_en:
That ain't no way to live!
You gotta just go for it sometimes.
dialogue_jp:
だから　動けなくなっちまう
もっと　ガーっといかねえと！

dialogue_en: You mean, like you do all the time?
dialogue_jp: あんたは　考えなさすぎる

dialogue_en: Touché.
dialogue_jp: あー　たしかに……

dialogue_en: You could say that we balance each other out.
dialogue_jp: オレたち　いいコンビかもな

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: かもな

dialogue_en: I mean it, though. If you do have feelin's for someone, tell 'em straight out.
dialogue_jp:
ただな　もし想いがあるなら
しっかり伝えておけよ

dialogue_en: Don't wait till it's too late.
dialogue_jp: 後悔しないようにな

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Cool it.
dialogue_jp: おちつけ

dialogue_en: How can I!?
dialogue_jp: 無理だよ！

dialogue_en: It's─
dialogue_jp: レッドXIII

dialogue_en: I got this!
dialogue_jp: まかせて！

dialogue_en: Pretty good, right?
dialogue_jp: 見た？　いまの！

dialogue_en: You're a pro.
dialogue_jp: うまいもんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, you're gonna drool on the seat.
dialogue_jp: シタ　出てるぞ

dialogue_en: Close call.
dialogue_jp: ごめん

dialogue_en: What's up?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: Alright...this doesn't leave the ride, okay?
dialogue_jp: あのね　聞かなかったことにしてほしいんだけど

dialogue_en:
It might sound crazy, but back in Midgar,
Aerith and I could both see the future.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルにいたとき
エアリスとオイラは　未来を知ってたんだ

dialogue_en:
Well, that would explain a lot.
I'm guessing you can't anymore, though?
dialogue_jp:
ああ　そんな気がしていた
いまはもう　違うのか？

dialogue_en: Nope. Not even a bit.
dialogue_jp: うん　もう知らない

dialogue_en: Whatever we had, I think the Whispers took it from us when we left.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルを出るとき
フィーラーに　奪われたんだと思う

dialogue_en: Huh.
dialogue_jp: そうか

dialogue_en: Seems "arbiters of fate" can do whatever they want.
dialogue_jp: 運命の……番人だったよね

dialogue_en: So you told us.
dialogue_jp: おまえが　そう言ったんだ

dialogue_en: Oh, did I? Huh... I wonder if this means we'll eventually forget they even exist.
dialogue_jp:
そうだっけ……
あいつらのことも忘れちゃうのかな？

dialogue_en: We'd be better off if we did, frankly. There's no point in wasting our time worrying about fate...
dialogue_jp:
べつにいいさ
運命なんて気にしない

dialogue_en: if we can't change it.
dialogue_jp: 気にしようがない

dialogue_en: You're right.
dialogue_jp: そうだね

dialogue_en: Still...there is one thing I need you to remember.
dialogue_jp: でも　ひとつだけ忘れないでほしいことがあるんだ

dialogue_en: You have to keep Aerith safe.
dialogue_jp: エアリスを……守ろう

dialogue_en: I mean it, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: エアリスを守ろう

dialogue_en:
I don't remember what's supposed to happen,
but I do know she's in danger.
dialogue_jp:
このことを忘れちゃいけないってことしか
覚えてないんだ

dialogue_en: Shake.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ……

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: Shake on it.
dialogue_jp: 誓いの握手！

dialogue_en: They are soft...
dialogue_jp: やわらかいんだな

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: レッドXIII

dialogue_en: Nothing. Forget it.
dialogue_jp: いや　なんでもない

dialogue_en:
So we just sit here and spin?
Coulda at least thrown in a joystick!
dialogue_jp:
ただ乗るだけかよ
つまんねえな～　操縦桿つけろい！

dialogue_en: That seems joysticky.
dialogue_jp: ハンドルはあるみたいやけど

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: シド

dialogue_en: Some dumb kids' toy.
dialogue_jp: 子供だましじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Come on... At least we can enjoy the scenery.
dialogue_jp: まあまあ　景色を楽しみましょ！

dialogue_en: Just look! You've got a space battle unfoldin' right before your very eyes! Tell me that doesnae send a chill down your spine!
dialogue_jp:
ほらほら　こないに近くで
宇宙戦争が見られるやなんて大興奮ですわ　ねえ？

dialogue_en: Oh no! Evasive action!
dialogue_jp: エライこっちゃ！

dialogue_en: Hard to port!
dialogue_jp: あらよっと！

dialogue_en: Made it by the skin of our teeth!
dialogue_jp: ひゃ～　あぶないところでしたねえ？

dialogue_en:
Y'know, people sometimes ask me to predict
who will win a race.
dialogue_jp: ボク　よくレースの占いを頼まれるんですけど

dialogue_en: "Ach, come off it," I tell 'em! If I could do that, I wouldnae still be workin' here, now would I!?
dialogue_jp:
いやいや　結果が予言できるんやったら
自分で賭けるっちゅーねん　ねえ？

dialogue_en:
Talk about a breathtakin' spectacle!
Seriously, are you lads seein' this!?
dialogue_jp:
うわあ　キレイやな～
これはみなさん　見な損ですよ！

dialogue_en: To hell with ya, ya wee scunners!
dialogue_jp: 最悪のメンバーやーーー！

dialogue_en:
Barbarians! I provide entertainment in spades
and all I get is crickets!
dialogue_jp:
なんで　こんな人らと乗ってしもたんや
ぜんっぜん楽しない！

dialogue_en: Can't we go any faster? This is torture.
dialogue_jp: にしても遅えな　拷問だぜこりゃ

dialogue_en: And how do you think I feel!?
dialogue_jp: それは　こっちのセリフや！

dialogue_en: Cait. Zip it.
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー　静かにしてくれ

dialogue_en:
Why're you takin' his side!?
I'm the one trying to make this fun!
dialogue_jp: ええ～　なんでボクが怒られなアカンのですか！

dialogue_en: Open the doors! Let me offa this thing!
dialogue_jp: もう　おろしてーーー！

dialogue_en: Hey─thanks for tonight.
dialogue_jp: ありがとう　クラウド

dialogue_en: You're welcome, but...I didn't do anything.
dialogue_jp: べつに　俺はなにもしていない

dialogue_en:
Wall Market Warriors, you and me!
We'll show 'em tomorrow.
dialogue_jp:
明日　がんばろうね
スラムのときみたいに

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: We should prob'ly head back to our rooms.
dialogue_jp: そろそろ　もどろっか

dialogue_en: Yeah... Prob'ly.
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: Tell anyone about tonight and you're a dead man!
dialogue_jp: さっきのこと　だれにもいうなよ！

dialogue_en: Thanks for comin' out tonight. I appreciate it.
dialogue_jp: 話聞いてくれて　ありがとうな

dialogue_en: Tomorrow, we're gonna go to town on those suckers.
dialogue_jp: 明日は　思いっきり暴れてやろうぜ！

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: I'm glad that we could speak in private, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: 話せてよかったよ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: You're good company. Thanks.
dialogue_jp: つきあってくれて　ありがとね

dialogue_en: Well, I'll be in the stands rootin' for ya tomorrow. Knock 'em dead.
dialogue_jp: 明日は客席から応援するぜ　がんばれよ

dialogue_en: Full disclosure: didn't know anything about this "promised land"...
dialogue_jp:
わたし　よく知らなかったんで
勉強したんですけど

dialogue_en: But I do now and seriously, wow. Find of the century!
dialogue_jp:
約束の地が　ついに判明なんて
すごいことですよね

dialogue_en: You never know. That intel could be bad.
dialogue_jp: まだ　確実というわけではない

dialogue_en: Our conclusions are based on a long-standing theory. It's safe to assume the temple and the promised land are one and the same.
dialogue_jp:
『古代種の神殿こそが約束の地である』
その説は　昔から根強くあった

dialogue_en: If the Ancient's headed there, then it's gotta be the right place. Good thing we let her go.
dialogue_jp:
古代種が行こうとしてるんだし
絶対そうですよ　泳がせて正解でしたね

dialogue_en: I understand the keystone is to be awarded to the winners of today's special event.
dialogue_jp:
キーストーンは　本日行われる
特別興行の賞品になるようです

dialogue_en: How should we proceed?
dialogue_jp: いかがされますか？

dialogue_en: I have an idea.
dialogue_jp: 方法は考えてある

dialogue_en: Alright. Let's bring this one home.
dialogue_jp: 勝つのは　俺たちだ

dialogue_en: We're only moments away from tonight's main event! Are you ready to rumble, Champions?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　いよいよスペシャルマッチ開幕です！
準備は万全ですか？

dialogue_en: Ya don't wanna keep your audience waiting too long, Champions!
dialogue_jp: さあ　興奮した観客達が待ちかねております！

dialogue_en: They're all eager to watch you take down the don! Ready to give 'em a show?
dialogue_jp:
コルネオファミリー vs ディオ軍団！
出場ですよね？

dialogue_en: Look, I can't stall any longer. Just do me a favor and get out there already!
dialogue_jp: さあ早く　早く出場を！

dialogue_en: Participate in the match?
dialogue_jp: スペシャルマッチに出場しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Excellent. Best of luck to you in the arena!
dialogue_jp: では　ご健闘をお祈りしております！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh... Well, just make it snappy.
dialogue_jp: お～っと　準備が足りないようだ！

dialogue_en:
Do you...need another minute to strategize?
Or stock up on supplies?
dialogue_jp: お～っと　作戦会議か　それとも買い物か！

dialogue_en: Hey, now isn't exactly the time to be chickening out.
dialogue_jp: お～っと　もしかしてビビってるのか！

dialogue_en: Two!
dialogue_jp: シド

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen! Welcome to the Gold Saucer's palace of power: the Musclehead Colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
ようこそ　ゴールドソーサーが誇る力の殿堂
マッスルコロシアムへ！

dialogue_en: Tonight, Don Corneo and yours truly will do battle for the right to name this gilded paradise for posterity!
dialogue_jp:
本日は　ミスターコルネオと我が楽園の名前を賭け
スペシャルバトルマッチを開催する運びとなった

dialogue_en: It feels like only yesterday that I was a scrawny young lad chasing a dream in the desert, with─
dialogue_jp:
思えば　私がゴールドソーサーという夢を
追いかけ始めたのは――

dialogue_en: A-yo, nobody wanna hear your shit, old man!
dialogue_jp:
ヨーヨー
なにゴチャゴチャ話してんだ　オッサン！

dialogue_en: Hahaha!
Heeheehee, haha!
dialogue_jp: コルネオ

dialogue_en: Yeah, baby! Hehehehehe!
dialogue_jp: いえ～～～い！　ほひ　ほひほひほひ　ほひー！

dialogue_en:
Ho! Hee! Ho! Hee! Hehehe!
Check it out!
dialogue_jp: コルネオ

dialogue_en: Hahahaha!
dialogue_jp: コルネオ

dialogue_en: Mic check, one two, one two!
dialogue_jp: マイクチェック　チェックチェック　ワンツー

dialogue_en:
How about you shut up and let us give these folks a real show?
I hate to break it to you bitch, but you're out!
See ya! (See ya!) Don't need ya! (Take a bow!)
dialogue_jp:
昔話なんて誰が聞きてえんだ　そんなの？
ボケたオッサンはここで退場　あんがと

dialogue_en:
Next up, it's your boys Scotch and Kotch!
Bringin' you the thrill of the fight─
one unforgettable night!
dialogue_jp:
こっから仕切るは　ソッチとコッチ
盛りあげていくぜ　みんなといっしょに

dialogue_en: Time for the Battle for Naming Rights!
dialogue_jp: 名前とりあう　スペシャルマッチ！

dialogue_en: "Gold Saucer"? Take that shit and throw it straight in the trash!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサー？
ダセえ名前は　今日でおさらば！

dialogue_en: "Corneoland" has got that real panache!
dialogue_jp: オレたち勝てば　コルネオランド！

dialogue_en:
All my sexy ladies, come on down!
You could be a queen, come and claim your crown!
dialogue_jp:
ドンと集めな　ビューティーガール
ドンが開くぜ　嫁オーディション！

dialogue_en:
Don't stop or doubt the don,
'cause the fam and the fools about to...
dialogue_jp:
ドンストップ！
始めようか　バトルロイヤル

dialogue_en: get it on! Two teams enter, only one's gonna shine.
dialogue_jp:
マッシュアップ！
混ぜてみな　危険承知で

dialogue_en:
Gloves are comin' off, pride is on the line.
Sparks gonna fly, and I'mma get mine.
dialogue_jp:
拳あわせな　プライド賭けて
火花散らせな　魂ぶつけて

dialogue_en: So make some noise for the soon-to-be losers!
dialogue_jp: 吠えて迎えな　今夜のバトラー

dialogue_en:
Step up!
Lemme see a clean, fair fight!
dialogue_jp:
パンプアップ！
すんだか　そこのお・ま・え・ら！

dialogue_en:
Nonstop!
Even if it takes all night!
dialogue_jp:
ノンストップ！
いくぜ　このバトル

dialogue_en:
I wanna hear you scream till you can't no more.
The fun don't stop till the bodies hit the floor!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　叫んでけよ　声かれるまで
よお　楽しもうか　決着つくまで

dialogue_en: That's enough super hot fire for the intro.
dialogue_jp: ビートにのせたゴタクもここまで

dialogue_en: Fam's comin' in to take you out—here we go!
dialogue_jp: そんじゃあ　まずは小手調べ！

dialogue_en: The Battle for Naming Rights! Round One... Fight!
dialogue_jp:
ネーミングライツ争奪マッチ
ラウンド・ワン　かませ～！

dialogue_en: There's more than I can count!
dialogue_jp: どうなってんの！

dialogue_en: Just focus on the ones in front of you!
dialogue_jp: 落ちついて　目の前の敵に対処しろ！

dialogue_en:
The lovely ladies of the ring have delivered
an unlovely blow to our family,
putting Dio's Champions on top!
dialogue_jp:
ビューティーガールたちの華麗な攻撃が炸裂！
これはディオ軍団優勢か？

dialogue_en: But you know what they say! Turnabout is fair play, and revenge is never served cold by the don.
dialogue_jp:
しかーし　こんなとこで負ける
コルネオファミリーではございません！

dialogue_en: Hope the champs are limbered up and ready for a heaping helping of pain, 'cause they're gonna get it good!
dialogue_jp:
準備運動はこれぐらいでいいでしょう
ここからが　本番です！

dialogue_en: Eheheheh!
dialogue_jp: ホヒホヒ　ホヒホヒ！

dialogue_en:
Say hello to the perennial pricklers─
the sensational succulents─the cactuars!
dialogue_jp: 砂漠のお調子者　サボテンダーの登場だー！

dialogue_en:
Raised with the kind of fatherly love only
the don can provide, these thorny-thrashers bear
the name Corneo!
dialogue_jp:
毎日　ホヒホヒ声をかけて大切に育てました
いまでは立派なファミリーの一員です！

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen, beware of the ten thousand needles sure to fly every which way, when Round Two begins─now!
dialogue_jp:
皆様　流れ針にはご注意ください
それではラウンド・ツー　かませ～！

dialogue_en: Hold on tight!
dialogue_jp: とばすよ～！

dialogue_en: Roger!
dialogue_jp: はいな～！

dialogue_en: Fancy footwork!
dialogue_jp: わ～お　さすがやわ～！

dialogue_en: I'm just gettin' started!
dialogue_jp: しっかり　つかまって！

dialogue_en:
I'll not be losin' one of my nine lives
to the likes of you!
dialogue_jp: おっと　ネコなめたらアカンで～！

dialogue_en: Move! If you get hurt, I get hurt!
dialogue_jp: どいてや　どかんとケガするで～！

dialogue_en:
An interspecies wombo combo! Looks like
the Corneo Family's in big, big trouble!
dialogue_jp:
種族を越えた連携攻撃に
コルネオファミリー　大大大ピーンチ！

dialogue_en: Gotta hand it to 'em─that there was one hell of a play! If I'm being honest, our dear family's got a real fight on its hands!
dialogue_jp:
これは　敵ながらアッパレ！
我々も出し惜しみしている場合ではございません

dialogue_en: Don't count us out yet though, 'cause we've still got three combatants rarin' to go!
dialogue_jp:
我がファミリーから
最後の精鋭たちを送り込みましょう！

dialogue_en: Tired?
dialogue_jp: 疲れたか？

dialogue_en: Nope─all good.
dialogue_jp: ううん　平気

dialogue_en:
And here they are! These stab-happy scamps
have come to kill, kill, kill!
dialogue_jp: お～っと　ドンの秘蔵っ子たちの登場だー！

dialogue_en:
With their hate-filled blades, they'll slice you up
in no time flat! Who's first!?
dialogue_jp:
コルネオファミリーのうらみを乗せた
包丁の餌食となるのは　誰だ！

dialogue_en:
Find out, in the next and final round!
To the winners go the spoils and the glory!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　これがラストバトルです
勝者には　喝采と名誉を！

dialogue_en: And to the losers, a truckload of tears!
dialogue_jp: 敗者には　侮辱と屈辱を！

dialogue_en: In the Fight for Naming Rights...
dialogue_jp: ネーミングライツ争奪マッチ

dialogue_en:
it's time for Round Three!
So let the bloodshed begin!
dialogue_jp: ラウンド・スリー　かませ～！

dialogue_en: That should do it, right?
dialogue_jp: これで最後だよね！

dialogue_en: Still got Corneo to go.
dialogue_jp: コルネオはここからだ

dialogue_en: Yahehehe!
Right.
dialogue_jp: だね！

dialogue_en: Now, who wants to be the first lucky lady?
dialogue_jp: だれにしようかな～？

dialogue_en: How 'bout you!?
dialogue_jp: き～～～めた！

dialogue_en: Tifa! Look out!
dialogue_jp: ティファ　あぶない！

dialogue_en: Hee haha! Daddy's comin'!
dialogue_jp: ほひ～　いっただきま～～～す！

dialogue_en:
What a shame!
That sneak attack won't be makin' the highlight reel!
dialogue_jp: あ～っと　ドンの奇襲は失敗だー！

dialogue_en: You're in for a real treat today, folks, as the one, the only, Don Corneo has decided to enter the ring!
dialogue_jp:
皆様　大変なことになりました
我らがドン・コルネオ　自ら出陣です！

dialogue_en: Hee haha! Mmmwah! Mwah!
dialogue_jp: ほひ～　いいの～いいの～！

dialogue_en: Ew! Just ew! This guy's a total skeez!
dialogue_jp: うへえ　気持ちワル～

dialogue_en: Don't underestimate him!
dialogue_jp: 見た目にまどわされるな

dialogue_en:
Time to strut your stuff, ladies─
and I want a good look.
dialogue_jp: 品定めといこうか　お嬢さんがた

dialogue_en: Abzu's old, Dio's Champions are new, the stadium is borrowed, and they'll all get black and blue, so let the bridal auditions begin!
dialogue_jp:
これは予想外の展開　ここにきて
ドンによる公開嫁オーディションの開幕だ～！

dialogue_en: C'mon, get it together!
dialogue_jp: おら　しっかりしろ！

dialogue_en: Daddy's countin' on ya!
dialogue_jp: こんなもんじゃねえよな？

dialogue_en: I knew you'd make me proud! Good boy!
dialogue_jp: グッボーイ　グッボーイ　アプスちゃん

dialogue_en: Now sic 'em!
dialogue_jp: やっちまえ～！

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: おい

dialogue_en: We cuttin' 'em off?
dialogue_jp: 斬り落とすぞ

dialogue_en: Or should we rip 'em off?
dialogue_jp: ねじり切っちゃう？

dialogue_en: That or...smash 'em maybe?
dialogue_jp: う～ん　すりつぶしちゃう？

dialogue_en: Let's fill 'em with lead.
dialogue_jp: ハチの巣がいいか？

dialogue_en: Don't bother. I'll just bite them off.
dialogue_jp: それとも　噛みちぎってやろうか

dialogue_en:
You're all so mean! So petty!
Picking on a poor small business owner.
dialogue_jp:
いいも～ん　いいも～ん！
みんなでいじめるっていうなら

dialogue_en: But hell, I can take it! And I can give as good as I get!
dialogue_jp: まとめてカモ～ン　相手してやるも～ん！

dialogue_en: So!
dialogue_jp: んが！

dialogue_en: All of you can...
dialogue_jp: 今日のところは

dialogue_en: kiss my ass!
dialogue_jp: グッバーイ！

dialogue_en: Hi-ho, my sewer stallion!
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　ゴー！

dialogue_en: He who runs away gives up naming rights today! Ladies and gentlemen, it's all over!
dialogue_jp:
なんとなんとなんとー！
ネーミングライツ争奪マッチ

dialogue_en: Victory goes to...Dio's Champions!
dialogue_jp: 勝ったのは　ディオ軍団だーーー！

dialogue_en: You're damn right!
dialogue_jp: どんなもんよお！

dialogue_en: We did it! We won!
dialogue_jp: やったね　クラウド

dialogue_en: 'Course we did.
dialogue_jp: 当然だ

dialogue_en: Aerith!
dialogue_jp: 私も！

dialogue_en: We did it.
dialogue_jp: 勝ったね

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
Thanks to you, my champions,
the Gold Saucer's name shall not be profaned.
dialogue_jp: 諸君のおかげで　私のゴールドソーサーは守られた

dialogue_en:
For this great boon,
allow me to embrace you each in turn!
dialogue_jp:
感謝のしるしとして
力いっぱい　ハグをさせてくれ！

dialogue_en: Yeah...we're good with just the keystone.
dialogue_jp: あんたのために戦ったわけじゃない

dialogue_en: And we'll take it now, thank you.
dialogue_jp: キーストーン　いただきます

dialogue_en: As you wish.
dialogue_jp: もちろんだとも

dialogue_en: I will not deny you what is yours by right. Behold─your prize.
dialogue_jp:
いまこそ　正統な持ち主へと返そう
さあ　受け取りたまえ
なんだ？

dialogue_en: Seriously!?
dialogue_jp: タークス？

dialogue_en: You give that back right now!
dialogue_jp: てめえ　返しやがれ！

dialogue_en: No ya don't!
dialogue_jp: こんにゃろ！

dialogue_en: Rude! Catch!
dialogue_jp: 先輩　パス！

dialogue_en: Shame on you.
dialogue_jp: タークスが　どろぼう？

dialogue_en: It's Shinra property.
dialogue_jp: これは　うちの資産だ

dialogue_en: Cut the bullshit.
dialogue_jp: 黙れ　泥棒！

dialogue_en: Rude!
dialogue_jp: ルードさん！

dialogue_en: Huh!?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: What the hell's goin' on?
dialogue_jp: どうなってんだよ

dialogue_en: He just took off!
dialogue_jp: 逃げちゃったよ？

dialogue_en: Alright! Yuffie, Nanaki─with me.
dialogue_jp: くそっ！　ユフィ　ナナキ　追うぞ

dialogue_en: The rest of ya, deal with them!
dialogue_jp: おまえらは　そっちをなんとかしろ

dialogue_en: Let's get a move on.
dialogue_jp: おい　行こうぜ！

dialogue_en: It's time to get some payback for the mines.
dialogue_jp: リベンジマッチだぞ　と

dialogue_en:
A grudge match then─over which,
I must insist you allow me to officiate.
dialogue_jp:
よろしい！
このバトル　我々が仕切らせてもらう

dialogue_en: To ensure a fair and entertaining bout, we'll give you a chance to rest before the festivities.
dialogue_jp:
しばしのブレイクタイムをはさみ
双方の準備が整い次第　再開とする

dialogue_en: Once you're ready, you need but say the word.
dialogue_jp: 用意ができたら　私に声をかけたまえ

dialogue_en: You think you could hurry it up?
dialogue_jp: はやくしてくれない？

dialogue_en: Just let me kick your ass already.
dialogue_jp: こっちは準備万端なんだけど

dialogue_en: You should've run.
dialogue_jp: 怖気づいたか？

dialogue_en: We'll make it quick.
dialogue_jp: 片を付けよう

dialogue_en: Are you ready to duke it out?
dialogue_jp: 準備は整ったかな？

dialogue_en: Fight the Turks?
dialogue_jp: タークスと戦いますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Fantastic! Then without further ado...
dialogue_jp: ブラボー　それでは始めようか！

dialogue_en: Nobody brings the hype like us! Scotch and Kotch! Make. Some. Noise, y'all!
dialogue_jp:
盛り上げるなら　オレたち
ソッチとコッチにま・か・せ・な！

dialogue_en: Nobody brings the hype like us! Scotch and Kotch! Make. Some. Noise, y'all!
dialogue_jp: コッチ

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen, keep your eyes on the arena!
dialogue_jp: どいつもこいつも　見とけ　このバトル！

dialogue_en: 'Cause ready or not... It's time to rumble!
dialogue_jp: 準備はいいか　お・ま・え・ら！

dialogue_en: One more round!
dialogue_jp: ボーナスラウンド

dialogue_en: Let's get it on!
dialogue_jp: コッチ

dialogue_en: Let's get it on!
dialogue_jp: かませ～！

dialogue_en: No fair!
dialogue_jp: ずるい！

dialogue_en: Back off!
dialogue_jp: させない！

dialogue_en: Well done.
dialogue_jp: よくやった

dialogue_en: That was nothing.
dialogue_jp: まだまだです！

dialogue_en:
It looks like the Turks are on the back foot!
Can they pull it together in time?
dialogue_jp: お～っと　これは勝負あったか？

dialogue_en: We're just getting warmed up. Right, Rude?
dialogue_jp: 笑わせないで　ねっ先輩！

dialogue_en: Yeah. This fight's far from over.
dialogue_jp: ああ　勝負はこれからだ

dialogue_en: Esteemed spectators! If you would be so kind as to direct your attention to the center of the ring.
dialogue_jp:
ハローエブリワン！
皆様　コロシアム中央にご注目ください

dialogue_en:
To ensure a fitting climax for this spectacle,
we've invited a special guest.
dialogue_jp:
クライマックスをより熱くするため
サプライズゲストをお呼びいたしました

dialogue_en: Now, let's give a round of applause for...
dialogue_jp: さあ　盛大な拍手でお迎えください

dialogue_en:
the Shinra Electric Power Company's
very own president: Rufus Shinra!
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニー新社長
ルーファウス神羅の登場です！

dialogue_en: Ohoho! Who could've foreseen this insane turn of events!? I sure as hell couldn't!
dialogue_jp:
なななななな　なんと～
トンでもない事態になりましたー

dialogue_en:
Shinra's president himself has taken the stage,
and the crowd is electric!
dialogue_jp: 神羅の社長が　乱入してきましたー！

dialogue_en: Mr. President, what are you doing here?
dialogue_jp: 社長　なにやってんですか

dialogue_en: You're still a Shinra employee─at least on paper.
dialogue_jp: 手続き上　おまえはまだ神羅の一員だ

dialogue_en:
And as your boss,
I figured I'd dispose of you personally.
dialogue_jp: 私が直接　クビにしてやろうと思ってな

dialogue_en: Was that meant to be a joke?
dialogue_jp: だからって……

dialogue_en: You two go. Wait with Tseng.
dialogue_jp: おまえたちは　ツォンと合流しろ

dialogue_en: Got my number this time?
dialogue_jp: 俺をなめているのか？

dialogue_en: Let's see, shall we?
dialogue_jp: 懲戒の時間だ

dialogue_en:
I've heard of aggressive managers,
but this boss is cutthroat!
dialogue_jp:
いったい　これから
どうなってしまうのでしょうか～！

dialogue_en: It's corporate downsizing with a vengeance!
dialogue_jp: 歴史的な試合となりました

dialogue_en: If you wanna savor the action, don't even think about leaving your seat! In fact, don't even blink!
dialogue_jp:
皆様　ルーファウス社長の雄姿を
しっかりと　目に焼きつけてください！

dialogue_en: Cocky as ever.
dialogue_jp: いい気になるなよ

dialogue_en:
Either my stomach's growlin',
or the president's pooch has joined the fray!
dialogue_jp: 社長の愛犬　ダークネイションの登場だー！

dialogue_en: Well trained, don't you think?
dialogue_jp: よくしつけられているだろ

dialogue_en: Ya can't bite the hand that feeds.
dialogue_jp: 尻尾を振られて　満足か？

dialogue_en: And yet here you are.
dialogue_jp: おまえも　しつけが必要だな

dialogue_en:
Not bad, Mr. President.
But you'll never be a SOLDIER.
dialogue_jp: 俺は元ソルジャーだ　当然の結果だな

dialogue_en: Enough of this farce.
dialogue_jp: 余興は終わりだ

dialogue_en: So, are we gonna go after him?
dialogue_jp: 逃げられたね

dialogue_en: Not yet. First─
dialogue_jp: 放っておこう　それよりも

dialogue_en: We find Cait Sith, right?
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー　だよね

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: 捕まえるぞ

dialogue_en:
I thought I'd seen it all, but this is
the mother of all twists! Wha-hoa!
dialogue_jp: お～っと　これはまさかの展開だー！

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen, both teams are disqualified! I don't think anyone could've predicted this outcome! What a crazy finish!
dialogue_jp:
なんと　両者試合放棄
リングアウトで　試合終了となりました！

dialogue_en: Should we look for the others too?
dialogue_jp: みんな　どこに行ったんだろ

dialogue_en: After Cait, okay?
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー　探そう！

dialogue_en: The others have the outside covered. Let's search in here.
dialogue_jp: 外はみんなにまかせて　このへん探そ

dialogue_en: We should look for Cait Sith.
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー　探そう？

dialogue_en: We still need to get the keystone back.
dialogue_jp: キーストーンを取り戻さないと

dialogue_en: He can't have gotten far.
dialogue_jp: このあたりにいるはずだよ

dialogue_en: Over there!
dialogue_jp: あそこ！

dialogue_en: Meow...
dialogue_jp: にゃーん？

dialogue_en: Teehehe...
dialogue_jp: シシシ！

dialogue_en: Prr...
dialogue_jp: ゴロゴロゴロ

dialogue_en: Ah!
dialogue_jp: うにゃっ！

dialogue_en: Wha!?
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Hey!
dialogue_jp: 待て！

dialogue_en: Huh!?
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Crap!
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Meow!
dialogue_jp: ふにゃー！

dialogue_en: Fwoo!
dialogue_jp: ニャー！

dialogue_en: I hate to do this!
dialogue_jp: ごめんやで～！

dialogue_en: We can't let him get away!
dialogue_jp: 急いで　追いかけよ！

dialogue_en: We need to find him.
dialogue_jp: どこかに隠れてるはず

dialogue_en: He could be anywhere... Maybe even hiding in plain sight!
dialogue_jp: どこだろ？　意外と見えるとこにいたりして

dialogue_en: He can't have gone far...
dialogue_jp: このあたりにいるはずだよ

dialogue_en: Och, leave me alone!
dialogue_jp: カンニンしてや～！

dialogue_en: There!
dialogue_jp: 見て！

dialogue_en: After him!
dialogue_jp: 追いかけよう！

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud. I searched high and low, but no Cait.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド
ケット・シー　どっか行っちゃったよ？

dialogue_en: When I get my hands on that thieving cat, he's in for it!
dialogue_jp: ドロボー猫め～　どこ行きやがった～

dialogue_en: Good to see you're still in one piece. Wish I could tell you I found that damned cat, but...
dialogue_jp:
おう　無事だったか
ケット・シーの野郎　まだ見つからねえんだ

dialogue_en: I'm gonna keep searchin' here.
dialogue_jp: ここは　オレにまかせろ

dialogue_en: Oh... Hey, Cloud. Sorry, I don't have any idea where Cait is.
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　ごめん
ケット・シー　見失っちゃった

dialogue_en: I searched the area, but no luck.
dialogue_jp: このあたりには　いないみたいだけど

dialogue_en: Hey. Lookin' for the robocat? Well, he ain't come through.
dialogue_jp:
よう　あのネコ探してんだろ？
こっちには来てないぜ

dialogue_en: Gotta give it to ya, that was some damn good fightin'.
dialogue_jp: さっきの試合　面白かったぜ！

dialogue_en: No sign of the cat.
dialogue_jp: ケット・シーはいない

dialogue_en: I'll keep an eye out.
dialogue_jp: 見つけたら　捕まえておこう

dialogue_en: Got it.
dialogue_jp: ツォンさん

dialogue_en: Be safe.
dialogue_jp: ご無事で

dialogue_en: You too.
dialogue_jp: あなたこそ

dialogue_en: Care to explain, cat?
dialogue_jp: てめえ　どういうつもりだ！

dialogue_en: It's...not how it looks?
dialogue_jp: カンニンやで

dialogue_en: What was I thinkin', trustin' you?
dialogue_jp: 神羅にも真っ当なヤツがいる

dialogue_en: The company man with a heart of gold. What a joke.
dialogue_jp:
おまえと会って　そう思えたのによ
やってくれるぜ

dialogue_en: Barret, no! Please!
dialogue_jp: バレット　やめて！

dialogue_en: Screw it. Piece of shit ain't worth the bullets anyway.
dialogue_jp: たしかに　弾がもったいねえ

dialogue_en: I don't understand... Why?
dialogue_jp: オイラたちを裏切ったの？

dialogue_en: 'Cause he's an asshole! One we should've never trusted in the first place!
dialogue_jp:
サイッテー！
神羅なんて　信じるんじゃなかった

dialogue_en: Don't. He deserves it.
dialogue_jp: 裏切り者とは　いっしょにいられない

dialogue_en: Not you too...
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん……

dialogue_en:
Knew from the start it had to end this way...
but it still stings.
dialogue_jp: こうなるってことは　わかってたんやけどなあ

dialogue_en: For a moment there...it felt like we were friends.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　仲良くなりすぎましたわ

dialogue_en: I am so pissed at Cait right now...
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー　腹立つな～

dialogue_en: Prob'ly laughin' at us from his new office.
dialogue_jp: きっと　さっそく昇進してるぜ

dialogue_en:
How are you not mad!?
He played us for fools from the start!
dialogue_jp:
アタシたちを　ず～っと
だましてたってことでしょ？

dialogue_en:
Just thinkin' about it makes me
wanna beat the crap outta him!
dialogue_jp: 思い出したら　またムカムカしてきた～！

dialogue_en: Hey... Are you okay?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　なにか気になる？

dialogue_en:
I'll be fine.
Just thought I was a better judge of character.
dialogue_jp: 人を見る目　すこしだけ自信あったんだ

dialogue_en: Forget him.
dialogue_jp: もう忘れよう

dialogue_en: So what's the plan then? We are not just gonna let 'em take the black materia, right!?
dialogue_jp:
どうすんの？
神羅も　黒マテリアを狙ってるってことでしょ

dialogue_en: We're gonna go after 'em, right?
dialogue_jp: 急いで　追いかけないと！

dialogue_en: And how we supposed to do that without any leads?
dialogue_jp: 追いかけるたって　どうすんだよ？

dialogue_en: He's got a point. The only one who knows where the temple is is...Cait Sith.
dialogue_jp:
神殿の場所を知ってるのは
ケット・シーだよね

dialogue_en:
But he told the Turks...
whose chopper I should be able to track.
dialogue_jp:
神殿は知らないが
タークスのヘリなら追跡可能だ

dialogue_en: Really!?
dialogue_jp: ほんと？

dialogue_en:
I know which radio frequencies they use.
The moment they get on comms, I'll find them.
dialogue_jp:
専用の周波数を知っている
連中が無線を使えば　居場所がわかる

dialogue_en: Well now, the old gal's got a transmitter.
dialogue_jp: 無線機なら　タイニーブロンコについてるぜ

dialogue_en: Then we're in business!
dialogue_jp: やったな！

dialogue_en: Alright! I'll run on ahead and get 'er warmed up for ya. Later.
dialogue_jp: よーし　オレは先行って準備しとくな

dialogue_en: It's settled, then. We follow Shinra to the temple.
dialogue_jp:
なんとかなりそうだ
俺たちも　神殿に向かおう

dialogue_en: And the black materia...
dialogue_jp: 黒マテリアは……

dialogue_en: will be ours.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちがもらう

dialogue_en: Hey. Remember me?
dialogue_jp: よお　クラウド

dialogue_en: You're that guy from Corneo's...
dialogue_jp: あんたは……コルネオの

dialogue_en: Leslie.
dialogue_jp: レズリーだ

dialogue_en: What are you doing out here? You look like you've been through hell.
dialogue_jp:
ここでなにしてるの？
それに　そのケガ

dialogue_en: Got wind my girl might be out this way. Had to follow up─see if there was truth to it.
dialogue_jp:
別れた女を探しまわって
その結果　ここに辿り着いたんだ

dialogue_en: What do you want to know?
dialogue_jp: なにを聞きますか？

dialogue_en: What happened to your girl?
dialogue_jp: 彼女について

dialogue_en: How's Wall Market holding up?
dialogue_jp: ウォール・マーケットについて

dialogue_en: Any news on Sector 7?
dialogue_jp: 七番街について

dialogue_en: Nothing.
dialogue_jp: 質問はない

dialogue_en: In case I didn't tell ya, her name's Merle.
dialogue_jp: 彼女の名前は　マールっていうんだ

dialogue_en: After you guys left Wall Market, I started asking around. Hoped one of her friends might know somethin'.
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケットであんたらと別れたあと
俺はまず　マールの知り合いを当たってみたんだ

dialogue_en: Shouldna bothered. Even if they did have info, they're not dumb.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　当然
コルネオから逃げた女の情報を

dialogue_en: They wouldn't dare blab to a former Corneo crony.
dialogue_jp:
コルネオの手下だった男に
教えてくれるワケもなくてね

dialogue_en:
But I was able to find out she wasn't
in Midgar anymore.
dialogue_jp:
なんとか　ミッドガルの外に出たって
情報だけを手に入れて

dialogue_en: And ever since then, I've been movin' from town to town─lookin' for leads.
dialogue_jp:
それからは　街を転々としながら
地道な聞き込みさ

dialogue_en: Well, you saw. After the plate fell, the trio opened the place to refugees.
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケットは　アニヤンたちが
七番街の避難所として開放した結果

dialogue_en:
Town tripled in size.
Man, if you thought it was lively before...
dialogue_jp:
ずいぶんと人が増えて
さらに騒がしい街になってるよ

dialogue_en:
Unfortunately...when Corneo pulled up stakes,
he took all that Shinra money with him.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　コルネオの力を失って
神羅とのパイプもなくなったからな

dialogue_en:
I'm not gonna sugarcoat it...
Wall Market's days are numbered.
dialogue_jp:
正直なところ
いつ潰されてもおかしくない状態だ

dialogue_en: Madam M's tryin' to work her magic, but...I dunno.
dialogue_jp:
マムが動いてくれているらしいが
どうなるかな

dialogue_en: Sector 7's still a mess... Prob'ly gonna stay that way for a while.
dialogue_jp: 七番街は……まだまだ先が見えない状態だ

dialogue_en: Expressway collapsed right after the plate...
dialogue_jp:
竜巻被害で　ハイウェイが崩壊したのは
知ってるよな？

dialogue_en:
then outta the blue, company decides it
needs a new president.
dialogue_jp: それに加えて　突然の社長交代だろ

dialogue_en: Seems pretty clear Shinra doesn't give a shit about Sector 7. Undercity especially, but that shouldn't come as a surprise.
dialogue_jp:
神羅は七番街どころじゃないのさ
特にスラムへの対応は　すべて後まわしになってる

dialogue_en: The people've stepped up though: clearing the rubble, helping the injured, locating the missing.
dialogue_jp:
いまは　住民たちがガレキの撤去作業と
行方不明者の把握を進めているみたいだ

dialogue_en: So the thing is...
dialogue_jp: それで……実は

dialogue_en: Gus is running a special competition─and a woman is the prize.
dialogue_jp:
ここを仕切っているロンリー・ゲスのパーティーで
ある女が　景品にされている

dialogue_en: Word around the Dustbowl is she fled here from Midgar. It's just a hunch, but I think she might be who I'm looking for.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルから逃げてきた　訳アリの女らしい
それが　俺の尋ね人じゃないかと思ってな

dialogue_en: She's a prize? That's sick.
dialogue_jp: 景品？　信じられない

dialogue_en: Gus is a real piece of shit, to put it mildly.
dialogue_jp: ロンリー・ゲスは　紳士とは言えない

dialogue_en: He do that?
dialogue_jp: そのケガは？

dialogue_en: Monsters did.
dialogue_jp: パーティーでやられた

dialogue_en:
Gus is calling it a "party," but...
it's an excuse to see blood.
dialogue_jp:
パーティーなんて呼んでるけど
ゲス流の　ねじくれた冗談だ

dialogue_en:
Lots of it. He pits people against fiends...
and his money's on the latter.
dialogue_jp:
実際は　モンスターと遊ぶことになる
命懸けでな

dialogue_en: I lost...so this is where you guys come in.
dialogue_jp: そこで　あんたに仕事を頼みたい

dialogue_en: Join the "party," win, and free that woman.
dialogue_jp: パーティーに参加して　景品を勝ち取ってくれ

dialogue_en: Still a merc, aren'tcha? No reason not to.
dialogue_jp: いまでも　なんでも屋なんだろ？

dialogue_en: True...
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en: Please.
dialogue_jp: 頼む

dialogue_en: Cloud.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: We'll do it.
dialogue_jp: 引き受けよう

dialogue_en: So you know, need a team of five to sign up.
dialogue_jp: パーティーは　５人１チームで参加できる

dialogue_en: In the ring, though? It's one-on-one.
dialogue_jp: モンスターと５戦　タイマンバトルだ

dialogue_en: And humans only, I'm afraid.
dialogue_jp: 挑戦できるのは　人間だけだ

dialogue_en: I'm counting on you, and so's the woman. If anyone can put Gus in his place, it's Wall Market's reigning champs.
dialogue_jp:
あんたらなら　きっとやれる
コルネオ杯で優勝した力　見せつけてやってくれ

dialogue_en: This is the first real lead I've had since I left Midgar. Just hope it isn't a dead-end.
dialogue_jp:
あれから　ずっと彼女を探し続けてきた
ようやくつかんだ手掛かりなんだ

dialogue_en: The fiends they raise here command a high price. I should know─Corneo was a...frequent customer.
dialogue_jp:
ここで育成したモンスターを高値で売ってるんだ
コルネオも　よく取引してたよ

dialogue_en: These people...they make Wall Market's worst look like angels.
dialogue_jp:
ここの連中は　ウォール・マーケットよりも
イカれてやがる

dialogue_en: And I thought the Corneo Cup was tough... Damn.
dialogue_jp: あんたでも厳しいか　参ったな

dialogue_en: You gotta keep tryin' for me. For her.
dialogue_jp: 依頼は継続だ　引き続き頼む

dialogue_en: You here to "join the party"?
dialogue_jp: パーティーに参加したいのか？

dialogue_en: Welcome to the famed Beast Battleground!
dialogue_jp: ビーストバトルグラウンドへ　ようこそ

dialogue_en: You lookin' to play with some monsters?
dialogue_jp: モンスターと遊んでいくかい？

dialogue_en: Fight in Beast Battleground?
dialogue_jp: 『ビーストバトルグラウンド』に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: ロンリーファイトに挑戦

dialogue_en: <button=quest> Yes, Join Gus's "Party"
dialogue_jp: <button=quest>ゲスパーティーに挑戦

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: 挑戦しない

dialogue_en: We're here if ya get a hankerin' for blood.
dialogue_jp: 血に飢えたら　また来な

dialogue_en: Challengers are always welcome.
dialogue_jp: いつでも歓迎するぜ

dialogue_en: You chicken? Is that your deal?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　怖気づいたか？

dialogue_en: Woo! Y'all ready for the party of your lives!?
dialogue_jp:
フォウ！
ようこそ　オレ様のパーティーへ

dialogue_en: Today's challengers are...
dialogue_jp: 本日のチャレンジャーは～？

dialogue_en: Bring it on, jerks!
dialogue_jp: アタシが相手だよ！

dialogue_en: the champion of chocobos─the racing ace himself, Cloud the Knife and crew!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボレースで優勝をかっさらった
クラウド・ナントカと　取り巻きだ～！

dialogue_en: Versus! My personal pick of the fiercest, most ferocious fiends you have ever seen!
dialogue_jp:
対するは　オレ様がそろえた
スーパーなモンスターたちだ～！

dialogue_en: This is it, folks! You're about to witness a brutal bloodbath of untold proportions! Let the shit hit the fan!
dialogue_jp:
さあおまえら　盛りあがる準備は済んだか？
ゲスでド派手な　パーティーの始まりだーーー！

dialogue_en: Who could've expected an upset like this!?
dialogue_jp:
フォウ！　こいつは驚きだぜ
クラウド・ナントカ

dialogue_en: Cloud the Knife's team has made it to the finals!
dialogue_jp: まさかここまで来るとは　いいチームじゃねえか

dialogue_en:
But! Playtime's over!
This here's the real moment of truth!
dialogue_jp:
しかし　遊びはここまで
こっからが本番だ！

dialogue_en: Are you ready? I wanna hear some noise, people!
dialogue_jp:
そんじゃあ　おまえら
叫ぶ準備はいいか！

dialogue_en: Give it up for everyone's nightmare, the murder machine supreme!
dialogue_jp: 我らが最高傑作　ジョーカーのおでましだ！

dialogue_en: No challengers have ever managed to beat this fearsome fiend!
dialogue_jp: 数多の挑戦者をもてあそび続けて　いまだ無敗

dialogue_en: Does our merc and his crew have what it takes to be the first?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド・ナントカは
この血塗られた道化に打ち勝ち

dialogue_en: Will they be able to claim our darling little grand prize!?
dialogue_jp:
景品のカワイコちゃんを
手に入れることができるのか

dialogue_en: You're about to find out, folks! This is the moment we've been waiting for! A desert bloodbath!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　声あげてけよ～
クライマックスの始まりだーーー！

dialogue_en: Least ya lost with style.
dialogue_jp: ハデにやられたな

dialogue_en: Gonna call it a day, or give it another try?
dialogue_jp: これに懲りずに　また来てくれよ

dialogue_en: You're damn lucky ya didn't get put down.
dialogue_jp: 死ななかっただけ　ラッキーだぜ

dialogue_en: Not bad!
dialogue_jp: やるじゃねえか

dialogue_en: I'd expect nothin' less from "Cloud the Knife."
dialogue_jp: さすが　噂のクラウド・ナントカだな

dialogue_en: Heh, you're the real monster.
dialogue_jp: あんたこそ　本物のモンスターだぜ

dialogue_en: Woo! Cloud, my man! Way to give the people a show!
dialogue_jp:
フォウ！　クラウドの熱いダンス
堪能させてもらったぜ

dialogue_en: Gotta say, never thought my little baby'd get so thoroughly crushed.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　まさか
オレ様の秘蔵っ子をやっちまうとはな

dialogue_en: Dammit!
dialogue_jp: チキショウ！

dialogue_en: Do you have any idea how much gil I spent on that thing, you inconsiderate son of a bitch!?
dialogue_jp:
最悪だぜマジで！
いくらかかったと思ってんだ　クソがーーー！

dialogue_en: Eh. It's done. S'all good.
dialogue_jp:
ふん　まあいい
過ぎたことだ

dialogue_en: Gotta look to the future─our future.
dialogue_jp: 先を見ようぜ　オレ様とおまえの未来をよ

dialogue_en: Whaddya say? We'd make one helluva team.
dialogue_jp:
どうだ　クラウド
オレ様の専属にならねえか？

dialogue_en:
Could clean up at the fights and the races.
Come on, ya know you wanna.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボレースに　バトルグラウンド
稼ぎまくれるぜ～？

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: 断る

dialogue_en: Hah! Don't do me like that. I'll throw in some perks on top. That should sweeten the deal, right?
dialogue_jp:
ハハ　つれねえなあ！
いまなら特別待遇で迎えてやるぞ　どうだ？

dialogue_en: Where's the girl?
dialogue_jp: 女はどこだ？

dialogue_en:
Oh, so you really were after our little prize.
You sir are a dirty dog.
dialogue_jp:
おっ　なんだカワイコちゃんが目当てか？
おまえもスミにおけねえなあ

dialogue_en: Well, you're welcome to her! You earned it!
dialogue_jp: よし　特別に女をオマケしてやるぜ

dialogue_en:
Just as a wittle show of good faith.
Go on, don't be shy.
dialogue_jp:
な～に　なんでも屋とオレ様の仲だ
遠慮すんな

dialogue_en: And then maybe think over that deal? Pretty please?
dialogue_jp:
だから　専属になる件
考え直してみねえか

dialogue_en: Hey.
dialogue_jp: ねえ

dialogue_en: Hello. Where did you come from, beautiful?
dialogue_jp: おっ　ここにもカワイコちゃん

dialogue_en: You lookin' to get in good with the Gus Man?
dialogue_jp: 姉ちゃんも　オレ様の専属になるかい？

dialogue_en: Don't ever pull this crap again.
dialogue_jp: 二度と人を景品にしないで

dialogue_en: You offer any more people as prizes, they'll have to scrape you off my shoe. Got it?
dialogue_jp:
もしまた景品に人がまじってたら
手加減しない　いい？

dialogue_en: Hrn... Yes, ma'am...
dialogue_jp: は……は……はい～

dialogue_en: So, how did the reunion go?
dialogue_jp: 恋人さんと再会できた？

dialogue_en: Different girl.
dialogue_jp: 別人だった

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: Was just a random tourist from Midgar.
dialogue_jp: ミッドガルからの観光客だったらしい

dialogue_en:
Fell for a scam at the Saucer
and ended up down here.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーで詐欺にあって
売られたって話だ

dialogue_en: I sent her back up─made sure she's safe.
dialogue_jp: 上に送り届けて　保護してもらったよ

dialogue_en: Oh... I'm sorry.
dialogue_jp: そっか……

dialogue_en: Don't be. I'll find her eventually.
dialogue_jp: 再会は　おあずけだ

dialogue_en: I'm sure of it.
dialogue_jp: あきらめないからな

dialogue_en: Anyway... What's next for you and the others?
dialogue_jp:
それで　あんたらは
これからどうするんだ

dialogue_en:
We're looking for something too.
Need to find it ASAP.
dialogue_jp: 旅の途中だ　手に入れたい物がある

dialogue_en: Funny... Always the same story with us.
dialogue_jp: 俺たち　いつもなにか探してるな

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Good luck to you.
dialogue_jp: 幸運を祈るよ

dialogue_en: And you.
dialogue_jp: レズリーも

dialogue_en: Oh! Hey, Cloud! Got some news.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　待ってたよ！

dialogue_en: Apparently, the powers that be like what we have to offer. Gave us permission to race in the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
実は　これまでの成績が認められて
ゴールドカップに出場できるようになったんだ

dialogue_en: So I went and signed you up as soon as I could. After all, you're the best jockey I know!
dialogue_jp:
すでにエントリーはしてあるからね
もちろん　騎手はクラウドで！

dialogue_en: The Cup is three races, and you get points based on where you place in each. Bird with the most at the end wins.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップは　３レース連続で行われて
順位ポイントの合計で争うんだ

dialogue_en: But the races are like nothin' you've ever seen before. Gotta be on the ball if ya wanna take the top spot.
dialogue_jp:
これまでのレースとは　ひと味もふた味も違うから
しっかり準備しておいたほうがいいよ

dialogue_en: Anyway, when you're ready to face off against the finest riders this side of the continent, head on over to registration.
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ　チョコボレースの最高峰に
挑戦する用意ができたら　受付から参加してね

dialogue_en: Your bird'll be in peak condition─trust me.
dialogue_jp: チョコボの調整は完璧だから　安心して

dialogue_en: Ready to ruffle some feathers in the Gold Cup?
dialogue_jp: ゴールドカップで戦う準備はできた？

dialogue_en: Welcome, sir. We've been waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: クラウド騎手　お待ちしておりました

dialogue_en: The following races are scheduled for today.
dialogue_jp: 本日開催中のレースは　こちらになります

dialogue_en: Which of these races will you be competing in?
dialogue_jp: 本日は　どのレースに出走されますか？

dialogue_en: We eagerly await your return.
dialogue_jp: またのお越しを　お待ちしております

dialogue_en:
Please remember that you
are always welcome here, sir.
dialogue_jp: クラウド騎手なら　いつでも大歓迎です

dialogue_en: We're all looking forward to your next race.
dialogue_jp: また白熱したレースをお願いします

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: I can't believe it. This is really happening! We're about to race in the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
やっと　やっと出られるんだ
夢にまでに見たゴールドカップに！

dialogue_en: Aw hell, I can't tell you how long I've been waiting for this moment! We made it!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　この時を
どれだけ待ち望んできたか……

dialogue_en: Rein it in.
dialogue_jp: 落ち着いて

dialogue_en: Couldn't even if I wanted!
dialogue_jp: 落ち着いてられないよ！

dialogue_en: Okay, Cloud! Your bird's ready and rarin' to go. All that's left is─
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　チョコボの調整はバッチリだから
あとは――

dialogue_en: "Cheatin'"? If that ain't the stupidest...
dialogue_jp: 八百長だ？　馬鹿らしい

dialogue_en: Obviously some sore losers're tryin' to raise a stink. We'd best nip this thing in the bud.
dialogue_jp:
負けたヤツらが　腹いせに言いふらしてるんだろ
正式に否定コメントを出しとけ

dialogue_en: You tell 'em the reason we keep winnin' is 'cause we know how to take care of our birds.
dialogue_jp:
『サムズデリバリーが強いのは
　チョコボ愛のたまものだ』ってな

dialogue_en: Long time no see, merc. And Miss Tifa too.
dialogue_jp:
よお　なんでも屋
それに　ティファちゃん

dialogue_en: Shoulda told me you were droppin' by─woulda given you the royal treatment.
dialogue_jp:
来るなら言ってくれよ
ＶＩＰ席を用意したのに

dialogue_en: Oh! Hey, Sam.
dialogue_jp: こんにちは

dialogue_en: Gotta say, I was surprised to see your name on the jockey list. What sparked your interest in bird racin'?
dialogue_jp:
エントリー表に名前を見たときは驚いたぜ
まさか　チョコボ乗りになってるとはな

dialogue_en: This and that.
dialogue_jp: なりゆきだ

dialogue_en: Fell into it, didja? Well, you're a natural. Not just anybody can break my ace's streak.
dialogue_jp:
なりゆきで　うちのエースを負かしやがって
無敗記録が途絶えちまったじゃねえか

dialogue_en:
That was just a practice race.
My official record is still pristine.
dialogue_jp:
あれは　ただの調整レース
負けに勘定するなんてナンセンスだ

dialogue_en: This is the Gold Cup. The contest for which Hyperion and I have trained nonstop.
dialogue_jp:
今回はゴールドカップ　このレースのために
トウホウフハイを仕上げてきた

dialogue_en: You got the drop on us before, but you won't get lucky twice.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちが後れを取ることは　二度とない

dialogue_en: Now we're talkin'! You two are gonna give the people a race to remember.
dialogue_jp:
いいねえ
ヒリついたレース　期待してるぜ

dialogue_en: You're...?
dialogue_jp: おまえは……

dialogue_en: Billy. I work on Bill's ranch.
dialogue_jp: グリン牧場の　グリングリンです

dialogue_en: You might remember my parents─Will and Clara─since you killed 'em.
dialogue_jp:
あなたが殺した
リングリンとチョイスの息子です

dialogue_en: Did I?
dialogue_jp: ほう……？

dialogue_en: Don't play dumb. You were mad their business was eating into your profits.
dialogue_jp: あなたは同業の　ぼくの両親が邪魔になった

dialogue_en: So you got 'em addicted to gamblin'─was all part of your grand plan!
dialogue_jp:
だから　ギャンブル漬けにして消したんだ
そうでしょ！

dialogue_en: ...Wouldn't say the story's that simple.
dialogue_jp: そんな単純な話じゃねえよ

dialogue_en: But the truth can be one bitter drink...and you ain't nowhere near old enough to keep it down.
dialogue_jp:
でも　ガキにゃあまだ早い
真相は大人になるまでガマンしな

dialogue_en: I ain't just some stupid kid, and I'll prove it to you!
dialogue_jp:
ぼくが　ガキかどうか
レースで決めましょうよ

dialogue_en: If my man here wins the Gold Cup, that's proof I'm old enough to hear your "truth"!
dialogue_jp:
うちのクラウドがゴールドカップで勝ったら
ぜんぶ話してください

dialogue_en: You're on.
dialogue_jp: いいだろう

dialogue_en: Piddly little ranch like yours ain't got a chance, but...best of luck to y'all.
dialogue_jp:
田舎牧場には無理だと思うが
まあ　せいぜいがんばるんだな

dialogue_en: Sure about this? Pressure's on now.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　責任重大だよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, well...all I gotta do is win it all, right?
dialogue_jp: ああ　でも……勝てばいいんだろ？

dialogue_en:
Hello and welcome, ladies and gentlemen,
to the Gold Saucer's chocobo racetrack...
dialogue_jp:
さあ　歓声があふれんばかりの　ここ
ゴールドソーサーチョコボレース場

dialogue_en: which today plays host to racing's biggest competition: the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
本日は　チョコボレーサーたちの頂点を決める
ゴールドカップです

dialogue_en: Over three grueling races, our contenders will push themselves to the limit!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップは　３レース行われ
順位ポイントの合計で争われます

dialogue_en: The world is watching with bated breath as the best of the best take their places...
dialogue_jp:
世界中のチョコボファームから選ばれた
選りすぐりのチョコボと騎手たちが

dialogue_en: for what will surely be one heck of a race.
dialogue_jp: いま　スターティングゲートへと入っていきます

dialogue_en:
Fan favorite Joe will be riding the chocobo
Hyperion for Sam's Delivery Service...
dialogue_jp:
１番人気はもちろん　サムズデリバリー所属
ジョー＆トウホウフハイ

dialogue_en: and─given his track record─many expect the decorated champion to be first across the finish line.
dialogue_jp:
本日も精悍な顔つきで
ゴールの先で輝く　栄光の杯を狙っております

dialogue_en: Alright, folks. Our contenders are ready. Every gate is occupied, so this is it.
dialogue_jp:
さあ各チョコボ　ゲートに入り
大舞台の準備は整いました

dialogue_en: The moment you've been waiting for: the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp: まもなく　ゴールドカップのスタートです

dialogue_en: We hope you're ready for more, ladies and gentlemen...
dialogue_jp: さあ　興奮さめやらぬなか

dialogue_en:
because we're just getting started!
Here comes our next race!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップ第２レースが
まもなく　始まろうとしています！

dialogue_en: This is turning into one heated tournament, folks! But who will be riding home with the Gold Cup!?
dialogue_jp:
熾烈な戦いを繰り広げてきました
ゴールドカップも次が最終レースです

dialogue_en: Only one more race remains in this exciting event! Let's see who comes out on top!
dialogue_jp:
各チョコボがゲートに入り　第３レースが
いま　スタートしようとしています！

dialogue_en: No use beatin' ourselves up, I say. Let's focus on winning the next one instead.
dialogue_jp:
悔しいけど　仕方ないね
次こそ　黄金のトロフィーを持ち帰ろう

dialogue_en: Certainly didn't expect a race this prestigious to be a cakewalk. But hey, still got time to get back on the bird.
dialogue_jp:
さすが最高峰のレース　簡単には勝てないね
準備を整えて　また挑戦しよう

dialogue_en: Sometimes ya eat the bear, and sometimes the bear eats you. If we're gonna win this thing, we gotta train a helluva lot harder.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップで勝つには　もっと強くならないと
腕を磨いたら　再チャレンジしよう

dialogue_en:
Cloud Strife, riding for Bill's Chocobo Ranch,
has won the cup in a stunning upset!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップを制したのは
グリン牧場所属　クラウド騎手です！

dialogue_en: It looks like seven must have been his lucky number!
dialogue_jp: ７番人気から　大番狂わせです！

dialogue_en: No one saw that snake in the grasslands coming, and now his team is savoring the sweet taste of victory!
dialogue_jp:
グラスランドからの刺客が見事に勝ち切り
黄金の杯に　勝利の美酒を注ぎました！

dialogue_en: I cannot believe it!
dialogue_jp: なんということでしょう！

dialogue_en: The Gold Cup goes to none other than Cloud Strife and Bill's Chocobo Ranch!
dialogue_jp:
黄金の杯を勝ち取ったのは
グリン牧場所属　クラウド騎手！

dialogue_en:
He's taken three races in a row in an
unprecedented flawless victory!
dialogue_jp: ３戦３勝　前代未聞の完全優勝です！

dialogue_en: No one saw this snake in the grasslands coming, and now the racing world is sure to remember his name!
dialogue_jp:
グラスランドからやってきた刺客が
チョコボレース界に　新たな歴史を刻みました！

dialogue_en: Nice work.
dialogue_jp: よくやった

dialogue_en: You did it, Cloud! You really did it! You went and won us the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　やったよ
ゴールドカップ獲れたよ～！

dialogue_en: Yeah, I know. Mind letting me breathe?
dialogue_jp: ああ……わかったから　離してくれ

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: クラウド

dialogue_en: Nice riding.
dialogue_jp: ナイスレース

dialogue_en: There's the streak-ruinin' bastard. You stole the title right out from under my nose.
dialogue_jp:
やりやがったな　この野郎！
また　おいしいところをかっさらいやがって

dialogue_en: Well, Hyperion didn't make it easy.
dialogue_jp: トウホウフハイも悪くなかった

dialogue_en: Heh... I'd hope not.
dialogue_jp: はは　言うじゃねえか

dialogue_en:
Mighty fine bird you raised.
He beat mine fair and square.
dialogue_jp: 今回は完敗だ　いいチョコボを育てたな

dialogue_en: Just tell me: what happened to my parents? I held up my end of the bargain─now it's your turn.
dialogue_jp:
約束　覚えてますよね？
父さんと母さんのこと　話してください

dialogue_en: Son...do you know what kinda business yer parents were tryin' to break into after they got their ranch up and runnin'?
dialogue_jp:
おまえ　両親が牧場と並行して始めた
新しい事業のことは知ってるのか？

dialogue_en: Wild chocobo conservation.
dialogue_jp: 野生のチョコボの保護だ

dialogue_en: It's no secret that environmental changes have been hard on the birds─and what's bad for them is bad for business.
dialogue_jp:
環境の変化で　野生のチョコボが
年々減ってきているのは　業界でも問題になっていた

dialogue_en: Unfortunately, nobody seemed to care.
dialogue_jp: ただ　誰も動こうとはしなかった

dialogue_en: Savin' the planet ain't cheap, y'see. Folks know somebody's gotta pay for it, but they'll be damned if it's gonna be them.
dialogue_jp:
当然さ　環境保護なんざ莫大な費用がかかるくせに
１ギルにもならないときてやがる

dialogue_en: So while everybody else turned a blind eye, one couple faced the problem head on: your parents.
dialogue_jp:
だから　誰もが見て見ぬフリだ
そんななか立ちあがったのが　おまえの両親だ

dialogue_en: They had everything they'd need.
dialogue_jp: ふたりには　情熱があった

dialogue_en: The know-how, drive, and passion.
dialogue_jp: 才能も知識も行動力もあった

dialogue_en: Thing is, none of that counts for much if you ain't got the gil.
dialogue_jp: だが　残念ながら金がなかった

dialogue_en: So they went around takin' out loans left and right till they were swimmin' in debt─which is when they ran into the meanest shark of 'em all.
dialogue_jp:
資金不足から借金に借金を重ね　そして
ついには　最悪なヤツのところへ転がり込んだ

dialogue_en: Reckon you know who.
dialogue_jp: どこだかわかるか？

dialogue_en: Don Corneo.
dialogue_jp: ドン・コルネオ

dialogue_en: I didn't know it at the time...
dialogue_jp: あとから知ったことだが

dialogue_en: but that sleazy sonuvabitch was roundin' up folks and shippin' 'em off to Shinra for their "experiments."
dialogue_jp:
コルネオは当時　神羅のために
怪しい実験の参加者を集めていたらしい

dialogue_en: Will and Clara figured it was the only way they'd be able to save their business...so they signed up.
dialogue_jp:
リングリンとチョイスは
事業を守るために　体を差し出したんだ

dialogue_en: While later, Will paid me a visit. Begged me to "take the reins" in his and Clara's stead.
dialogue_jp:
ある日　リングリンが来て
事業を引き継いでくれと頭を下げた

dialogue_en: He wanted what was best for those birds.
dialogue_jp: あいつのチョコボ愛は底なしだ

dialogue_en: As did I, so I took him up on the offer and bought 'em out.
dialogue_jp:
俺も　その気になっちまって
事業を買い取ったんだ

dialogue_en: And since then, I ain't seen either one of yer parents.
dialogue_jp: 以来　おまえの両親には会っていない

dialogue_en: It was only after that I heard about Corneo's antics through the grapevine. Couldn't do a thing to stop him─not with Shinra in the wings, that's for sure.
dialogue_jp:
あとになって　コルネオやら神羅のことを聞いたが
あの連中相手に俺ができることはなにもなかった

dialogue_en: They say anything about me? Or my sister?
dialogue_jp: ぼくと妹のことは　なにか言ってましたか

dialogue_en: Not to me, no.
dialogue_jp: 俺には　なにも

dialogue_en: Don't go thinkin' they forgot about you. You and yer sister were always at the forefront of their minds.
dialogue_jp:
捨てられたとか思うなよ
あいつらが守ったのは　おまえたちの未来だ

dialogue_en: The business might've gone south, but they chose to give up their future to make sure you two could have yers.
dialogue_jp:
事業には失敗したが　その責任は
自分の未来を捨てることで　きっちりと取った

dialogue_en: That's why you got a roof over yer head, a place to work, and food to eat.
dialogue_jp: だから　牧場と家と食い扶持が残っただろ

dialogue_en: I can't believe it... I've had it wrong this whole time...
dialogue_jp:
知らなかった……
ぼくは　なにも知らなかった

dialogue_en: Son, I'd be surprised if there's a wild chocobo out there that doesn't owe its freedom to your mom and yer dad, one way or another.
dialogue_jp:
世界中で野生のチョコボが生き残っているのは
間違いなく　おまえの両親の功績だ

dialogue_en: Hell of a legacy to live up to─but if you want it, the business is yers.
dialogue_jp:
おまえにその気があるなら
チョコボ保護事業は返してやる

dialogue_en: Just know this: it ain't gonna turn a profit.
dialogue_jp: ただし　万年赤字部門だ

dialogue_en: So, unless you can find a way to fund it, you'll wind up in the same trouble as your folks.
dialogue_jp:
資金計画をしっかり立てないと
なにもかもなくしてしまうぞ

dialogue_en: Think it over. Maybe chat with Paw-paw too.
dialogue_jp: じいさんと　しっかり相談するんだな

dialogue_en: Call it.
dialogue_jp: 賭けるか？

dialogue_en: Heads or tails, son. Get it right, and I'll float you some operatin' capital.
dialogue_jp:
裏か表か　当てられたら
運営資金をサポートしてやるよ

dialogue_en: Thanks, but no thanks. I'm gonna do this on my own. Me and Chloe and Gramps, I mean.
dialogue_jp:
結構です　自分でなんとかします
妹と　じいちゃんといっしょに

dialogue_en: I─
dialogue_jp: グリングリン

dialogue_en: You truly are their boy. Got your old man's pig head and your mother's backbone. Not bad.
dialogue_jp:
がんこなところは　父親似
気が強いところは　母親似だな

dialogue_en: I'm gonna do my parents proud─you'll see. It may take some time, but I'll make sure their legacy lives on.
dialogue_jp:
ぼく　もっともっと頑張ります
父さんと母さんの想い　大切にしなくちゃ

dialogue_en: I don't get it. If Gramps knew all this, why'd he make it sound like Sam was to blame?
dialogue_jp:
でも　どうしてじいちゃんは
サムが悪いみたいな話をしたんだろう

dialogue_en: He was probably trying to protect you─to stop you from going after Corneo or Shinra on your own.
dialogue_jp:
コルネオや神羅のような　危険な相手に
あなたの憎しみが向かわないように

dialogue_en: So he pinned it on Sam─knowing that your uncle would be okay shouldering the blame.
dialogue_jp:
それにサムなら　ぜんぶ受け止めてくれるって
そう考えたんじゃないかな

dialogue_en: Shouldn't have to tell you this, but seeking revenge would be stupid.
dialogue_jp: 親の仇討ちとか　バカなことは考えるなよ

dialogue_en: I know.
dialogue_jp: うん……

dialogue_en: Still, if an opportunity did happen to come along, you'd help me out, wouldn't you?
dialogue_jp:
でも　もしチャンスが来たら
クラウド　手伝ってくれるよね

dialogue_en: Hey, I'm a world-famous jockey now.
dialogue_jp: 俺はいまや　ゴールドカップ優勝騎手だ

dialogue_en: Can't be associated with that kind of stuff.
dialogue_jp: 下品な連中には近づきたくない

dialogue_en: You had me goin' there!
dialogue_jp: 本当だね！

dialogue_en: If I'm gonna get the money to buy back my parent's ranch, I'll need to rack up more wins.
dialogue_jp:
サムから事業を引き取れるようになるためにも
もっと　レースで勝たないと

dialogue_en: I'm fixin' to brush up on my knowledge of wild chocobos.
dialogue_jp: 野生のチョコボについて　あらためて勉強するよ

dialogue_en: I saw your battle with that bastard Corneo! Felt real good seein' you tan his hide like that.
dialogue_jp:
見たよ　コルネオたちとのバトル！
ありがとう　すこしだけ心が晴れたよ

dialogue_en: Man like that deserves a slow death in the desert.
dialogue_jp: コルネオめ　砂漠で干からびればいいんだ

dialogue_en: I've been going over the documents Mom and Dad left behind. It's a lot to wrap my head around.
dialogue_jp:
父さんと母さんが残してくれた資料を
あらためて読んでるけど　すごい情報量だよ

dialogue_en: Seems Sam's people've got plenty to teach me about environmental conservation work.
dialogue_jp:
今度　サムズデリバリーの環境部門で
勉強できることになったんだ

dialogue_en: How're the races treatin' ya?
dialogue_jp: チョコボレースの調子はどう？

dialogue_en: Huh? Somethin' going on?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　なんか始まったぞ？

dialogue_en: It's no surprise the Ultimate Party Animal is also a Dancing King.
dialogue_jp:
さすがは究極の遊び人
踊りもうまいね

dialogue_en: Isn't that guy the game whiz everyone's been talking about?
dialogue_jp:
あのスーツの男
噂のゲームマスターだろ？

dialogue_en: Hey! That's the Ultimate Party Animal!
dialogue_jp: あれって　遊び人の神羅課長だろ

dialogue_en: I wonder if he'd be willing to take me under his wing!
dialogue_jp: 遊び人の弟子にしてもらえないかな

dialogue_en: Whoa! What's the occasion?
dialogue_jp: なになに　なんのイベント？

dialogue_en: No idea. He just started dancing.
dialogue_jp: わかんない　突然踊りだしたの

dialogue_en: That guy is the same one who conquered all the Saucer's attractions, right?
dialogue_jp:
あのスーツの人って
ゴールドソーサーを制覇した人でしょ

dialogue_en: He's just a middle manager or something, so how'd he get so good at games?
dialogue_jp:
あの人　神羅課長だよね
ゲームの達人の！

dialogue_en: Wait─which one's the party animal?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　究極の遊び人ってどのひと？

dialogue_en: What a coincidence meeting you here! Taking some time off to "max and relax"?
dialogue_jp:
おお　君たち！
奇遇ですね　観光ですか～？

dialogue_en: You're that Shinra paper pusher.
dialogue_jp: あんたは　神羅の……

dialogue_en: You know it!
dialogue_jp: イエーイ！

dialogue_en: So...you're into dancing?
dialogue_jp: ここで　踊ってるのか

dialogue_en: There's nothing more freeing!
dialogue_jp: はい　そのとおり！

dialogue_en: After years of slaving away for the company, this white-collar worker has finally learned how to let loose and have fun!
dialogue_jp:
長年会社に身を捧げていた　いち会社員が
ホンモノの遊びに目覚めたってところです

dialogue_en: After I put in for a leave of absence...
dialogue_jp: コスタの始末書を提出したあと

dialogue_en: I bid farewell to Costa del Sol and made my way to this golden paradise of delights!
dialogue_jp:
なにもかもが嫌になったあたしは
休暇を取って　この楽園へ辿り着いたんです～！

dialogue_en: I've been trying out all the attractions to help clear my mind...
dialogue_jp: これまでの鬱憤を晴らすべく　遊び回っていたら

dialogue_en: and before I knew it, I'd somehow racked up more high scores than I could count! Can you believe it?
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサー中のアトラクションで
最高スコアを　叩きだしてしまいましてね

dialogue_en: Now everyone's calling me the "Ultimate Party Animal." That's certainly not a title I ever imagined earning.
dialogue_jp:
いまでは『究極の遊び人』なんて呼ばれてます
いやはや　お恥ずかしい

dialogue_en: Speaking of!
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうそう

dialogue_en: There's a campaign called the "Ultimate Party Animal Challenge" that's scheduled to start quite soon!
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど『究極の遊び人からの挑戦状』という
イベントが始まるんですよ

dialogue_en: The goal is to try and beat the high scores yours truly set on all the attractions.
dialogue_jp:
あたしが　各アトラクションで記録したスコアに
みなさんで挑んでもらうんです

dialogue_en: Part of the reason we're dancing here now is to advertise the event.
dialogue_jp: このダンスは　イベントの宣伝も兼ねてましてね

dialogue_en: You're more than welcome to get in on the fun.
dialogue_jp: よかったら　参加してみてください

dialogue_en: I've got high hopes for you! So don't let me down!
dialogue_jp: それでは　挑戦お待ちしてますよ～！

dialogue_en: Sounds like they're holding an event!
dialogue_jp: なんか　イベントが始まるんだって？

dialogue_en: It's the Ultimate Party Animal Challenge!
dialogue_jp: 究極の遊び人から　挑戦状だってよ

dialogue_en: I might stand a chance in that G-Bike game, at least.
dialogue_jp: 俺　Ｇバイクならイケると思うんだよな

dialogue_en: So it's a competition? Maybe I should see if I've got what it takes to claim his title.
dialogue_jp:
挑戦状か　俺も
究極の遊び人を目指してみるかな

dialogue_en: Wish I could've worked up the courage to ask to be his apprentice before he left.
dialogue_jp:
弟子にしてくださいって
勇気を出して言えばよかった

dialogue_en: Wait, where'd that guy go? He leave?
dialogue_jp:
あれ　神羅課長は？
帰っちゃった？

dialogue_en: I bet I could take him in Queen's Blood at least. I'm actually pretty good.
dialogue_jp:
実は　クイーンズ・ブラッドだけは
自信あるんだよね

dialogue_en: Aw man, he left! I was hoping to get his autograph.
dialogue_jp:
あ～　行っちゃった
サイン欲しかったのに

dialogue_en: There's no way I could ever beat his high scores.
dialogue_jp: 遊び人のスコアに勝てるわけないじゃん

dialogue_en: I think I'm gonna go for it!
dialogue_jp: あたしも　挑戦してみようかな

dialogue_en: I knew you'd answer the call!
dialogue_jp: お待ちしておりました！

dialogue_en: Without further ado, let's see if you can top the high scores set by the living legend─me! The Ultimate Party Animal!
dialogue_jp:
さて　究極の遊び人が叩きだしたスコアを
打ち破ることができるか　レッツ・トラ～イ！

dialogue_en: Oho. Ready to take me on?
dialogue_jp: おっ　挑戦されますか～？

dialogue_en: I'll teach you not to underestimate the hidden talents of a middle manager!
dialogue_jp: 中間管理職の本気ってヤツを　見せてあげますよ

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>Galactic Saviors</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【シューティングコースター】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: There he is!
dialogue_jp: 来ましたね～！

dialogue_en: But does he have what it takes to overcome the series of battles designed by the Ultimate Party Animal!?
dialogue_jp:
では早速　あたしが企画したバトルコースに
挑戦してもらいましょうか

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>Musclehead Colosseum</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【マッスルコロシアム】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Heh... Been waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: ふふふ　待ってましたよ

dialogue_en: And now...the ultimate chocobo racing showdown!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　このあたしと
チョコボレースで対決です！

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>chocobo racing</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【チョコボレース】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Welcome one and all!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　みなさん

dialogue_en: Is anyone here bold enough to try and beat my unprecedented high score? Challengers─step forward!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　あたしが叩きだした前人未踏の記録に
挑戦してもらいましょうか！

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>G-Bike</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【Ｇバイク】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: I'll gladly treat anyone to a friendly game of Queen's Blood.
dialogue_jp:
さあ　続いては
クイーンズ・ブラッドで勝負です

dialogue_en: Though I doubt you'll stand a chance against my ultimate deck!
dialogue_jp: あたしの最強カードデッキを　とくとご覧あれ！

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>Queen's Blood</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【クイーンズ・ブラッド】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Congratulations on clearing the first challenge!
dialogue_jp: 第１関門クリア　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: You've taken your first step toward becoming a true party animal.
dialogue_jp:
これで君も　遊び人としての一歩目を
踏み出したわけです

dialogue_en: Keep making the most of your time here at the Gold Saucer, until you too reach my lofty heights!
dialogue_jp:
その調子で　ゴールドソーサーを遊び尽くし
『究極の遊び人』を目指してください！

dialogue_en: Congrats on clearing the second challenge!
dialogue_jp: 第２関門クリア　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: You've now earned the title of "Typical Party Animal."
dialogue_jp: これで　ようやく君も『普通の遊び人』です

dialogue_en: It's just a start, but I'm sure you'll continue to rise through the ranks.
dialogue_jp:
まだまだ　どこにでもいる遊び人だから
おごらないことですよ

dialogue_en: So don't lose that party spirit!
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　頑張ってください

dialogue_en: Congrats on clearing the third challenge!
dialogue_jp: 第３関門クリア　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: I hereby proclaim you a "Renowned Party Animal."
dialogue_jp: いまや君は　『注目の遊び人』です

dialogue_en: The people are starting to stand up and take notice.
dialogue_jp:
まわりの目が変わってきたことに
気がつきませんか？

dialogue_en: But! You still have a long way to go. Don't you dare slow down now─the party must go full speed ahead!
dialogue_jp:
しかし　まだまだ上があります
向上心を忘れずに　挑み続けてください

dialogue_en: Congrats on clearing the fourth challenge!
dialogue_jp: 第４関門クリア　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: I hereby proclaim you an "Enviable Party Animal."
dialogue_jp: 君はもう『羨望の遊び人』です

dialogue_en: Everyone's absolutely mesmerized by your merry-making moves.
dialogue_jp: 君の遊びっぷりに　みんなが魅了されています

dialogue_en: But! You can't get complacent. You must rise ever higher, until you can party in the heavens!
dialogue_jp:
ただ　ここで満足しないことです
更なる高みを目指していきましょう！

dialogue_en: Congratulations on clearing the fifth challenge! Be proud─you're the first contestant to have made it this far.
dialogue_jp:
第５関門クリア　おめでとう！
ここまで登りつめたのは　君が初めてです

dialogue_en:
You alone are a "Magnificent Party Animal"!
Well done!
dialogue_jp: まさに『華麗なる遊び人』　すばらしい！

dialogue_en: However! It is still too early to name you the "ultimate"!
dialogue_jp: しかし　まだ遊びを極めたとは言えません

dialogue_en: And why? Because I hold that title, and there can only be one!
dialogue_jp:
なぜなら　『究極の遊び人』である
あたしがいるから！

dialogue_en: All will be settled in a final match! You and me! In an epic 3D battle! For the honor and the glory and the party!
dialogue_jp:
だから最後に　あたしと
究極の名を賭けて３Ｄバトラーで勝負です！

dialogue_en: Fine by me. You're on.
dialogue_jp: 面白い　やってやろう

dialogue_en: Very well! Then I shall be waiting for you...fellow party animal.
dialogue_jp:
それでは　３Ｄバトラーの前で
お待ちしています

dialogue_en:
Heh... There you are, Cloud.
The Magnificent Party Animal.
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　待ってましたよ
華麗なる遊び人　クラウド

dialogue_en: If you're ready, then let us settle once and for all who is the best of the best! The Gold Saucer's party god!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　どちらがゴールドソーサーで
１番の遊び人か　決めるとしましょうか！

dialogue_en: Take on the UPA's <color=yellow>3D Brawler</color> challenge?
dialogue_jp:
【３Ｄバトラー】
神羅課長に挑戦しますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Shinra creed!
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長

dialogue_en: Yay!
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長

dialogue_en: Woo!
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長

dialogue_en: Haha!
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長

dialogue_en: I was so sure you'd do better than that, but what a shame. Don't give up, though─practice more and try again.
dialogue_jp:
もっとやってくれるかと思ったのに　残念です
修行を積んだら　また挑戦してください

dialogue_en: I'm not called the "Ultimate Party Animal" for nothing. I'll be here if you want a rematch.
dialogue_jp:
これが　究極というものです
再戦なら　いつでもお受けしますよ

dialogue_en: You're getting there, but you haven't truly embraced your party spirit yet. Let loose and have fun!
dialogue_jp:
なかなかの遊びっぷりでした
でも　まだまだ遊び足りませんね

dialogue_en: Come, let us prove once and for all who is most worthy of the title of "ultimate"!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　どちらが究極の名にふさわしいか
決めましょう！

dialogue_en: It's about time we settled this, wouldn't you say?
dialogue_jp: 遊び人の頂点を　決めるとしましょうか

dialogue_en: I'll be here waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: いつでも　お待ちしてますよ

dialogue_en: Let me know when you're ready to par-tay.
dialogue_jp: 準備ができたら　また声をかけてください

dialogue_en: Don't tell me you're chickening out!
dialogue_jp: もしかして　怖気づきました？

dialogue_en: You beat me.
dialogue_jp: 負けました

dialogue_en:
And in so doing, proved that you are
the Ultimate Party Animal.
dialogue_jp:
あなたこそ
『究極の遊び人』を名乗るのにふさわしい

dialogue_en:
Couldn't have asked for a better rival.
Guy like you's wasted on Shinra.
dialogue_jp:
あんたを課長にしておくなんて
神羅は見る目がないな

dialogue_en: You are too kind.
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: How 'bout it?
Check this out!
dialogue_jp: さあ　見てて！

dialogue_en: Alright everyone─it's time to celebrate the coronation of our new Ultimate Party Animal!
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ　みなさん
新たな遊び人の誕生を　盛大に祝いましょう！

dialogue_en: Oh─'scuse me.
dialogue_jp: おっと　失礼

dialogue_en: Hello? Wait─what? Slow down...
dialogue_jp:
どうしました
えっ……ちょっと落ちついて

dialogue_en: Uh-huh... And what did they have to say? ...Oh.
dialogue_jp:
ええ　それで状況は？
なるほど……

dialogue_en: Of course. I'll be there.
dialogue_jp: わかりました　すぐに戻ります

dialogue_en: It seems my vacation is over.
dialogue_jp: どうやら　休暇は終わりのようです

dialogue_en:
I'm needed at the office.
My assistant was in tears, begging me to return.
dialogue_jp:
会社に戻らないと
部下が泣きながら悲鳴をあげてました

dialogue_en: What happened to life as a party animal?
dialogue_jp: 遊び人は　いいのか？

dialogue_en: I've had my fill.
dialogue_jp: もう　いいんです

dialogue_en:
And someone has to stand up for my colleagues─
shield them from all the politics and bureaucracy.
dialogue_jp:
部下たちのまえに立って
上とやりあえるのは　あたしだけですから

dialogue_en: That the Shinra creed?
dialogue_jp: 神羅魂か？

dialogue_en: No. It's the middle manager's creed.
dialogue_jp: いいえ　課長魂です

dialogue_en: Well then, may we meet again.
dialogue_jp: それでは　またどこかで

dialogue_en: Soon.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ！

dialogue_en: And so today's contest begins. A grand melee where friends and foes face off!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　さっそく敵味方入り乱れる
大混戦となっております

dialogue_en: If you ask me, though, Dio's fighters seem less like champions and more like chumps!
dialogue_jp:
それにしてもディオ軍団は
なんとも奇妙なメンバーですね

dialogue_en: Ah, but we shouldn't judge them too quickly!
dialogue_jp: しかし　あなどってはいけません

dialogue_en: Lest we forget, two of their combatants fled Midgar with our very own Corneo Cup!
dialogue_jp:
その中の２名は　我らがコルネオ杯で
優勝をかっさらっていった
カップルなのです！

dialogue_en: Don't remind me! The memory of it still stings! And it's all the more reason the family is itchin' to win this grudge match!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　あれは苦い思い出です
つまり　これはリベンジマーッチ！

dialogue_en: Right you are!
dialogue_jp: そのと～～～り！

dialogue_en: To reclaim our stolen glory, we've lined up a selection of our finest goons─uh, er...
dialogue_jp:
我々はチャンピオンベルトを奪還すべく
選りすぐりのチンピ――失礼

dialogue_en: Finest warriors! A selection of our finest warriors!
dialogue_jp:
『戦士』を
大量投入させていただきました！

dialogue_en: Feel that heat! The Corneo Family's throwin' a barbecue and everyone's invited!
dialogue_jp:
お～っと　コルネオファミリー
絶妙な焼き加減で調理していく！

dialogue_en: Check 'em for grill marks, 'cause Dio's Champions are lookin' a little flame-broiled after that one!
dialogue_jp:
本日は特別サービス
ちょっぴり強火であぶっております！

dialogue_en: The only thing more intense than the fires of that flamethrower is the roar of the crowd calling for more!
dialogue_jp:
火炎放射器の炎に煽られ
会場も　熱気に包まれてまいりました！

dialogue_en: While it's not how I'd take my steak, I'm good with seeing these "champs" served well-done!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ベリーベリーウェルダンに
仕上げていただきましょう！

dialogue_en: Ooh, is that the don's special sauce!? These boys are lookin' to get turnt tonight!
dialogue_jp:
ここで　ドンちゃん印の
スペシャルドリンクの登場だー！

dialogue_en: Oh, it is on now, folks! These dangerous delinquents are doped up on the don's dastardly drink!
dialogue_jp:
出た～　ドンちゃんドリーーーンク
ほひ～ほひ～！

dialogue_en: Will the don's signature brew give his fighters the fire and fury to mount a ferocious comeback!?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　コルネオファミリー
ドリンク剤のパワーで乗り切れるか！

dialogue_en: Don't look now, but they're sippin' on the don's bad stuff! The Corneo Family's lookin' to turn this fight around!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ドンちゃんドリンクを飲み干し
コルネオファミリーが
一発逆転を狙います！

dialogue_en: It seems like this fight is only growing more and more intense by the minute!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　試合はそろそろ
折り返し地点です！

dialogue_en: I can see the murder in our combatant's eyes. This match is about to get a lot more brutal, folks!
dialogue_jp:
互いににらみあう両陣営
そろそろ戦況が大きく動くか？

dialogue_en: This fight isn't over yet! It's still anyone's game!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　後半も
気合いを入れてまいりましょう！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions might be dog-walking the opposition so far, but don't look away, because these pups've still got bite!
dialogue_jp:
ここまではディオ軍団がわずかに有利
ですがこの試合
まだどうなるかわかりません！

dialogue_en: A knock-down-drag-out fight! Neither side's giving an inch!
dialogue_jp: 両者一歩も譲らぬ攻防が続いております

dialogue_en: Dio's Champs can hold their own, that's for sure! It's no surprise that these fugitives were able to outrun the long arm of Shinra!
dialogue_jp:
さすがは神羅の追跡を振りきってきた
逃亡者軍団！
その実力はあなどれません

dialogue_en: We're in the endgame now, folks! And I can't tear my eyes away from these red-hot fisticuffs!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　このラウンドもいよいよ終盤
リングから目が離せません！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are dominating! Is there no one who can put a stop to their hot streak!?
dialogue_jp:
勢いに乗るディオ軍団　もはや
止める手立てはないのでしょうか！

dialogue_en: This match might be approaching its thrilling conclusion!
dialogue_jp: さあ　この試合も遂に決着となるか！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are gettin' ready to bring down the hammer!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
ここぞとばかりに攻め立てます！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champion's just won't let up!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団の猛攻が続きます！

dialogue_en: But it ain't over until the Fat Chocobo warks, people!
dialogue_jp: 最後の瞬間まで勝負はわかりません！

dialogue_en: Faster than the eye can see, these feisty fighters can run rings around the competition!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　目にも止まらぬ速さで
リングを駆けるコルテンダーたち！

dialogue_en: Just tryin' to keep up with 'em on their daily walks was almost impossible!
dialogue_jp:
エサやりや散歩にも
たいへん苦労いたしました

dialogue_en: Little Beauty, Pointy Guy, Lucky Spike... I named my babies with love, but I'll be damned if I know which one's which now!
dialogue_jp:
コル美　コル夫　コル吉……
愛情を込めてつけた名前も
いまだにどれが誰だかサッパリです！

dialogue_en: You really raised 'em all by yourself? I'm standing in the presence of a bona fide cactuar whisperer!
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　調教に苦労されたんですね
ためになるお話　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: So we know their stories, but do we know if they've got a plan to stop Dio's Champions in their tracks?
dialogue_jp:
そんなコルテンダーたちですが
ディオ軍団を勢いに乗らせない
秘策はありますか？

dialogue_en: Oh, they've got a plan! It's called, "How many times can you hit a guy with a thousand needles before he's more cactuar than man!?"
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団を針のむしろに！
あっという間に
人間サボテンダーのできあがり～

dialogue_en: Wall Market-born and bred, these succulents are gonna put 'em on pins and needles─literally!
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケット仕込みの
過激なニードル・パフォーマンスを
お楽しみください！

dialogue_en: Watch out! Those pointy little pricklers're packin' extra heat now!
dialogue_jp:
お～っと　コルテンダー
パワーアップしているのか～？

dialogue_en: You said it! So much heat, it'd make Heidegger blush!
dialogue_jp: まだまだ　ホヒホヒ級ってところだ！

dialogue_en: Oh mama! These mustachioed menaces are fully jacked up and ready to start nailing folks to the walls!
