dialogue_jp:
コルテンダー　攻撃を重ね
遂に最大出力に達したようだ！

dialogue_en: The spiky little terrors must really want to impress the don, 'cause they're about to go all out!
dialogue_jp:
その一撃はもはや
ホヒホヒのホヒホヒホヒホヒ級～！

dialogue_en: This next special match is shaping up to be a wild and rowdy swan song!
dialogue_jp:
本日のスペシャルマッチも
クライマックスを
迎えようとしております！

dialogue_en: But the family's sworn to stick it out till the end for the down-on-his-luck don!
dialogue_jp:
ドンのためにも　我々は
負けるわけにはいきません！

dialogue_en: Chased from his home in Wall Market...
dialogue_jp:
ホームだった
ウォール・マーケットを追い出され

dialogue_en: and with the Neo Wall Market plans in shambles, Corneoland is his last, greatest hope!
dialogue_jp:
ネオ・ウォール・マーケット計画も
頓挫したいま
コルネオランドが頼みの綱！

dialogue_en:
His last chance to escape
his cruel, brideless fate.
dialogue_jp:
ドンは　嫁オーディションの禁断症状に
苦しんでいます！

dialogue_en: We need to wrap this contest up quickly, so we can get this man the sexy babes he so rightly deserves!
dialogue_jp:
一刻もはやくビューティーガールを集め
ドンのお嫁さんを選ばねばなりません！

dialogue_en: Which is why we need to get Corneoland up and running posthaste!
dialogue_jp:
そのためには
コルネオランドが必要不可欠！

dialogue_en: Our family won't let the don down. We will come out on top!
dialogue_jp:
ファミリーは決して
ドンの期待を裏切りません！

dialogue_en: And now we've got tonberries toddling into battle─the weight of our hopes and dreams on their tiny shoulders!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　我々の野望を背負い
トンベリたちが
ゆっくりと前進していきます！

dialogue_en: They're gonna slice and dice Dio's guys to bits, and use those bits to build our family's future!
dialogue_jp:
その包丁で　ファミリーの未来を
切りひらいてくれ！

dialogue_en: Ooh, I felt that from here! That tonberry had one hell of a bone to pick!
dialogue_jp:
ここでトンベリの
うらみ節が炸裂だ～！

dialogue_en: Now that's what I call divine punishment!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団に天罰が下ったのかー！

dialogue_en: It's a red light for Dio's Champions!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団　フリーーーズ！

dialogue_en: So much hate and malice and rancor raining down on those poor saps like a ton of bricks!
dialogue_jp:
積もり積もったトンベリのうらみが
ディオ軍団へと襲いかかります！

dialogue_en: "Doink" goes the chef knife, and down goes the victim!
dialogue_jp: トンベリの包丁がプスッと決まったー！

dialogue_en: That's some deadly kitchenware! The tonberry ain't showin' it, but you know he's lovin' this!
dialogue_jp:
包丁キターーー！
トンベリ　無表情で笑っています

dialogue_en: Ooh, now that's the kind of pain they'll never forget! This green gang is really putting Dio's Champions under the knife!
dialogue_jp:
イタタタタタタ　イタすぎる！
磨きあげた包丁が突き立てられます

dialogue_en: That's whatcha get when you tangle with a tonberry! Take your eyes off 'em for a second, and stab! You're dead!
dialogue_jp:
これぞトンベリの真骨頂
気を抜けば　一瞬で全滅です！

dialogue_en: Yikes! I knew the donberry was one to hold a grudge, but that was overkill!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　ドンベリちゃん
ディオ軍団の横ヤリに大激怒だ～！

dialogue_en: They made the big boy angry, and they ain't gonna like him when he's angry! Better start by mopping up the other tonberries first!
dialogue_jp:
ドンベリちゃんを怒らせてはなりません
ほかのトンベリから
片付けるしかなさそうです！

dialogue_en: They got gysahl greens for brains!? Dio's Champions just won't learn!
dialogue_jp:
お～っと　ディオ軍団
まったく学習しておりません！

dialogue_en: A reckless attack by Dio's Champions─the donberry pays his debts back with interest!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団　ドンベリちゃんを攻めるも
見事に返り討ちにあいます！

dialogue_en: You mess with the ton, you get the don! It's time for a chef knife showdown─and you don't wanna smell what the donberry's cookin'!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　遂にトンベリ界のドン
ドンベリちゃんとの
直接対決となりました！

dialogue_en: The donberry is comin' to avenge his comrades─in the stabby way!
dialogue_jp:
仲間を奪われたうらみを包丁に乗せ
ドンベリちゃんがにじり寄ります！

dialogue_en: And now our grand finale kicks off! The don and Abzu are back, and they're just aching for some sweet revenge!
dialogue_jp:
さて　この因縁の対決
ドンもアプスちゃんもさぞ
復讐心に燃えていることでしょう

dialogue_en: These villains deceived the don, taking advantage of his romantic nature! They ruined his bridal auditions, and we'll never ever forgive 'em!
dialogue_jp:
ドンの純粋無垢な恋心につけ込み
嫁オーディションを台無しにした罪
我々は　決して忘れません！

dialogue_en: How my heart bleeds for the don! Tricked into thinkin' he'd found a partner!
dialogue_jp:
恋した相手にだまされるなんて
なんて　かわいそうなドン！

dialogue_en: Abzu's frothing at the mouth too, no doubt furious about how its owner was treated─the sheer injustice of it all!
dialogue_jp:
主人の受けた仕打ちに　アプスちゃんも
ヨダレをダラダラと垂らして
怒っております！

dialogue_en: The only thing that could help heal the scars of betrayal? A brand-new bride!
dialogue_jp:
心の傷を癒やすには
新たなお嫁さんとの恋しかありません！

dialogue_en: So let's make some noise and cheer the don on as he plays to win the game of love!
dialogue_jp:
みなさま　ドンのラブゲームを
いっしょに応援しましょう！

dialogue_en: It's time for an Abzu ass-whoopin'!
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　ゴクゴクターイム！

dialogue_en: Abzu's juiced up and rarin' to wreck house! Ain't no stoppin' it now, people!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　鼻息荒く興奮するアプスちゃん
もう止められません！

dialogue_en: Abzu's seein' red! I repeat: Abzu's seein' red! If I were Dio's Champions, I'd be runnin' like hell!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん　ギンギンです！
警告　逃げろ逃げろ～

dialogue_en: The don's whipped Abzu into a frenzy─and the audience is close behind!
dialogue_jp:
大興奮のアプスちゃんに
観客席も煽られております！

dialogue_en: Abzu's getting a little tough love from the don, and baby it hurts so good!
dialogue_jp:
これぞ　ドン・コルネオ！
ありったけのラブをアピールだ

dialogue_en: With beauty and grace, they'll smash you in your face!
dialogue_jp:
みなさま
いまがシャッターチャンスで～す！

dialogue_en: Abzu and our beloved don are feelin' fresh and ready to bring down the house!
dialogue_jp:
ドン＆アプスちゃん
おおいに会場を沸かせます！

dialogue_en: Check out those pearly whites as Abzu flashes a smile!
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　実にイイ笑顔です！

dialogue_en: That's more than a love tap, let me tell ya! Honey, Abzu ain't never lettin' you go!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃんの熱烈ハ～グ！
もう　アナタを離さない

dialogue_en: Abzu's got 'em down for the count!
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　強引に押し倒した～！

dialogue_en: The champs are crushed by the weight of love! And now the don can get up close and personal with his potential bride!
dialogue_jp:
重量級の愛に押し潰されるディオ軍団！
ドンも至近距離から
お嫁さんを吟味します

dialogue_en: Abzu's got 'em pinned now! Let's watch and see if they can withstand the weight of all that love!
dialogue_jp:
のしかかるアプスちゃん
さあ　愛の重さに耐えきれるか？

dialogue_en: Is there a doctor in the house!? Abzu ain't lookin' so hot!
dialogue_jp:
おっと　アプスちゃん
動きが鈍ってきたか？

dialogue_en: Oh, dear! Oh, damn! Oh, man! Abzu's lookin' abzu-lutely gassed out!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん
疲労が　蓄積しているようです！

dialogue_en: Hey, Abzu! You doin' all right down there, little guy!?
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん
疲れが出てきたのでしょうか？

dialogue_en: Oh no, Abzu! You runnin' outta steam!?
dialogue_jp:
あら～　アプスちゃん
息切れ気味か～？

dialogue_en: Abzu's down! I repeat, Abzu is down!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　アプスちゃん
へたりこんでしまった～！

dialogue_en: Abzu's in for a world of hurt now─but where does that leave the don? Up a creek without a paddle!?
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん　大ピーンチ！
こうなってはドンもフォローできません

dialogue_en: Abzu is down! He's at the mercy of Dio's Champions, and they look like they're fresh out!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん　ダウーーーン！
ディオ軍団のなすがままだ～～～！

dialogue_en: The bigger they are, the harder they fall! The question is: can Abzu get back up again!?
dialogue_jp:
大きくよろけるアプスちゃん
立ち上がることはできるのか～？

dialogue_en: Ooh, that's hot! Looks like Abzu flambé is on the menu tonight!
dialogue_jp:
アツイ！
熱すぎる展開となってまいりました

dialogue_en: Abzu's on fire! Let's hope the don doesn't go up in smoke with 'em!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん大炎上！
ドンの安否も気に掛かります

dialogue_en: Yikes! The don takes a faceful of fire!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　流れ弾が
ドンに当たってしまった～！

dialogue_en: The don's burning up! I didn't have that one on my bingo card!
dialogue_jp:
燃えあがるドン！
この展開を　誰が予想したでしょうか

dialogue_en: Thought things were wild before? Just wait! This romantic audition is about to enter phase two!
dialogue_jp:
ますますヒートアップしてまいりました
公開嫁オーディション後半戦！

dialogue_en: It seems the don can't choose who he'll be taking for his weekend wife!
dialogue_jp:
ドンもまだ　誰をお嫁さんにするか
決めかねている様子ですねえ

dialogue_en: When the dust has settled, who will be the new lucky lady of Corneoland?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　今宵
お嫁さんの座を射止めるのは誰なのか

dialogue_en: Let's watch and see who he picks!
dialogue_jp:
ここからのドンの動きに
注目しましょう！

dialogue_en: Looks like Abzu's about to go on a rampage!
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　プンスカしてる～！

dialogue_en: Abzu's had it up to here with this abuse, and the don's hangin' on for dear life!
dialogue_jp:
暴れ狂うアプスちゃん
ドンもつかまっているのがやっとです！

dialogue_en: Abzu's totally lost control! It was mean before, but now it's looking positively savage!
dialogue_jp:
はげしく怒り狂うアプスちゃん
完全に　冷静さを失っています！

dialogue_en: Abzu's going absolutely apeshit, and our dear Don Corneo's struggling to ride out the storm!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん
ドンを振り落とす勢いで暴れまわる～！

dialogue_en: And with that concussion, the don is out of commission!
dialogue_jp: ドンの意識が飛んでいってしまったー！

dialogue_en: Don! Hey, Don! Don! Are you still with us!?
dialogue_jp:
ドン　ド～～～ン！
聞こえてますか？

dialogue_en: The don might've been knocked out, but he hasn't been thrown off! Now that's skill!
dialogue_jp:
ドン　意識が落ちようとも
アプスちゃんからは決して落ちません！

dialogue_en: Hell hath no fury like a pissed-off Abzu without a conscious don to rein it in!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん　ドンが気を失おうと
お構いなしの大暴れです！

dialogue_en: I was holdin' my breath for a second there, but it looks like the don and Abzu are back in action!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ここで一旦リセット
ドン＆アプスちゃんが態勢を整えます

dialogue_en: Looks like Abzu's got its head screwed back on!
dialogue_jp:
アプスちゃん
落ち着きを取り戻したようです

dialogue_en: Oh mercy! A positively teeth-rattling, earth-shattering mega quake!
dialogue_jp:
会場を揺るがすほどの
大・激・震～～～！

dialogue_en: Now that's what I call a violent emotional outburst.
dialogue_jp: アプスちゃん　熱い想いをぶつけます！

dialogue_en: Elena! You ready?
dialogue_jp: イリーナ　いけるな？

dialogue_en: It's showtime.
dialogue_jp: 派手にいくぞ

dialogue_en:
Hmph...
Let's give the people what they want.
dialogue_jp: ふん　盛りあげるぞ

dialogue_en: Okay! Let's do this!
dialogue_jp: 先輩　やっちゃいましょう！

dialogue_en: Rude─you're up!
dialogue_jp: 先輩　出番です！

dialogue_en: You ready? Let's crush 'em!
dialogue_jp: ルード　いくぜえ～！

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: おお……お？

dialogue_en: Elena, stay with me!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ　合わせろ

dialogue_en: Then you'd better not fall behind!
dialogue_jp: 先輩　遅れないで！

dialogue_en: Ready? I'm goin' in.
dialogue_jp: 先輩　キメますよ

dialogue_en: Let 'em have it.
dialogue_jp: もちろんだ

dialogue_en: Let's serve up some payback.
dialogue_jp: いろいろと　リベンジだ

dialogue_en: And you're all gonna get a taste!
dialogue_jp: まとめて返すぞ　っと

dialogue_en: You cross the Turks...
dialogue_jp: タークスの本気！

dialogue_en: You get crushed.
dialogue_jp: 見せてやる

dialogue_en: Thought you wanted payback.
dialogue_jp: リベンジはどうした？

dialogue_en: All style and no substance.
dialogue_jp: かっこ悪いぞ　と

dialogue_en: You two wanna try that one again?
dialogue_jp: タークス……弱いな

dialogue_en: Nice try.
dialogue_jp: 打たせない！

dialogue_en: That it?
dialogue_jp: 負けないよ！

dialogue_en: Ya like that?
dialogue_jp: ふふっ　どう？

dialogue_en: Let's play nice, shall we?
dialogue_jp: 暴力　はんたい！

dialogue_en: Oops! My bad.
dialogue_jp: 邪魔　しちゃった？

dialogue_en: Can't let you two steal the show!
dialogue_jp: もっと　盛りあげなきゃ！

dialogue_en: Alright.
dialogue_jp: まだまだ！

dialogue_en: Hmph... This is getting interesting.
dialogue_jp: ふん　楽しくなってきた

dialogue_en: Hmph...
dialogue_jp: チッ……！

dialogue_en: Seriously?
dialogue_jp: ずっこけー！

dialogue_en: Oh, I'm just warmin' up!
dialogue_jp: リベンジするから！

dialogue_en: Screw you!
dialogue_jp: 最っ低！

dialogue_en: Elena! On me!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ　決めるぞ！

dialogue_en: I'm ready. Are you?
dialogue_jp: イリーナ　いけるな？

dialogue_en: Just like we did in training!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ　やるぞ

dialogue_en: Roger!
dialogue_jp: 了解！

dialogue_en: Okay!
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: Copy!
dialogue_jp: いきます！

dialogue_en: Not too bad.
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: Very nice.
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: Good job.
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: Don't!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Mess with!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: The Turks!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Rude!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: They'll pay!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: I've got you!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: You good?
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: Hold on.
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: I got you.
dialogue_jp: ルード

dialogue_en: No...
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Try to keep up.
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Let's go, let's go!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: No time to waste.
dialogue_jp: イリーナ

dialogue_en: Meet Kamui─my new gift to myself.
dialogue_jp: 打突特化型銃器『神威』だ

dialogue_en: Scary.
dialogue_jp: 軽いな

dialogue_en:
Oh, please.
Don't act like you're not impressed.
dialogue_jp: 強がるなよ　元ソルジャー

dialogue_en: Really, though, it's past time I muzzled you.
dialogue_jp: さあ　首輪をはめてやる

dialogue_en: Good luck.
dialogue_jp: やってみろ

dialogue_en: All bark...and still no bite!
dialogue_jp: 吠えていられるのも　いまのうちだ

dialogue_en: D─enough!
dialogue_jp: Ｄ　バック！

dialogue_en: A devastating blow! Cloud's bringin' the pain!
dialogue_jp: 渾身の一撃を叩き込むクラウド選手！

dialogue_en: Cloud isn't wasting any time at all!
dialogue_jp: ここで　クラウド選手が決めたー！

dialogue_en: Hot damn! Cloud is on a roll!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　勢いに乗っています！

dialogue_en: Ooh, mama! Look at Cloud go!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　ノリノリだ～！

dialogue_en: Can you feel that!? Cloud is landing some real earthshakers today!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手の
強烈な一撃が襲いかかる！

dialogue_en: It's one withering assault after another from Cloud!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
果敢に攻め込みます！

dialogue_en: Cloud's out here showing everyone just what a SOLDIER can do!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
ソルジャーの技を見せます！

dialogue_en: Be still my beating heart! This SOLDIER's got style to spare!
dialogue_jp:
ヒュ～
クラウド選手　かっこいい～！

dialogue_en: Barret's gunning to bring down the house, ladies and gents!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手の
ヘビーな一撃が決まった～！

dialogue_en: We're witnessing a Barret beatdown here, folks! No mercy!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手
一撃一撃が容赦ありません！

dialogue_en: Barret's really puttin' the pressure on 'em now, people!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　気合いで押していく！

dialogue_en: Like a raging storm, Barret's peltin' 'em with pain!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手
怒濤の攻めを見せております！

dialogue_en: Get a load of Tifa, punchin' up a storm!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手の鉄拳が炸裂！

dialogue_en: Blow after blow, Tifa just will not quit!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　攻撃の手を緩めません！

dialogue_en: Tifa's lining 'em up and knockin' 'em down─with authority!
dialogue_jp: さあ　ティファ選手の猛攻が続きます！

dialogue_en: Tifa hits like a freight train, and there's no escaping her fury!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
確実に獲物を追い詰めていく！

dialogue_en: Aerith is keeping her team's dreams alive, folks!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
見事なサポートを見せます！

dialogue_en: Aerith clearly knows a thing or two about teamwork!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
すかさず仲間をフォローする！

dialogue_en: Aerith must have strong shoulders, 'cause she's carrying the team!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手がチームを支えます！

dialogue_en: Aerith's always there to keep her team going!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　的確なサポートです！

dialogue_en: Red's maulin' his prey with razor-sharp claws!
dialogue_jp: レッド選手の爪が獲物へと食い込む！

dialogue_en: Red's unleashed the beast! Watch out!
dialogue_jp: レッド選手の痛烈な一撃！

dialogue_en: Clearly "mercy" is not a word in Red's prodigious vocabulary!
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手
容赦なく獲物を屠っていく！

dialogue_en: Once Red sets his sights on his prey, there's no escape!
dialogue_jp:
わお　レッド選手の牙が
獲物に襲いかかる！

dialogue_en: Ladies and gentlemen! This wunderkind warrior is a whirlwind of devastation!
dialogue_jp:
おお～　ユフィ選手
ここぞとばかりに大暴れだ～！

dialogue_en: Here comes Yuffie, the fearless flurry of fury!
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ選手
恐れを知らぬ猛攻を見せます！

dialogue_en: Blink and you'll miss her, 'cause this ninja can get inside and pour it on in a flash!
dialogue_jp:
ヒュ～
ユフィ選手　軽やかに攻め込みます！

dialogue_en: Yuffie's showing off some explosive moves!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ選手　爆発力を見せつけます！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith is proving that when you mess with the kitty, you get the claws!
dialogue_jp:
ニャンと　ケット・シー選手
渾身のネコパーンチ！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith might be tiny, but he packs a wallop!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
その一撃はホンモノです！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith's got the zoomies, and his foes are gettin' the doom-ies!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
ニャニャーンと襲いかかります！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith's dishin' out hits that'll leave their ears ringin'!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手の
強烈なツッコミが入ったー！

dialogue_en: Ouch, folks! That one hit 'em where it hurts!
dialogue_jp: お～っと　これは効いているようだ！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are focused on their targets' soft spots! It's bull's-eye after bull's-eye!
dialogue_jp:
相手の弱みにつけ込むディオ軍団！
一撃一撃が　ぬかりありません

dialogue_en: They know how to hit 'em! There's no hiding your weaknesses from the champs!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
相手の弱点にジャストミート！

dialogue_en: Team Dio hittin' the enemy's weak point with precision!
dialogue_jp:
相手の弱みを的確に突いていく
ディオ軍団！

dialogue_en: Clever of them to capitalize on their foe's weakness!
dialogue_jp: ナイスヒット　これは計算の上だね

dialogue_en: My champions are playing it smart, hitting their opponent where they're most vulnerable.
dialogue_jp:
相手の弱点を見抜き　攻める
実にスマートな戦い方だ

dialogue_en: Didja feel that one, folks? 'Cause it doesn't look like they did!
dialogue_jp:
う～ん……
これはイマイチ効いていないようです

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are struggling to come up with the right plan of attack!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団　まだ攻め口を
決めかねているのでしょうか？

dialogue_en: If this is Team Dio's strategy, then it's a bad one!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
思うようにダメージが入りません！

dialogue_en: It looks like Dio's Champions might have made a tactical error there!
dialogue_jp:
おっと　ディオ軍団
これは作戦を見誤ったか？

dialogue_en: Well that didn't make much of an impact...
dialogue_jp: いまのは　あまり効いてないようだね

dialogue_en: Hmm... I think my champions oughta spend more time studying their opponents.
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　もうすこし相手の性質を
見極める必要がありそうだね

dialogue_en: That stopped 'em dead in their tracks! Dio's Champions said "fool around and find out"─and their foes are about to find out!
dialogue_jp:
渾身の一撃を阻止したディオ軍団
さあ攻守交代　一気に攻めかかる～！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions shut that one down! Now it's payback time!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団　相手の攻撃を防ぎ
チャンスを作り出しました！

dialogue_en: They saw that attack coming a mile away and gave it a big fat "nope"! And now the champs are poised to turn the tables!
dialogue_jp:
迫りくる危機を
全力で回避するディオ軍団
ピンチをチャンスに変えていく！

dialogue_en: The shoe isn't just on the other foot, it's on a whole different person now! Let's see how Dio's Champions capitalize on this!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　まさかの形勢逆転！
ディオ軍団　この隙を見逃しません

dialogue_en: An impressive play from a team in perfect sync!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
息の合った連携を見せます！

dialogue_en: Spectacular! Dio's Champions prove that teamwork makes the dream work!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ディオ軍団
力を合わせて立ち向かう！

dialogue_en: Their team-building exercises must've paid off!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
さすがのチームワークです！

dialogue_en: With coordination like that, they are gonna run away with this fight!
dialogue_jp:
絶妙なコンビネーションで
翻弄する　ディオ軍団！

dialogue_en: Few teams are as tightly knit as my champions!
dialogue_jp: この団結力こそが　彼らの魅力だね

dialogue_en: Ahh... There's nothing more beautiful than the power of friendship!
dialogue_jp:
この世で最も美しいもの……
それは友情だ！

dialogue_en: Solid teamwork by Cloud and Barret, standing tall in the face of their foes!
dialogue_jp:
猛然と敵に立ち向かう
クラウド＆バレーーーット！

dialogue_en: Their battle-forged bonds are unbreakable!
dialogue_jp:
ピカイチのパートナーっぷりを
見せつけます！

dialogue_en: Cloud is crushing it with Tifa at his side─a combo sure to make many in our audience jealous!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド＆ティファ
会場のファンが嫉妬するほどの一体感！

dialogue_en: Friends since childhood, and a force to be reckoned with as adults!
dialogue_jp:
幼なじみの仲の良さを
これでもかと見せつける！

dialogue_en: A breathtaking display of might and magic from Cloud and Aerith!
dialogue_jp:
阿吽の呼吸を見せる
クラウド＆エアリーーース！

dialogue_en: These two are in perfect sync─mind, body, and soul!
dialogue_jp:
このコンビネーションこそが
ふたりの絆の証です！

dialogue_en: Cloud and Red defy the laws of nature and join forces for a ferocious combo!
dialogue_jp:
種族の枠を超え
共闘するクラウド＆レッドペア！

dialogue_en: Is there anything more endearing than man fighting alongside his best friend!?
dialogue_jp: ケモノとヒトの絶妙な連携を見せます！

dialogue_en: Cloud and Yuffie performed that maneuver so perfectly, you'd think they were communicating telepathically the whole time!
dialogue_jp:
まさに以心伝心
クラウド＆ユフィの連携が
見事に決まったー！

dialogue_en: Maybe it's a mindmeld, maybe it's materia!
dialogue_jp: マテリアの元に　心はひとつです！

dialogue_en: A powerful one-two punch from Cloud and his plush pal, Cait Sith!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド＆ケット・シーが
見事な掛けあいを見せる！

dialogue_en: An odd couple for sure, but strange combinations often make for the best surprises!
dialogue_jp:
ボケとツッコミのハーモニー
信頼関係あってこそ　ハマります！

dialogue_en: With a mighty swing of his enormous blade, Cloud cuts his opponent down to size!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手の必殺技が決まったー！
これは強烈～

dialogue_en: Talk about a stunning display of swordsmanship! Cloud has once again proven that he's a cut above all the competition!
dialogue_jp:
全身全霊をかけた一撃がヒーット！
クラウド選手
格の違いを見せつけます！

dialogue_en: Woo! Yowza! Is it hot in here, or is it just Barret!? He's packing heat tonight, and his opponent's starting to sweat!
dialogue_jp:
出た　バレット選手の超火力
ド迫力に会場もヒートアーーップ！

dialogue_en: Barret's going full throttle out there, folks! He's breaking all the rules─and dangerously close to burning this mother down!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手　限界突破のフル出力！
危うく会場ごと消し飛ぶところでした

dialogue_en: Tifa's a living, breathing weapon, folks! Those muscles aren't just for show─this fighter packs a hell of a punch!
dialogue_jp:
まさに全身兵器
鍛えあげられた肉体から放たれる
昇天の一撃～！

dialogue_en: A dazzling display of physicality! Tifa lands a mighty blow for massive damage!
dialogue_jp:
あまりにも刺激的
ティファ選手渾身の一撃がヒット！

dialogue_en: Whew... Well, I'm feeling refreshed─and it looks like Aerith's team is too!
dialogue_jp:
すう～はあ～
エアリス選手の優しさが
広がっていきます！

dialogue_en: A wave of calm washes over the arena, quelling the unrest within our hearts. Will this give Aerith's team a second wind?
dialogue_jp:
会場を包み込む安らぎのウェ～～～ブ！
荒んだ心も　癒やされていくようだ～

dialogue_en: Aerith may have kept her anger bottled up before, but she's letting it all out now, folks!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
溜まりに溜まった怒りが遂に爆発だ～！

dialogue_en: Aerith is angry, ladies and gentlemen, and she's really letting the opposition have it!
dialogue_jp:
これは痛烈　エアリス選手
ぷんぷんプッツンです！

dialogue_en: Red lets out an epic roar! It won't be long before his foes are howling too─in pain!
dialogue_jp:
響き渡るレッド選手の咆哮
勇ましい一声に奮い立ちます！

dialogue_en: Red manages to keep a cool head even in the heat of battle. That unwavering focus should serve him well out there today!
dialogue_jp:
怒れども冷静さを見失わないレッド選手
底知れぬ精神力を見せつけます！

dialogue_en: Red heeds the call of the wild, unleashing a killer onslaught and embracing the beast within!
dialogue_jp:
爆発する野性の本能
レッド選手の牙が遂に本性を現した！

dialogue_en: His fangs are sharpened and his claws are out! Red puts those hunter instincts to use as he pounces on his prey!
dialogue_jp:
研ぎ澄まされた爪から繰り出される
強烈な一撃　レッド選手
獲物を仕留めに掛かります！

dialogue_en: Yuffie has come through with a clutch assist! I'd say she's earned herself a materia or two with that play!
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ選手が仲間をサポート
マテリアをねだる気マンマンの顔だ～！

dialogue_en: An excellent assist from Yuffie! Wonder how many orbs of materia she's gonna charge 'em for that one!
dialogue_jp:
見事なフォローをみせるユフィ選手！
仲間と言えども
これは高く付きそうです

dialogue_en: All eyes are on Yuffie─or they would be if she weren't too quick to follow! She's bouncing off the walls!
dialogue_jp:
暴れまわるウータイの跳ねっかえり娘
これはもう手がつけられません！

dialogue_en: Yuffie unleashes an explosive attack, proving she's still got plenty of tricks up her sleeve!
dialogue_jp:
炸裂するシノビの奥義
忍びないほどのえげつなさだ～！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith goes all in for his team, and according to the fortune he's told, the champions' future is looking bright!
dialogue_jp:
一か八かの賭けに出るケット・シー選手
今日の運勢はすこぶる良好だ～！

dialogue_en: Luck be a kitty tonight! Good things are in store for Cait Sith and his fellow champions!
dialogue_jp:
当たるも当たらぬもケット・シー
招福万来　幸運を呼び込みます！

dialogue_en: Don't need luck when you've got skill─and Cait Sith's got it in spades!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
運を天にまかせた一撃がヒーット！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith is bringing the good meow-jo, but will it carry his team to victory in today's match!?
dialogue_jp:
幸運をたぐり寄せたケット・シー選手
このまま勝機もつかめるか！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are shakin' things up by calling for divine intervention!
dialogue_jp:
リングを揺るがし現れたのは
伝説の召喚獣だ～！

dialogue_en: If you thought the action was heated, you ain't seen nothin' yet!
dialogue_jp:
はたして
どんな猛攻を見せてくれるのか！

dialogue_en: Talk about making an entrance! This fight has become a legendary affair!
dialogue_jp:
ド派手な登場を決めたのは
伝説の召喚獣だ～！

dialogue_en: With the divine on their side, will the Champions take the win!?
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
最強の助っ人を迎え入れました！

dialogue_en: Summon up some courage, because we've got a legendary summon on the battlefield!
dialogue_jp:
決闘の地に
伝説の召喚獣が降り立ちました！

dialogue_en: Bust out your opera glasses, folks─we're about to see one hell of a show!
dialogue_jp: ここで脅威の破壊力を見せつけるのか！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions have called forth legendary backup! Bear witness now to the awesome might of this mythic entity!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団に最強の助っ人が乱入だ
召喚獣の勇姿を目に焼きつけましょう！

dialogue_en: What's this!? Dio's Champions have thrown one hell of a curveball!
dialogue_jp:
おっと　ここで隠し球が
満を持しての登場だ～！

dialogue_en: How will the little guy fare in battle? Let's find out!
dialogue_jp:
どんな活躍を見せてくれるのか
見守りましょう！

dialogue_en: Get a load of the champions' adorable little helper! I hope they don't get trampled underfoot!
dialogue_jp:
なんと　可愛らしい助っ人の登場だ～
大丈夫か～？　がんばれ～！

dialogue_en: Our fighters have brought in a friend to shake things up!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団　召喚獣の投入です！

dialogue_en: It might not look it, but that summon knows how to tear shit up!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　存分に
暴れまわっていただきましょう！

dialogue_en: Whoa! A summon has joined the melee!
dialogue_jp: んん？　あれは召喚獣でしょうか

dialogue_en: We can expect big things from that cute little helper!
dialogue_jp:
可愛らしい助っ人の活躍に
期待しましょう！

dialogue_en: Ouch! Dio's Champions are gonna be feeling that one in the morning!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団　これは大打撃です！

dialogue_en: The forecast calls for pain, and the Champions are taking it!
dialogue_jp: 過激な一撃がディオ軍団にヒーット！

dialogue_en: A devastating attack that left Dio's Champions reeling! But I've got a hunch that they aren't gonna take it lying down!
dialogue_jp:
炸裂する　強烈な一撃！
さすがのディオ軍団も
タダでは済みません

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions were positively brutalized by that hit!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団を襲う激しい攻撃～！

dialogue_en: Cloud's looking hurt after that one! Can he bounce back?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
これは効いているようだ！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! Guess that SOLDIER never learned how to dodge!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと
クラウド選手　避けきれない！

dialogue_en: Cloud's gotta have one foot in the lifestream after taking a hit like that!
dialogue_jp:
さすがのクラウド選手も
これは厳しい～！

dialogue_en: Cloud's gonna need a lotta potions after that one!
dialogue_jp: クラウド選手　大ダメージです！

dialogue_en: Barret's taking a beating out there! Can he power through!?
dialogue_jp:
手痛い一撃をもらってしまった
バレット選手！

dialogue_en: Things are not looking good for Barret, ladies and gentlemen!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　これは厳しい状況です！

dialogue_en: Barret's tough, but I dunno if he can take many more hits like that!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手
ギリギリで持ちこたえたか？

dialogue_en: Barret's gotta be in a tight spot after that punishment!
dialogue_jp: さあ　追い詰められるバレット選手！

dialogue_en: Tifa doesn't look too happy about that one, folks!
dialogue_jp: 苦しげな表情を見せるティファ選手！

dialogue_en: Sounds like the crowd's on Tifa's side today, but the odds are overwhelmingly stacked against them!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手への強烈な一撃に
会場からブーイングが降り注ぐ～！

dialogue_en: Tifa might struggle to come back from that one!
dialogue_jp: ティファ選手　これは大打撃です！

dialogue_en: Ooh! Walk it off, Tifa. Walk it off!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
このダメージは無視できない！

dialogue_en: Aerith is looking a lot worse for wear after that one!
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　すこし苦しい状況か？

dialogue_en: Aerith might be trying to brush off that last hit, but her fans aren't letting it slide!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手への容赦ない攻撃
これは会場のファンが黙っていません！

dialogue_en: Oof! Aerith is in deep trouble after that brutal beatdown!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　これはピンチか
エアリス選手！

dialogue_en: Ouch! Aerith can be quick on her feet, but she wasn't quick enough!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
ここは避けきれなかった～！

dialogue_en: Oooh, Red took that hit right on the snout!
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手
これはまともに食らってしまった！

dialogue_en: Can't let your guard down against the Corneo crew!
dialogue_jp: わずかな油断を突かれたレッド選手！

dialogue_en: I'll bet Red's regretting that moment of carelessness!
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手
一瞬の油断が悔やまれます！

dialogue_en: That looked painful! Let's see if Red can hang in there!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　レッド選手
ここは持ちこたえられるか！

dialogue_en: Yuffie gets caught daydreaming─about materia, no doubt!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ選手　これは油断してたか～？

dialogue_en: Did that knock Yuffie outta the match, or can the ninja bounce back!?
dialogue_jp: ユフィ選手　なかなか厳しい状況です！

dialogue_en: Yuffie's not lookin' so hot after takin' that monster hit!
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ選手
まんまと食らってしまった～！

dialogue_en: Yeowch! The little ninja Yuffie takes a big hit, and it looks like it hurt!
dialogue_jp: あ～っと　ユフィ選手に強烈な一撃！

dialogue_en: Cats may land on their feet, but Cait Sith is stumbling!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
逃げそこねてしまったか～？

dialogue_en: The fam lands a furr-rocious hit on Cait Sith!
dialogue_jp: ケット・シー選手への一撃が決まった！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith might've lost a couple lives after that one!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
これは躱しきれません！

dialogue_en: After a blow like that, Cait Sith's gotta be Cait-Seein' stars!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手
このダメージは大きいか～？

dialogue_en: Say it ain't so! Little Cloud is being forced to take a time-out!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　クラウド選手
これは動けない！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! It's lookin' like Cloud is unwilling─or unable─to put up a fight!
dialogue_jp:
うう～ん
なす術なく固まるクラウド選手！

dialogue_en: Barret looks to be frozen in place!
dialogue_jp: バレット選手　身動きが取れません！

dialogue_en: I'm not sure why, but Barret's stopped dead in his tracks!
dialogue_jp:
お～っと
バレット選手の動きが止まった～！

dialogue_en: Tifa may have muscles, but right now she can't move a single one!
dialogue_jp: うわ～　無防備に固まるティファ選手！

dialogue_en: Hope she didn't have any plans, because it doesn't look like Tifa's going anywhere!
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手
動きを封じられてしまった～！

dialogue_en: Poor Aerith is stuck in place! You hate to see it...
dialogue_jp: エアリス選手　手も足も出せません！

dialogue_en: I've got a sinking feeling Aerith's gonna be out of commission for a while!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手
思うように体を動かせな～い！

dialogue_en: Looks like team Corneo taught this old dog a new trick: play dead!
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手
動きを封じられてしまった～！

dialogue_en: Our furry four-legged friend isn't going anywhere in a hurry, that's for sure!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　レッド選手
自慢の脚も役立たずです！

dialogue_en: Ahaha! Who'd have thought Yuffie would ever stop moving!?
dialogue_jp:
ハハッ　ユフィ選手
見事に固まっております！

dialogue_en: Yuffie's not gonna be lifting so much as a finger for a minute!
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　ユフィ選手
指いっぽん動かせません！

dialogue_en: Oooh, what's the matter, Cait Sith? Cat got your tongue?
dialogue_jp:
お～っと
動きが止まったケット・シー選手！

dialogue_en: Curiosity may not have killed that cat, but it's frozen him in place!
dialogue_jp:
あら～　ケット・シー選手
動けません！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions have been backed into a corner! Can they find a way out!?
dialogue_jp:
苦戦を強いられるディオ軍団
これは　かなり厳しい状況です！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions are down, but not out! Let's see if they have the strength to hang in there!
dialogue_jp:
劣勢に追い込まれたディオ軍団
はたして　立ち直せるのでしょうか？

dialogue_en: Things are looking seriously grim for Dio's Champions right now! I wonder if they've got enough left in the tank to turn this around!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団　苦しい状況が続きます
このまま押し切られてしまうのか～？

dialogue_en: Team Dio's hangin' on by a thread! Can they still grind out a win?
dialogue_jp:
追い詰められたディオ軍団！
なんとか耐えしのげるか

dialogue_en: See that, folks!? That smirk says Rufus has got Cloud right where he wants him. Can the merc make a comeback, or is it too late!?
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　クラウド選手大ピンチ！
ルーファウス選手が
不敵な笑みを浮かべます！

dialogue_en: Cloud's doing his best, but his best just isn't good enough! I'm not sure he's gonna be walking away from this one!
dialogue_jp:
苦しい表情をにじませるクラウド選手
このまま　決着となってしまうのか？

dialogue_en: Would you look at that! Dio's Champions are back on their feet! Now, let's see if they can complete the comeback!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
なんとか体勢を立て直しました！
さあ　ここから逆転なるか

dialogue_en: The champs are looking hale and hearty once more, but can they clinch victory!?
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団　たまらず回復！
これでピンチは脱したか～？

dialogue_en: It's not over yet! Dio's Champions have just clawed their way back into the fight!
dialogue_jp:
かろうじて持ち直したディオ軍団！
しかし　予断は許しません

dialogue_en: And the heals come just in the nick of time for Dio's Champions! It's a moment to recover and regroup!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団
なんとか回復が間にあったようです
さあ　ここから仕切り直したいところ！

dialogue_en: Cloud was nearly done for, but he's back in the fight now─and ready to take his revenge!
dialogue_jp:
ギリギリで持ち直したクラウド選手
さあ　反撃が始まります！

dialogue_en: Cloud's found a second wind, and he might still have a shot at beating his old boss!
dialogue_jp:
急場をしのいだクラウド選手！
ここは　手堅くいきたいところです

dialogue_en: And Cloud goes down! There's no sugarcoating this─his team's in trouble!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　ダウーーーン！
これはまさかの展開だ～！

dialogue_en: And Cloud hits the mat! The doughty lynchpin of team Dio's offense snaps like a fragile little twig! What will they do now!?
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　戦線を離脱～！
ディオ軍団の主力がここで撃沈です

dialogue_en: Barret's down! Did the big man push himself too hard!?
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手　ダウーーーン！
はりきりすぎたのでしょうか～？

dialogue_en: And Barret bites the dust! It's hard to believe, but this could be the end for the ranged ravager of Dio's Champions!
dialogue_jp:
バレット選手　倒れてしまった！
ディオ軍団の主砲もここまでか～

dialogue_en: Tifa is out of commission! If only her team had lent her a helping hand...
dialogue_jp:
ティファ選手　ダウーーーン！
もっと早く助けられなかったのか～！

dialogue_en: Tifa is utterly spent! But it's okay─the martial master has earned her rest!
dialogue_jp:
力尽きるティファ選手
おつかれ　ゆっくり休んでくれ～！

dialogue_en: And poor Aerith goes down! Her teammates must be kicking themselves!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手　ダウーーーン！
こうなる前に手は打てなかったのか～？

dialogue_en: Aerith took one hit too many, and now she's down! Not a great development for Dio's Champions!
dialogue_jp:
崩れ落ちるエアリス選手
ディオ軍団　ピーンチです！

dialogue_en: Red's rolled over and is playing dead! And I've got a feeling he won't be getting back up!
dialogue_jp:
悔しさとともに倒れるレッド選手
自慢の肉球もしぼんでいくようだ！

dialogue_en: The scarlet menace has been brought low! Could it be he needed to bring more fire to this fight?
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手　ダウーーーン！
忍耐強さがあだとなったか～

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! Yuffie has hit the mat! Can she find the strength to stand up and fight!?
dialogue_jp:
あら～
へたりこんでしまったユフィ選手
やる気はまだ残っているのか～？

dialogue_en: Yuffie is outta the action! The little daredevil danced too close to the sun!
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ選手　ダウーーーン！
がむしゃらに攻めすぎたようです

dialogue_en: Cait Sith gets the stuffing knocked out of him! Has our plush pal's luck finally run out!?
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手　ダウーーーン！
こうなっては　ただのぬいぐるみです！

dialogue_en: Cait Sith crumbles! I'm afraid they're gonna be sendin' the kiddies home crying tonight!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手　故障か～？
キッズの夢を壊すなよ～

dialogue_en: Cloud is back on his feet, folks! Let's see if he can finish off his opponent and win the round!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　立ち上がった～！
さあ　ここから反撃です！

dialogue_en: Look out folks, Cloud's back in action! And he's ready and rarin' to make up for lost time!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手が戦線へと復帰！
ここから　挽回したいところです

dialogue_en: Just like that, he's up! Barret's locked and loaded and looking for revenge!
dialogue_jp:
立ち上がるバレット選手
借りは気合いで返してもらいましょう！

dialogue_en: And Barret is back on his feet! The question is: can he maintain momentum in his glorious comeback!?
dialogue_jp:
戦線に復帰するバレット選手
豪快に　戦局をひっくり返せるか！

dialogue_en: Tifa is back in the fight, and the crowd is going wild! Will their cheers give her the strength to come out on top!?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　戦線に戻ったティファ選手
観客席に歓喜の雄叫びがこだまします！

dialogue_en: She got knocked down, but Tifa is up and ready to rock! Now let's see if she can help her team claim victory!
dialogue_jp:
再び立ち上がるティファ選手
勝利への執念を見せつけられるか！

dialogue_en: Aerith is back from the brink! Now let's see how she adjusts her strategy!
dialogue_jp:
エアリス選手が戻ってきました
慎重に攻めていきましょう！

dialogue_en: Her strength returned, Aerith is back in the fight─and the audience breathes a collective sigh of relief!
dialogue_jp:
懸命に立ち上がるエアリス選手！
観客席からも安堵の吐息が漏れます

dialogue_en: Red has clawed his way back into the fight, and the beast is looking feral! This match is about to get wild!
dialogue_jp:
レッド選手が戦線へと復帰！
これ以上人前で無様な姿はさらせません

dialogue_en: Red's back on his paws, standing tall and proud. This ferocious beast looks more than ready to charge back into the fray!
dialogue_jp:
立ち上がり　奮い立つレッド選手
獣の誇りをかけ　再び戦いに挑みます！

dialogue_en: Would you look at that: Yuffie has rejoined the fray! Is she ready to put her materia where her mouth is!?
dialogue_jp:
おっと
なんとか立ち上がったユフィ選手
もう弱音を漏らしてる場合では
ありません！

dialogue_en: The nimble ninja Yuffie comes zipping back into the fight─and that look in her eyes says she's itchin' for some payback!
dialogue_jp:
戦いの場へと戻ってきたユフィ選手
その目は復讐に燃えている～！

dialogue_en: Check it out, Kitty Kidz: Cait Sith is back in action, and he's ready and reowr-ing to go!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手　ふっか～つ！
キッズの声援に応えます

dialogue_en: Cait Sith is proud to prove that cats always land on their feet! But let's see if his future is truly as bright as he hopes!
dialogue_jp:
ケット・シー選手カムバックしました
ゴールドソーサーに
夢と希望を取り戻せるか！

dialogue_en:
Duh-duh-duhhhn
Duh-duh-duhhhn♪
dialogue_jp:
チョン　チョチョン
チョン　チョチョン♪

dialogue_en: Here it is, ladies and gentlemen: the grudge match of the millennium!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　突如として始まりました
リベンジマーッチ！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions barely had time to catch their breath after that last battle, but the man and girl in black are fully rested and hungry for payback!
dialogue_jp:
先ほど激戦を終えたばかりのディオ軍団
vs 黒いスーツに身を包んだ
神羅の特殊部隊　タークス！

dialogue_en: Only one of these teams will leave with the keystone in hand. Who will it be!?
dialogue_jp:
見事勝利をおさめ　キーストーンを
手に入れるのはどっちだ！

dialogue_en: To help us commentate on the proceedings, we've enlisted the aid of Corneoland's soon-to-be ex-owner, Dio!
dialogue_jp:
さて　今回は解説として
ディオ園長にお越しいただいております
よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: A pleasure.
dialogue_jp: よろしく

dialogue_en: Ditto.
dialogue_jp: よろしく

dialogue_en: We thought you'd be well suited to assist, seeing as you have a history with the Turks.
dialogue_jp:
いきなりですが　園長は
タークスとやりあったことがあるとか

dialogue_en: Well, the bald one and I did come to blows...
dialogue_jp:
ああ　スキンヘッドの彼と
すこしばかりね

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: ほう！

dialogue_en: From the moment our tussle began, it was plain that that Turk was not only strong, but strategic.
dialogue_jp:
つかみあった瞬間に　肉体だけでなく
技術も極限まで練りあげられていると
わかったよ

dialogue_en: How so?
dialogue_jp: ははん！

dialogue_en: He knows a range of techniques, and when to use them.
dialogue_jp:
プロフェショナルだけが醸し出せる
オーラが　彼にはあるね

dialogue_en: So are you saying you expect him to clean up in today's grudge match?
dialogue_jp:
ということは　このバトル
どう予想されますか？

dialogue_en: He won't make it easy for my Champions.
dialogue_jp: 難しい試合になるだろうね

dialogue_en: But formidable as he is, we still have the numbers.
dialogue_jp:
私が見込んだバトラーとはいえ
連戦の疲れもある

dialogue_en: It's going to come down to whether or not we can press that advantage. You mark my words.
dialogue_jp:
数の優位性を　うまく活かせるか否か
それがキーになるんじゃないかな？

dialogue_en: Well then, let's see how our combatants fare!
dialogue_jp: な　る　ほ　ど！

dialogue_en: Rude's body is pulsing with a frightening power!
dialogue_jp:
ルード選手の全身に
力がみなぎっていく！

dialogue_en: Rude is channeling his strength and focusing his energies for his next attack!
dialogue_jp: ルード選手　全神経を研ぎ澄まします！

dialogue_en: Rude seems to have something rather special in store.
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　ルード君
気合いが入っているね

dialogue_en: Rude is absolutely ruthless out there!
dialogue_jp: ルード選手の攻撃が決まったー！

dialogue_en: Ouch! Talk about a Rude awakening!
dialogue_jp: ルード選手の痛烈な一撃！

dialogue_en: A punishing blow from Rude showcasing the power of his impressive physique! Dio's Champions are reeling!
dialogue_jp:
屈強な肉体から放たれる容赦ない一撃が
ディオ軍団へと襲いかかる！

dialogue_en: Magnificent! Rude proves once again that Shinra's elite never miss their mark!
dialogue_jp:
さすがは神羅の暗躍部隊
確実に標的を追い詰めていきます！

dialogue_en: As I was saying, Rude is not to be underestimated. The man is a powerhouse!
dialogue_jp:
ぐう～　あの一撃があるから
ルード君は恐ろしいんだよ

dialogue_en: Hats off to Rude for landing a devastating blow.
dialogue_jp: おみごと　ここはルード君が決めたね

dialogue_en: Rude poured his soul into that last attack, and boy did it hurt!
dialogue_jp: ルード選手　渾身の一撃が決まったー！

dialogue_en: Dio's Champions can run, but they can't hide from Rude's explosive power!
dialogue_jp:
逃げることすら許されぬ爆風が
ディオ軍団を襲う！

dialogue_en: My! Such breathtaking strength!
dialogue_jp: ぬおお　なんというパワーだ……！

dialogue_en: Elena is fired up and ready to put the pedal to the metal!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ選手　ここでギアチェーンジ！

dialogue_en: Elena's got an insatiable need for speed!
dialogue_jp: スピードで翻弄するイリーナ選手！

dialogue_en: Young Elena is quick on her feet when circumstances demand!
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　イリーナ君
実にいい走りっぷりだね

dialogue_en: Elena is kickin' ass and takin' names today, folks!
dialogue_jp: さあ　勢いに乗るイリーナ選手！

dialogue_en: She may be petite, but Elena knows how to bring the pain!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ選手　強烈な一撃を放ちます！

dialogue_en: Elena stomps her opponent with style and grace!
dialogue_jp: 華麗に攻撃を決めていくイリーナ選手！

dialogue_en: A direct hit from the one and only Elena!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ選手の攻撃がヒーット！

dialogue_en: Elena seems intent on stealing the show!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ君　なかなか魅せてくれるね

dialogue_en: Oh, Elena landed a telling blow there!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ君のいまの一撃は大きいね

dialogue_en: Elena serves up a knuckle sandwich!
dialogue_jp: イリーナパンチ　決まったー！

dialogue_en: Saw that one comin' from a mile away...but she still landed it!
dialogue_jp: まさかまさかの大当たり～！

dialogue_en: Looks like she caught them napping!
dialogue_jp:
ハッハッー！
見事に決まってしまったね

dialogue_en: Tic-tac-toe, three whammies in a row from Elena!
dialogue_jp:
イリーナ選手の猛打が
一気に追い詰める！

dialogue_en: Elena the huntress spots her prey and strikes true!
dialogue_jp:
イリーナ選手
狙った獲物は逃しません！

dialogue_en: Hmm, it seems she managed to connect this time.
dialogue_jp:
ふ～む　イリーナ君のほうが
上手だったようだね

dialogue_en: Rude's been brought to his knees! Can he get back on his feet!?
dialogue_jp: ルード選手　たまらず崩れ落ちた～！

dialogue_en: Say it ain't so, folks: Rude just went down hard! Can the Turks mount a comeback? Let's find out!
dialogue_jp:
あ～っと　ルード選手ダウーーーン！
タークスペア　苦戦しております

dialogue_en: To have Rude on the ropes is no small feat!
dialogue_jp: あのルード君を崩すとは　やるね

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! Elena's in a bit of a bind here!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ選手　まさかのピーンチ！

dialogue_en: The feisty Elena has been brought to her knees!
dialogue_jp: たまらず膝を折るイリーナ選手！

dialogue_en: Now let's see what Elena is made of!
dialogue_jp: イリーナ君　頑張ってもらいたいね

dialogue_en: Uh-oh, what's this? Our two Turks look like they're getting into position.
dialogue_jp:
おっと　なにやら
不穏な動きを見せるタークスペア！

dialogue_en: Oh, this ought to be good.
dialogue_jp: これは……くるね

dialogue_en: The tension's so thick you could cut it with a knife! The Turks are planning something big, but will it be big enough to turn the tide of this battle!?
dialogue_jp:
会場を包む　ただならぬ緊張感
ここで戦況が大きく動くか？

dialogue_en: The Turks take center stage and prepare to make their next move─but will it lead them to victory!?
dialogue_jp:
リング中央で構えるタークスペア
ここで勝負を決める気でしょうか？

dialogue_en: Check it out: the Turks are readying a real showstopper. Let's see what they've got in store!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　タークスペアが
連携の構えに入りました！

dialogue_en: The Turks have a trick up their sleeves, but what could it be!?
dialogue_jp: 注目　タークスが本気になったようだね

dialogue_en: Oh mercy! That's gonna leave a mark! If I were their opponents, I'd be scrambling to throw in the towel!
dialogue_jp:
すさまじい～～～！
タークスの制裁が戦意ごと奪い去ります

dialogue_en: With a dazzling display of power, Elena and Rude overwhelm their opponents! They've proven that there's no stopping Shinra's finest─no sir!
dialogue_jp:
絶対的な力の差を見せつける
タークスペア！
これこそが神羅カンパニーの底力です

dialogue_en: Kudos to the Turks for pulling off that attack. And thank heavens I wasn't on the receiving end of it!
dialogue_jp:
ブラボー　タークス！
ふう　敵にまわしたくないものだね

dialogue_en: Dio's phone is ringing off the hook! But who's on the other end!?
dialogue_jp:
お～っと　ここで電話だ～！
こっち　そっち　どっち？

dialogue_en: Hm? Hello? Yes, this is he. Oh, Mr. President! To what do I owe the pleasure?
dialogue_jp:
うん？　もしもし――
ああ　社長……

dialogue_en: Sorry, you'll have to excuse me. I have some...business to attend to.
dialogue_jp:
すまない　急用が入ったようだ
私はいったん中座させてもらうよ

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! Must be pretty urgent to pull the director away.
dialogue_jp:
おっと　ディオ園長
なにかのトラブルでしょうか？

dialogue_en: Especially since our heated match between Dio's Champions and the Turks is about to reach a fever pitch!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　遂に佳境を迎える
ディオ軍団 vs タークスペアの１戦！

dialogue_en: Dio may be bowing out, but Kotch and I will continue to cover this thrilling fight!
dialogue_jp:
実況は引き続き
ソッチ＆コッチで盛りあげてまいります

dialogue_en: And just like that, Rude has been taken out of the fight! The indomitable badass has fallen! Is this the end for the Turks!?
dialogue_jp:
ルード選手　遂にダウーーーン！
鉄壁要塞がいま崩れ落ちました

dialogue_en: It all rests upon young Elena's shoulders now!
dialogue_jp: さあ　後を託されたイリーナ選手

dialogue_en: Is this new recruit capable of avenging her partner all by her lonesome? Let's see!
dialogue_jp:
期待のルーキーは　このピンチを
乗り越えることができるのでしょうか！

dialogue_en: Ya hate to see it, folks! Elena is out of commission!
dialogue_jp:
イリーナ選手
ここで　あえなくダウーーーン！

dialogue_en: Only Rude remains! Victory and glory are still within his grasp─so long as he can overcome these odds!
dialogue_jp:
残るは　ルード選手のみ
窮地を乗り越え
輝ける勝利をつかむことができるのか！

dialogue_en:
We salute you, Rufus Shinra
Our president who we all adore♪
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス　ルーファウス神羅～
新しい～社長～♪

dialogue_en: Gotta say, Director, I wasn't expecting such an impressive special guest!
dialogue_jp:
いやはや　園長
これはトンでもない事態になりました！

dialogue_en: Nor was I. The president's proposal caught me entirely by surprise.
dialogue_jp:
フフフ　私も新社長から
参戦の打診を受けた時はビックリしたよ

dialogue_en: Now that our VIP has entered the fray, how do you envision this fight playing out?
dialogue_jp:
さっそくですが　園長は
ルーファウス社長をどう分析されますか

dialogue_en: Well, it takes tenacity to climb the corporate ladder, but whether that will translate to the arena is anyone's guess.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のトップだ
ただものではないことは確かだが
正直　バトラーしては未知数だね

dialogue_en: You're saying this could be a big gamble for the president?
dialogue_jp: それは　ある意味恐ろしいですね

dialogue_en: Yes, though I doubt he's leaving it all to chance. He would never commit to a losing venture.
dialogue_jp:
彼が勝算のない場に出てくるはずがない
それだけ　自信があるんだろう

dialogue_en: All I can say with confidence is that this bout will be discussed for weeks and months to come! Perhaps even years!
dialogue_jp:
確実なのは　この１戦が
今後語り継がれていくであろう
伝説の試合になるということだけだ

dialogue_en: You hear that, folks? This is history in the making!
dialogue_jp: なるほど　なるほどなるほど！

dialogue_en: Oof! That's the kind of hit you'll be feeling for a week!
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス選手の手厳しい一撃！

dialogue_en: That's Shinra's president for you, folks! A terror in the boardroom and on the battlefield!
dialogue_jp:
決まった～！
社長自ら手を下すのが神羅流です

dialogue_en: Looks like the new prez knows how to dish out the punishment!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス選手の
懲戒処分が炸裂します！

dialogue_en: Rufus is turning up the heat! Does Cloud even stand a chance against this onslaught!?
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス選手
着実にクラウド選手を追い詰めていく！

dialogue_en: The president of Shinra isn't afraid to get his hands dirty! Now that's how ya get to the top!
dialogue_jp:
すさまじい熱血指導！
クラウド選手の処分やいかに

dialogue_en: Take a good, long look, folks! This is what happens when you dare to defy Shinra! The big boss himself steps in to bring his rogue subordinates back in line!
dialogue_jp:
神羅カンパニーの公開懲戒ショー！
社長自ら部下を厳しく指導していきます

dialogue_en: Such skill! No doubt the result of training since childhood. I daresay he has his father to thank for that.
dialogue_jp:
あの身のこなし
幼い頃からの訓練の賜物だろう
お父上の愛情がうかがえるよ

dialogue_en: Truly, the president's martial talents are wasted in the boardroom!
dialogue_jp:
いまの一撃……
社長にしておくのが惜しいくらいだね

dialogue_en: I dunno about you, folks, but I felt that one from over here!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス選手
まともに食らってしまった～！

dialogue_en: Cloud is all, "You're the president of jack shit"─showing his opponent utter disrespect!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手
『社長だろうが関係ないね』と
言わんばかりに攻め立てます！

dialogue_en: There's no love lost between Cloud and his former employer, folks! He is goin' at it!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド選手　相手が上司だろうと
まったく容赦がありません！

dialogue_en: And Rufus is forced to eat shit! That was a grave misjudgment on the executive's part, folks!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス選手　食らったー！
ここは間合いを見誤ったか

dialogue_en: Right where it hurts... I doubt the president enjoyed that.
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス君　やられたね
ズシリと効いていそうだ

dialogue_en: Things are looking a bit grim for the president.
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス君　ここは耐えてほしいね

dialogue_en: Cloud's got Rufus on the ropes! What's that I hear? Sounds like Shinra collectively shitting its pants!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス選手　ピーーーンチ！
神羅関係者のどよめきが
聞こえてくるようです！

dialogue_en: Cloud's clearly not pulling any punches! Can Rufus claw his way back after such a devastating drubbing!?
dialogue_jp:
激しさを増すクラウド選手の猛攻！
ルーファウス選手
はたして立ち直せるか

dialogue_en: Oh dear, the president looks out on his feet! He needs to gather his wits─and fast!
dialogue_jp:
おおう　さすがのルーファウス君も
内心穏やかではないだろうね

dialogue_en: Who let the dog out!? The crowd is going absolutely wild as Darkstar makes his arena debut!
dialogue_jp:
ダークネイションの参戦に　観客席も
更なる盛りあがりを見せております！

dialogue_en: With his faithful friend at his side, I'd say the president might still have a fighting chance.
dialogue_jp:
頼もしい相棒を得て
ルーファウス君に勢いが戻ったようだね

dialogue_en: The odds are certainly in his favor! Can Cloud win this two-on-one clash, or will he crumble!?
dialogue_jp:
タイマン勝負から一転
クラウド選手は
厳しい戦いを強いられそうです！

dialogue_en: This is a former SOLDIER we're talking about. One could argue that Darkstar has merely leveled the playing field.
dialogue_jp:
いや　どうかな？
彼は元ソルジャー　これでようやく
五分といったところかもしれないよ

dialogue_en: You'd be hard-pressed to find a stronger bond between man and dog than this!
dialogue_jp:
飼い慣らした相棒との
見事なコンビネーションが炸裂します！

dialogue_en: I tell ya, Shinra's got a rosy future ahead of it with Rufus and his faithful pooch at the helm!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス＆ダークネイション
神羅カンパニーの未来は安泰だ～！

dialogue_en: No way could Rufus call off this dog! Darkstar's love and devotion is undeniable! I'd be touched, if not for the carnage!
dialogue_jp:
固い絆で結ばれた主人と相棒
どれだけ　しつければ
この忠誠心が生まれるのか！

dialogue_en: Rufus and Darkstar are pouring it on! What a devastating duo!
dialogue_jp:
相棒の助けを得て
ルーファウス選手の猛攻が決まります！

dialogue_en: Were it up to me, Darkstar would be named Best in Show!
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　『とっても仲良しで賞』を
贈らせてもらうよ

dialogue_en: Amazing! I've always been a cat person, but Darkstar is making me question my allegiances!
dialogue_jp:
すばらしい！
私は　イヌよりもネコ派なんだが
考えをあらためるとするよ

dialogue_en: Darkstar demonstrating the classic "down" trick!
dialogue_jp: ダークネイション　シットダウーン！

dialogue_en: Darkstar is reeling from that punishment!
dialogue_jp: ダークネイション　這いつくばった～！

dialogue_en: Ooh, the utter humiliation of having to sit for someone other than his master! Even Rufus is visibly shaken, folks!
dialogue_jp:
主人以外にひざまずかされる屈辱！
ルーファウス選手も　動揺が隠せません

dialogue_en: Cloud's setting his sights on Darkstar to even the odds! But will this strategy succeed!?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド選手
標的をダークネイションに絞るのか？

dialogue_en: Darkstar's in the doghouse! But is Cloud about to send the pooch back to the pound?
dialogue_jp:
伏せてしまったか……
ルーファウス君たちの強固な連携も
ここまでかな

dialogue_en: Aww, poor Darkstar... Let's hope he's only playing dead!
dialogue_jp:
う～む　ダークネイション
もういちど　尻尾を立ててほしいね

dialogue_en: The crowd is howling as the loyal hound Darkstar goes down for the count!
dialogue_jp:
奮闘虚しく力尽きる
ダークネイショーーーン！

dialogue_en: He'll be leaving with his tail between his legs after this showing.
dialogue_jp:
主人を守り切れず
さぞ　無念なことだろう

dialogue_en: Rufus must be raging at the loss of his partner─and I have no doubt he'll be takin' all that anger out on Cloud and sending him to the doghouse!
dialogue_jp:
頼もしい相棒を失ったルーファウス選手
この怒りをぶつけるべき相手は
いま　まさに　目のまえにいます！

dialogue_en: Shinra's commander in chief versus an ex-SOLDIER: First Class! No one could have predicted a matchup like this in a million years!
dialogue_jp:
にらみあう神羅のトップと元ソルジャー
だれがこの激戦を予想したでしょうか！

dialogue_en: This is truly a fight for the ages! Only one will leave this arena a winner, but who will it be!?
dialogue_jp:
さあ　最後にリングに立ち
勝利の栄冠をつかむのは
そっち　こっち　どっちだ！

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp: ゴールドソーサーへ　ようこそ！

dialogue_en: An adventure beyond your wildest dreams awaits you within!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　夢のような体験が
皆様を待っていますよ

dialogue_en: All of us at the Gold Saucer are so glad you could join us!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーは　皆様のお越しを
心よりお待ちしておりました

dialogue_en: We hope you enjoy your time today at the world's greatest theme park!
dialogue_jp:
世界一のテーマパークを
存分にお楽しみください！

dialogue_en: Welcome one and all to the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　ゴールドソーサーへ！

dialogue_en: Beyond our glittering gates, you'll find a world of wonders!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　きらめく世界が
皆様を待っていますよ

dialogue_en: A world filled with magic─that belongs to you as well!
dialogue_jp:
いま　ご来園の皆様に
魔法をかけました

dialogue_en: Because the Gold Saucer is now your home away from home!
dialogue_jp:
これで皆様も
ゴールドソーサーの住人です

dialogue_en: Countless dreams and delights await! We hope you enjoy them to your hearts' content!
dialogue_jp:
どうぞ　夢の楽園を
心ゆくまでお楽しみください

dialogue_en:
All our scheduled flights are currently full.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ありません　ただいま
ご予約でいっぱいのため　ご利用できません

dialogue_en: This helicopter is bound for Costa del Sol.
dialogue_jp:
こちらのヘリコプターは
コスタ・デル・ソル行きです

dialogue_en: Will you be boarding?
dialogue_jp: ご利用になりますか？

dialogue_en: Get in the helicopter?
dialogue_jp: ヘリコプターに乗りますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Have a pleasant journey.
dialogue_jp: それでは　よい旅を！

dialogue_en: We hope you continue to enjoy your stay with us.
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　ゴールドソーサーをお楽しみください

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Gold Saucer! We hope your flight was smooth and enjoyable.
dialogue_jp:
ようこそ　ゴールドソーサーへ
空の旅はいかがでしたでしょうか？

dialogue_en: This is our desert parking area. Access is reserved for guests with vehicles and their companions.
dialogue_jp:
こちらはバギー専用の駐車スペースです
バギーをお持ちでない方は　ご利用になれません

dialogue_en:
Greetings, sir.
Do you wish to depart the Gold Saucer?
dialogue_jp:
こちらは　アンダーソーサー行きです
バギーをご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: Leave the Gold Saucer in your buggy?
dialogue_jp: バギーに乗りますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Safe travels!
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ！

dialogue_en: Whenever you are ready to leave, please let us know.
dialogue_jp: バギーをご利用の際は　いつでもお声がけください

dialogue_en:
Welcome to the Gold Saucer.
We hope you enjoy your time with us today.
dialogue_jp:
黄金の楽園へ　ようこそ
砂漠のドライブはいかがでしたか？

dialogue_en: Use the ropeway?
dialogue_jp: ロープウェイに乗りますか？

dialogue_en: Yes
dialogue_jp: はい

dialogue_en: No
dialogue_jp: いいえ

dialogue_en: Oh my god, this is really happening. Somebody pinch me!
dialogue_jp:
ふう　楽しみすぎて
苦しくなってきた

dialogue_en: I've only got one day here, and I am gonna make it count!
dialogue_jp: うおお　１日でまわりきるぞ～！

dialogue_en: We need a plan if we wanna make the most of this trip.
dialogue_jp: 全部のアトラクションで遊びたいよな

dialogue_en: Hm hm hm, hm-hm-hm hm-hm♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃ～らら～
らららっら　ららららら～♪

dialogue_en: The cactuars sure are lively today, huh!?
dialogue_jp: 今日もサボテンダーは元気だねえ

dialogue_en: Any singles lookin' for a fun-lovin' guy?
dialogue_jp: 可愛い子がいたら誘っちゃおっと

dialogue_en: Gotta figure out the game plan while we're here waiting!
dialogue_jp:
いまのうちに
まわる順番を決めておこうぜ

dialogue_en: Goddamn, I love this place!
dialogue_jp: 何度来てもワクワクするよな～

dialogue_en: I heard a tonberry'll stab you if you cut in line!
dialogue_jp:
行列に割り込むと
トンベリに刺されるらしいぞ

dialogue_en: Oh man, I can't decide where to get my picture taken!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　どのスクエアで
記念写真撮ろうかな～？

dialogue_en: I am so framing this admission ticket when I get home!
dialogue_jp: 今回のパスも記念に持って帰ろっと

dialogue_en: I know what I want to check out first!
dialogue_jp: まずはグリーティングだよね！

dialogue_en: Tonberries are kinda scary, if ya ask me.
dialogue_jp: トンベリって　ちょっと怖くない？

dialogue_en: Duhn duhn duh-duh-duh, duhn duhn duh-duh-duh...♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃ～らら～
らららっら　ららららら～♪

dialogue_en: I'm not leaving till I ride the Skywheel!
dialogue_jp: ゴンドラには絶対乗りたいよね～

dialogue_en: Today's the day I check out the whole park!
dialogue_jp: 今日こそ全スクエアを制覇するわよ

dialogue_en: I'm gonna party till the chocobos come home!
dialogue_jp: すみずみまで遊びつくすわよ～！

dialogue_en: Aw, crap! Where did I leave my guidebook?
dialogue_jp: ああ　ガイドブック忘れてきちゃった！

dialogue_en: Which of the Saucer mascots do you like the best?
dialogue_jp:
チョコサボトンの中で
どの子がいちばん好き？

dialogue_en: So! How you wanna kick this off?
dialogue_jp: ねえねえ　なにからまわる？

dialogue_en: I ain't going home till I've done everything!
dialogue_jp: ぜんぶ遊ぶまで帰らないからね！

dialogue_en: I wanna meet all the characters!
dialogue_jp: 着ぐるみのとこに行ってきていい？

dialogue_en: I don't even know where to start!
dialogue_jp: どこから遊ぼっかな～？

dialogue_en: I want a balloon too!
dialogue_jp: 僕も風船ほしい～！

dialogue_en: C'mon, can't we go to Wonderment Square already?
dialogue_jp: はやくワンダースクエアに行きたいな～

dialogue_en: Everything here's just so pretty!
dialogue_jp: すごいね　キラキラだね！

dialogue_en: Lalala lalalala lala lala lalalalala♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃ～らら～
らららっら　ららららら～♪

dialogue_en: I wonder if we'll meet a chocobo! Or a cactuar!
dialogue_jp:
チョコサボトンといっしょに
まわりたいよ～

dialogue_en: I'm gonna win the X-X-X-X-L fat moogle, I know it!
dialogue_jp:
今日こそ　５Ｌサイズの
デブモーグリをゲットするの！

dialogue_en: Do we get to play yet!? Do we? Do we!?
dialogue_jp: はやく遊ぼ　遊ぼったら遊ぼ！

dialogue_en: Hey there, folks, and welcome to the Gold Saucer! Are you havin' fun today!?
dialogue_jp:
ウェルカム・トゥ・ゴールドソーサー！
みんな　楽しんでるか～？

dialogue_en: If you're not, then you will be soon, 'cause the party's about to begin!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　サプライズパーティーの
はじまりだ！

dialogue_en: Welcome to the park, everyone! I've got a question: do you like to party!?
dialogue_jp:
ウェルカム・トゥ・ゴールドソーサー！
みんな　楽しんでる？

dialogue_en: I sure hope so, because we're about to get wild!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　サプライズパーティーの
はじまりよ！

dialogue_en: Sweetheart, would you be mine forever!?
dialogue_jp: 俺と　永遠の愛を誓ってくれ！

dialogue_en: Yes!
dialogue_jp: はい……！

dialogue_en: And do you promise to be mine till death do us part?
dialogue_jp: 私と　一生一緒に暮らしましょう！

dialogue_en: Yes!
dialogue_jp: はい……！

dialogue_en: Congratulations on your engagement! Let's have a big round of applause for the happy couple!
dialogue_jp:
コングラチュレーション！
このステキなカップルに盛大な拍手を～

dialogue_en: Who's in the mood to celebrate!? C'mon!
dialogue_jp: さあ　みんなで祝おうじゃないか！

dialogue_en: A long and happy marriage to you both! Let's have a round of applause for the soon-to-be-newlyweds!
dialogue_jp:
コングラチュレーション！
このステキなカップルに盛大な拍手を～

dialogue_en: What say we all do some celebrating!?
dialogue_jp: さあ　みんなでお祝いしましょう！

dialogue_en: Kweh! Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエクエ～！

dialogue_en: Wark-come to the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp: ゴールドソーサーにようこそクエッ！

dialogue_en: Line up kweh-kly if you want your photo taken!
dialogue_jp: 写真は順番クエ～！

dialogue_en: Catch me if you can─I'm a cactuar, man!
dialogue_jp: ヤッホー　サボテンダーだよ～！

dialogue_en: Think you can strike a pose like me!? Give it a try!
dialogue_jp:
みんなでいっしょに～
サボテンポーズ！

dialogue_en: Keep on smiling, y'all!
dialogue_jp: 今日は楽しんでいくサボ！

dialogue_en:
Alright, everyone! Let's get this party started!
Hope you're ready to boogie!
dialogue_jp:
それではみなさ～ん　ごいっしょに～
踊らニャそんそん！

dialogue_en:
Anyone fancy a dance!?
Come on... Don't be shy.
dialogue_jp:
みなさーん　心をひとつに
踊らニャそんそん！

dialogue_en:
Alright, everyone! By popular request:
a fortune or two to steer you true!
dialogue_jp:
ヘイ・ユー！　占いはどうですか？
みなさんの未来　占うで～

dialogue_en:
Alright, folks!
Thought I'd share my good fortune with ye.
dialogue_jp:
ヘイ・ユー！
みなさんの未来　占うで～

dialogue_en:
Meow, meow, meow meow meow,
meow-meow meow-meow meow-meow!♪
dialogue_jp:
んにゃ　んにゃ　にゃーん
にゃにゃにゃにゃーん！

dialogue_en: And now, what you've all been waiting for!
dialogue_jp: さあ　みなさんご注目！

dialogue_en: This one's a showstopper!
dialogue_jp: ニャー　ボクの見せ場や！

dialogue_en: Ah, I love it! It's even more amazing than I imagined!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサー
黄金の楽園だよな～

dialogue_en: Where do ya think we should start?
dialogue_jp: どのアトラクションからまわる？

dialogue_en: Doesn't matter how many times I come, I always end up getting lost.
dialogue_jp:
オレ　ゴールドソーサーに来るたびに
いっつも迷子になっちゃうんだよな

dialogue_en: It's impossible not to lose track of time here!
dialogue_jp: 遊んでると時間を忘れちまうよ

dialogue_en: All these lights... Whaddya think their electric bill's like?
dialogue_jp:
どこもかしこもキラキラで
クラクラする……

dialogue_en: A guide moogle oughta be able to show us around.
dialogue_jp: Ｇモーグリにガイドを頼んでみるか

dialogue_en: I was so hyped to come here, I didn't sleep a wink!
dialogue_jp: 楽しみで昨日は一睡もできなかったよ

dialogue_en: Pretty cool to think people from all over the world come here.
dialogue_jp: うわ～　世界中から人が集まってるな

dialogue_en: Everything! I've gotta see everything!
dialogue_jp: とにかく全部まわってみようぜ！

dialogue_en: Everywhere you look, the attention to detail is crazy!
dialogue_jp:
スクエアごとに作り込まれているから
ぜんぜん飽きないんだよな

dialogue_en: Better grab a bite. Can't have fun on an empty stomach!
dialogue_jp:
遊びに行くまえに
腹ごしらえしておくか

dialogue_en: Man, I'm thirsty. Time to kick back and take a drink break!
dialogue_jp: 喉が渇いたな　ちょっと休もうよ

dialogue_en: I can't believe it. I'm finally at the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
とうとう来たわよ
ゴールドソーサー！

dialogue_en: All the rides here are spectacular. I dunno what to do next!
dialogue_jp:
どのアトラクションも最高だから
迷っちゃうよね

dialogue_en: I'm totally hopeless with directions. Um, how do I get to Chocobo Square, again?
dialogue_jp:
わたし　方向音痴なんだよね
チョコボスクエアってどっちだっけ？

dialogue_en: Can you imagine living here? Every day'd be a new adventure!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーで暮らして
一生遊び続けたいな～

dialogue_en: I wonder if they sell the cast members' costumes anywhere!
dialogue_jp:
キャストさんの制服って
どっかで買えないのかな？

dialogue_en: Holy moly, this place is massive! I've been to theme parks before, but never one this size!
dialogue_jp:
うわあ　広～い！
こんなに大きな遊園地はじめて

dialogue_en: Listen up: this vacation is on a tight schedule! We have to stick to the plan!
dialogue_jp:
計画的に動かないと
時間には限りがあるんだから

dialogue_en: I wanna take a guide moogle home and snuggle with it forever and ever!
dialogue_jp:
Ｇモーグリ
ウチに連れて帰りたいな～

dialogue_en: Dio pays so much attention to detail. Even the smallest decorations are exquisite!
dialogue_jp:
細かな飾りつけもステキだよね
ディオ園長のこだわりが垣間見えるわ

dialogue_en: I needed this vacation bad, and I'll be damned if I waste it!
dialogue_jp:
やっと取れたこの休暇
思いっきり遊んでやる！

dialogue_en: Now, which section am I gonna hit up first?
dialogue_jp: 今日はどのスクエアから攻めようかな？

dialogue_en: My advice? Focus on one and see all it has to offer.
dialogue_jp:
ひとつのスクエアに絞って
遊びつくすのも　オススメよ

dialogue_en: These guide moogles are so handy!
dialogue_jp: Ｇモーグリって便利だね！

dialogue_en: Hey, so, what spots are the best here?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　どのスクエアがオススメ？

dialogue_en: I really need a breather.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと休憩したいよ……

dialogue_en: I'm so hungry... Can we get a Monster Burger?
dialogue_jp: 遊びすぎて　お腹ペコペコ～

dialogue_en: Where's Dio? Is he here?
dialogue_jp: ディオ園長って　どこにいるの？

dialogue_en: I wanna go there next! C'mon, let's go!
dialogue_jp: 次はあっち～　あっち行くの～！

dialogue_en: I'm not going home. I'm gonna live here!
dialogue_jp: あたし　ゴールドソーサーで暮らしたい

dialogue_en: I don't wanna go home! I wanna stay here!
dialogue_jp: やだ～　帰りたくない～

dialogue_en: My balloon floated away from me!
dialogue_jp: 風船　どっかいっちゃった……

dialogue_en: I'm gonna work at the Gold Saucer when I grow up!
dialogue_jp: 大きくなったら　ここではたらくの！

dialogue_en: My favorite chocobo lost the last race he ran, but I've got a real good feeling about his next one!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボレースの負けを取り返さないと
次は大穴が来る気がするんだ

dialogue_en: Okay, time to hit the track!
dialogue_jp: チョコボレースで盛りあがりに行くぞ！

dialogue_en: A round as a Galactic Savior oughta help me de-stress!
dialogue_jp:
シューティングコースターで
ストレス解消といくか！

dialogue_en: Right now, I'm in the mood for some good old galactic fun!
dialogue_jp: 今日は宇宙へ行きたい気分だな～

dialogue_en: If you're headed to the colosseum, be sure to grab a drink. Action's so heated there, it'll leave ya parched!
dialogue_jp:
バトルスクエアに行くなら
ドリンク忘れるな！
あそこは熱気がすごいから

dialogue_en: No way I can ride the Skywheel alone... I gotta find a cutie to come with!
dialogue_jp:
スカイホイールへ行く前に　いっしょに
ゴンドラに乗ってくれる子を探さないと

dialogue_en: Got a reservation at the Haunted Hotel, but I'm worried I'll be too scared to sleep.
dialogue_jp:
ゴーストスクエアのホテルを
予約したんだけど　ちゃんと眠れるかな

dialogue_en: If I can wipe the floor with folks in 3D Brawler that easy, then maybe I should fight in the colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
フフフ　３Ｄバトラーで修行した成果を
マッスルコロシアムで試す時がきたな

dialogue_en: I always load up on sweets before a match. Sugar keeps me sharp!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドのまえは
甘いものを食べることにしてるんだ

dialogue_en: All my favorite birds won their races today! Like, am I psychic or something? Because wow.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボスクエア　最高だったね
まさかあんなに勝てるなんて……

dialogue_en: Ugh. Seriously? Speed Square again?
dialogue_jp: え～　またスピードスクエアに行くの？

dialogue_en: Man, everything about Battle Square was badass!
dialogue_jp: バトルスクエアの迫力　ヤバかったね！

dialogue_en: Can't say you've done everything at the Saucer till you've fought in the colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
アトラクションを制覇するなら
コロシアムにも参戦しないとダメだよね

dialogue_en: If I'm gonna ride the Skywheel, I wanna do it with someone special, you know?
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラに乗るなら　やっぱり
カップルタイムを狙いたいよね

dialogue_en: Ohhh, I wanna ride the Skywheel, but I'm too scared to do it alone.
dialogue_jp:
ううう……ゴンドラに乗りたいけど
ひとりで行く勇気はないよ～

dialogue_en: I'm a fan of Ghost Square. It's nice and quiet. Not nearly as crowded as the other ones.
dialogue_jp:
ゴーストスクエアは静かだし
人も少ないから　わりと好きなんだよね

dialogue_en: Heh! I'm so obsessed with G-Bike, I actually went and got a motorcycle license the other day!
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　Ｇバイクにハマって
このまえ大型バイクの免許を取ったの

dialogue_en: Finally managed to get them out of Wonderment Square! Kids and their video games, am I right?
dialogue_jp:
やっとワンダースクエアから解放された
子供って本当にゲームが好きよね

dialogue_en: C'mon, let's go see the chocobos!
dialogue_jp: ねえ　チョコボ見に行きた～い！

dialogue_en: We gotta go to Wonderment Square next! You promised!
dialogue_jp:
次はワンダースクエアに行くからね
絶対だからね！

dialogue_en: Did you see the high score I got on that ride? I'd make the best space ranger!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱ　宇宙で戦ったあとは
ドリンクでカンパイしないと！

dialogue_en: What? We're gonna stay in the ghost hotel!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　オバケのホテルに泊まるの？

dialogue_en: I can't ride the Skywheel with you, Dad. I'm saving it for my first love.
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラはいつか恋人ができたら乗るの
だからパパとは乗りません

dialogue_en: Mom really wants to see the play, so I guess I'll join her. Don't want her to go alone.
dialogue_jp:
ママはお芝居がみたいんだって
しかたないから　つきあってあげるの

dialogue_en: You catch that broadcast outta Wutai? Yeesh. Talk about a major buzzkill.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの放送　見たか？
ったく　楽しい気分が台無しだよな

dialogue_en: Apparently the Shinra Resistance Committee's even got people here at the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーにも
反神羅連絡会の連中がまぎれてたりして

dialogue_en: That space shooter coaster they got here is more than enough war for me, thank you very much.
dialogue_jp:
宇宙戦争ならまだしも
リアルな戦争なんて勘弁してくれよ

dialogue_en: No way Wutai's got anything even half as cool as this. They're just jealous!
dialogue_jp:
こんな場所　ウータイにはないからな
ヤツら嫉妬してやがんのさ

dialogue_en: Bro, let's party so hard we forget Wutai even exists!
dialogue_jp:
ウータイのことなんか忘れて
遊びまわろうぜ

dialogue_en: They say we're going to war soon... Should we really be goofing around at a time like this?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　戦争が始まるんでしょ？
このまま遊んでていいのかな

dialogue_en: I was hyped for Speed Square, but after that broadcast, I'm just not feeling it...
dialogue_jp:
戦争がちらついて
スピードスクエアが楽しめないんだよね

dialogue_en: Is it naive to think if Wutai had a place like this, there'd be no war?
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの人たちも
ゴールドソーサーで遊べばいいのに

dialogue_en: If this place gets shut down because of Wutai, there's gonna be hell to pay!
dialogue_jp:
ウータイのせいでここが閉鎖されたら
わたし　絶対許さないから！

dialogue_en: If we were friends with Wutai, maybe the Gold Saucer could do a Ninja Square or something!
dialogue_jp:
いつかウータイと仲良くなったら
シノビのスクエアとかできるのかな？

dialogue_en: They're not letting anyone in right now.
dialogue_jp: 入場規制だってよ

dialogue_en: Can't blame 'em. Place is a mess.
dialogue_jp: この混雑じゃ仕方ないな

dialogue_en: I just wanted to ride the Skywheel...
dialogue_jp: ゴンドラに乗りたかったんだけどな

dialogue_en: Oh come on, this is what I came here for!
dialogue_jp: え～　せっかく来たのに

dialogue_en: Apparently they're not letting anyone in.
dialogue_jp: 入場規制で入れないんだって

dialogue_en: Whaddya mean we can't ride the Skywheel?
dialogue_jp: うそ　ゴンドラに乗れないの？

dialogue_en: There's some event going on at the colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
マッスルコロシアムで
スペシャルマッチだってよ！

dialogue_en: Is Dio gonna throw down with somebody?
dialogue_jp: ディオ園長と誰が勝負するんだ？

dialogue_en: "Corneo"? As in the Wall Market sleazebag!?
dialogue_jp:
コルネオって
ウォール・マーケットのコルネオか？

dialogue_en: Showdown tomorrow at the colosseum!
dialogue_jp: 明日はバトルスクエアで決まりだな

dialogue_en: The identity of the Gold Saucer is riding on a fight between Dio and the don!?
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーの名前を賭けて
園長とコルネオってヤツが戦うんだと

dialogue_en: I'm Team Dio for life! For life, you hear me!?
dialogue_jp: 断然　ディオ園長を応援するわ！

dialogue_en: Whoa! It sounds like Battle Square is where the real action is!
dialogue_jp:
うわ～　バトルスクエア
盛りあがりそうね

dialogue_en: Gotta check out the colosseum tomorrow!
dialogue_jp: 明日はコロシアムに行ってみよっか

dialogue_en: Can someone tell me why Don Corneo's here?
dialogue_jp: えっ　なんでコルネオがここにいるの？

dialogue_en: Wait, for real!? They're gonna change the Gold Saucer's name?
dialogue_jp:
え～　ゴールドソーサーの名前
変わっちゃうの？

dialogue_en: Welcome to the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp: ゴールドソーサーへ　ようこそ

dialogue_en: Park Central is your gateway to fun, so let me know if there's anywhere you'd like to go!
dialogue_jp:
ここ　パークセントラルから皆様を
お望みのスクエアへとご案内します

dialogue_en: And if you have any problems during your visit, please speak to the nearest staff member.
dialogue_jp:
なにか　お困りのことがございましたら
お近くのスタッフへお声がけください

dialogue_en: Hello and welcome to Park Central!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　パークセントラルへ

dialogue_en: Every square is yours to enjoy; where you go is up to you!
dialogue_jp:
ここから　どのスクエアへ向かうかは
お客様次第です

dialogue_en: There's fun to be found all over, so indulge your curiosity and explore to your heart's content.
dialogue_jp:
ぜひ　好奇心のおもむくままに
黄金の楽園を巡ってみてください

dialogue_en: History will be made in Battle Square tomorrow, when our very own Dio's Champions...
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団とコルネオファミリーによる
歴史的な１戦のゴングが

dialogue_en: clash with Wall Market's Corneo Family!
dialogue_jp: 明日　バトルスクエアで鳴り響きます

dialogue_en: Get your tickets and see the spectacle in person!
dialogue_jp: 皆様　決してお見逃しのないように

dialogue_en: Don't miss out on this epic showdown─tomorrow at the Musclehead Colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
注目のビッグイベントが　明日
マッスルコロシアムで開催されます

dialogue_en: Come support our park director as he takes on notorious criminals!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ園長の熱き戦いを
みんなで応援しましょう！

dialogue_en: Taste the magic with our special cotton candy!
dialogue_jp:
マジカルでファンシー
ふんわりおいしい！

dialogue_en: Try all our enchanting flavors!
dialogue_jp:
刺激的なわたあめは
いかがですか～？

dialogue_en: Crackly Thunder!
dialogue_jp: 『サンダー』はバチバチ！

dialogue_en: Frosty Blizzard!
dialogue_jp: 『ブリザド』はヒエヒエ！

dialogue_en: Tingly Fire!
dialogue_jp: 『ファイア』はヒリヒリ！

dialogue_en: These treats can't be beat!
dialogue_jp: どれもオススメですよ～

dialogue_en: And when you're all worn out from a day of fun at the Saucer, try Cure for a blast of refreshing sweetness!
dialogue_jp:
遊び疲れたあとは『ケアル』味！
優しい甘みが体に染みわたりますよ～

dialogue_en: Popcorn here! Get your chocobo bean popcorn!
dialogue_jp:
ポッとはじける
チョコボ豆のポップコーン！

dialogue_en: Hot and fresh! It's a poppin' good time!
dialogue_jp:
アツアツできたて
ポップコーンはいかが？

dialogue_en: We've got all your favorite flavors!
dialogue_jp: お好みのフレーバーをお選びくださ～い

dialogue_en: Enjoy 'em separately, or mix 'em together!
dialogue_jp:
なんでもござれの
ミックスもありますよ～！

dialogue_en: Give your taste buds a critical hit with these succulent and spiny treats!
dialogue_jp:
嘘ついたら針千本
本当の美味しさを皆様に！

dialogue_en: Grab a Cacturro! Made hot and fresh all day long!
dialogue_jp:
『サボチュロス』
ただいま揚げたてで～す！

dialogue_en: Feeling cute? Try a Flowering Cacturro! Or for a serious snack, pick up a Jumbo size!
dialogue_jp:
お花つきでキュートなサポチュロスや
特大サイズのジャボチュロスも販売中！

dialogue_en: Need a fluffy friend to take home? Or some gifts for the little ones!? We gotcha covered!
dialogue_jp:
よってらっしゃい　みてらっしゃい
おみやげ探しはぜひ当店で～！

dialogue_en: Want a guide moogle of your own? Look no further!
dialogue_jp: Ｇモーグリ　絶賛発売中で～す！

dialogue_en: We've got chocobos, cactuars, and tonberries too!
dialogue_jp:
『チョコサボトン』
そろえてみませんか～！

dialogue_en: And also Cait Sith!
dialogue_jp: ケット・シーもありますよ～！

dialogue_en: Chocobos, cactuars─anything! You name it, I'll make it!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボやサボテンダー
風船で　なんでも作っちゃうよ～！

dialogue_en: A snuggly moogle, a beady-eyed tonberry─I can do it all!
dialogue_jp:
トンベリもモーグリも
どんどんリクエストしてね～！

dialogue_en: Anything that you can dream, I can make reality!
dialogue_jp:
お姉さん
風船でなんでも作っちゃうよ！

dialogue_en: A twist here, a pinch there, aaand voila! All done!
dialogue_jp:
風船をキュキュッとひねって……
はい　完成～！

dialogue_en: Those Chocobo Square uniforms are so cute!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボスクエアの制服
可愛かったな～

dialogue_en: Omigosh, did you see the way he nuzzled that chocobo? I was fangirling so hard!
dialogue_jp:
キャストさんとチョコボの絡み　見た？
興奮しすぎて鼻血出そうになったわ

dialogue_en: I wanna see some ghosts next!
dialogue_jp: 次はゴーストスクエアに行ってみようよ

dialogue_en: I'm not a fan of spooky stuff, but I have always wanted to see Ghost Square...
dialogue_jp:
わたし　ホラーが苦手だから
実はいちども行ったことないんだよね

dialogue_en: Then let's go! I promise there's nothin' to be afraid of!
dialogue_jp:
マジで？
ぜんぜん怖くないから大丈夫

dialogue_en: They've got some top-tier cuties workin' there too!
dialogue_jp:
ゴーストスクエアのキャストさん
めちゃくちゃ可愛いよ？

dialogue_en: The cast members instantly recognize me now. It pays to come every day!
dialogue_jp:
毎日通っていたら
キャストさんに顔を覚えられちゃったよ

dialogue_en: Oh please, that's nothing. Talk to me when people start mistaking you for Saucer staff!
dialogue_jp:
そんなの序の口よ　私なんか
他の客にキャストと間違われるんだから

dialogue_en: I had to escort someone to Wonderment Square once─they refused to believe I was a guest.
dialogue_jp:
仕方がないからキャストのフリをして
ワンダースクエアまで案内したわよ

dialogue_en: I've been mistaken for a cast member so many times that I finally decided just to apply for a job, and wouldn't ya know it? I got in!
dialogue_jp:
私はあまりにキャストと間違われるので
いっそのこと就職しようかと思い
先週面接を受けて……受かりました

dialogue_en: You mean, you work here now!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　マジですか？

dialogue_en: That's amazing! Congrats!
dialogue_jp: すごい　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: Yep. Startin' next week, I'll be an official employee of the Gold Saucer.
dialogue_jp:
来月からは正式なキャストです
あらためて　よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: Hello, boys and girls! Your Saucer pals are here and ready to bust a move!
dialogue_jp:
みっなさ～ん
『チョコサボトン』がやってきたよ～！

dialogue_en: So put on your dancing shoes and join in!
dialogue_jp: さあ　レッツ・ダンシング！

dialogue_en: Let's spread our wings along with our chocobuddies here. All together now... Do the kweh-kweh pose!
dialogue_jp:
笑顔のお友達はチョコボといっしょに
羽を広げて　バサバサポ～ズ！

dialogue_en: Get your elbows ready, folks! And just like our prickly pals─all together now─do the cactuar pose!
dialogue_jp:
元気なお友達はサボテンダーといっしょに
腕を曲げて　サボテンポ～ズ！

dialogue_en: Join our berry friendly tonberries! All together now! Ready...do the chef knife pose!
dialogue_jp:
大きなお友達はトンベリといっしょに
包丁を突き刺すポ～ズ！

dialogue_en: Try our Cosmo salt vanilla! A special treat for the whole family!
dialogue_jp:
コスモソルトを使った塩バニラは
大人から子供まで大人気！

dialogue_en: Free samples on us!
dialogue_jp: ぜひ　ご賞味あれ～！

dialogue_en: And don't miss out on Sea Blue Swirl, a new Costa del Sol delight!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルとのコラボ商品
マリンブルーミックスもオススメだよ！

dialogue_en: Care for some rich soft-serve ice cream? Made with milk shipped straight from the grasslands!
dialogue_jp:
グラスランド直送のミルクを使用した
濃厚なソフトクリームはいかが～？

dialogue_en: So, what're the odds that Sam and his bird win it all?
dialogue_jp: サムのチョコボはオッズがな……

dialogue_en: Could go with the safe choice, but maybe the long shot?
dialogue_jp: 手堅くいくか　大穴を狙うか

dialogue_en: Today's the day. I can feel it! Today my boy's gonna win!
dialogue_jp:
勝てる　今日は勝てる
今日こそ勝てる！

dialogue_en: Just watching can be fun. But picking winners is the real entertainment!
dialogue_jp:
見てるだけでも　じゅうぶん面白いよ
賭けるとさらに面白いけど

dialogue_en: The secret is to find a chocobo with grit!
dialogue_jp: 気の強いチョコボを探すのがコツさ

dialogue_en: I swear, there's just something different about Sam's chocobos.
dialogue_jp: サムのチョコボってツヤが違うんだよね

dialogue_en: Hmm... What matters more, the chocobo or the jockey?
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　騎手で選ぶか
チョコボで選ぶか

dialogue_en: I'm a huge fan of Joe and Hyperion!
dialogue_jp:
ジョー騎手の
トウホウフハイのファンなのよ

dialogue_en: Oh, whatever, I don't care. I'll just go with the cute one!
dialogue_jp: わかんないから可愛い子に賭けよ～

dialogue_en: The winning chocobos just jump out at me whenever I look over the racecards.
dialogue_jp:
出走表を見ると
勝つチョコボが光って見えるの

dialogue_en: These chocobos are so fast!
dialogue_jp: どのチョコボもはやいね！

dialogue_en: Look how happy that chocobo is!
dialogue_jp: あのチョコボ　ウキウキしてる！

dialogue_en: Whoa, check out the beak on that one!
dialogue_jp: うおお　クチバシすげー！

dialogue_en: Chocobos are super-duper smart!
dialogue_jp: チョコボって　すごく賢いんだよ！

dialogue_en: There's so many different colors of chocobo!
dialogue_jp: ねえ　いろんな色のチョコボがいるよ！

dialogue_en: It'd be so cool to ride in a chocobo race!
dialogue_jp: わたしもチョコボに乗ってみたいな～

dialogue_en: Yes! You can do it!
dialogue_jp: よし　そこで仕掛けろ！

dialogue_en: You gotta win this thing─for me!
dialogue_jp: 頼む　勝ってくれよ～！

dialogue_en: Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on!
dialogue_jp: きたきたきたきたきたー！

dialogue_en: Don't let Sam's bird get ahead of you!
dialogue_jp: サムのチョコボを押さえ込め！

dialogue_en: Don't stop, you're almost there!
dialogue_jp: そのまま逃げ切って　お願い！

dialogue_en: No way, he's closing in!
dialogue_jp: うそ　追いあげてきた！

dialogue_en: Easy now! Save some energy for the final spurt!
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　体力を残しておかないと！

dialogue_en: Just watching these races gets me so pumped!
dialogue_jp: 賭けてなくても燃えちゃう！

dialogue_en: Yes! Ahaha!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　やったー！

dialogue_en: Yes! Alright!
Yeah-heah-heah-heah! Woohoo!
Woohoo! Yes!
Yes! Woohoo!
Yes! I knew it, I knew it!
Yes! Alright!
Woohoo! Yeah!
Aww...
dialogue_jp: あ～あ……

dialogue_en: Aww...
Aww...
Aww...
Aww...
Oh man...
Ahhh...
Aw...
Did I call that, or did I call that!?
dialogue_jp: クラウドのおかげで勝てたよ！

dialogue_en: Son of a bitch! Shoulda just trusted my gut!
dialogue_jp:
くっそ～
クラウドに賭けときゃよかった

dialogue_en: Who believed in Cloud? This guy, right here!
dialogue_jp:
クラウドなら勝ってくれるって
信じてたぞ～！

dialogue_en: I can't thank you enough for winning, Cloud! You're the best!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　勝ってくれて
本当にありがとう！

dialogue_en: I'm a true-blue Cloud fan!
dialogue_jp: クラウド騎手のファンになっちゃった

dialogue_en: I've never seen anyone race like you, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　最高のレースでした！

dialogue_en: Joe, as in "Gold Cup Joe"? That man's in a league of his own.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドカップのジョーは別格さ
完璧に仕上げてくるからな

dialogue_en: Can't say I ever expected to see a bird from Bill's ranch compete at this level.
dialogue_jp:
まさかグリン牧場のチョコボが
ゴールドカップに出るとはな

dialogue_en: Racing doesn't get any bigger than this! Only the best of the best get a shot at the cup!
dialogue_jp:
最高峰のレースだ
俺も最高額で応えるぜ～！

dialogue_en: You ain't gonna find a better crop of chocobos than what we got lined up here today!
dialogue_jp:
さすがはゴールドカップ
選りすぐりのチョコボが集まったな

dialogue_en: I can't even begin to guess who might take home the trophy today!
dialogue_jp: ゴールドカップ　誰が勝つのかな？

dialogue_en: Those chocobos are decked out. Their owners didn't spare any expense.
dialogue_jp:
どのチョコボも
ゴールドカップに合わせて
調整してきてるわね

dialogue_en: Why even bother having the race? We all know Hyperion's gonna take it again.
dialogue_jp:
今回のゴールドカップも
ジョーのトウホウフハイで決まりでしょ

dialogue_en: I've got a good feeling about that mother of all long shots─the chocobo from Bill's ranch!
dialogue_jp:
わたし　大穴中の大穴
グリン牧場に賭けてみようかな

dialogue_en: Congratulations on winning the Gold Cup!
dialogue_jp: ゴールドカップ優勝　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: One of Bill's chocobos won? Get out!
dialogue_jp: まさかグリン牧場が優勝するなんてな

dialogue_en: That race was insane! One of the best I've ever seen! I couldn't take my eyes off it!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド騎手　最高のレースだった
一瞬たりとも目が離せなかったよ

dialogue_en: There he is, the superstar of the chocobo racing world!
dialogue_jp:
これからのチョコボ界を担う
スター騎手の登場だな！

dialogue_en: I can't believe it! Hyperion actually lost the race!?
dialogue_jp:
まさか　トウホウフハイが
負けるなんて……

dialogue_en: Cloud and his chocobo were in perfect sync. That race'll go down in history!
dialogue_jp:
今回のクラウド騎手とチョコボの走りは
歴史に残るわね

dialogue_en: You ran a brilliant race! Congratulations!
dialogue_jp: 最高のレースだったわよ　おめでとう！

dialogue_en: I was cheering so hard, I almost lost my voice!
dialogue_jp:
『クラウド～！』って叫びすぎて
声がかれちゃった

dialogue_en: Congratulations on your victory! What are your thoughts on the race?
dialogue_jp:
おめでとうございます
今回のレースはいかがでしたか？

dialogue_en: My bird's got a wild streak, so it's always tough to keep him focused.
dialogue_jp:
暴れん坊のチョコボだったので
コントロールするのに苦労しました

dialogue_en: Didn't even break a sweat. If you ask me, the others need to train harder.
dialogue_jp:
ぬるいレースだった
ほかの騎手は鍛錬が足りん

dialogue_en: Was great! Chatted with my bird and kweh-ft the others in the dust!
dialogue_jp:
いつもどおり　チョコボとお話しながら
楽しく駆け抜けたクエ！

dialogue_en: Next question...
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Tell us, what do you think helped you clinch the win?
dialogue_jp:
今回のレース
勝因はズバリなんでしょう？

dialogue_en: My race consultant, for sure. Wouldn't know my chocobo half as well without 'em!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボの性格やクセを知り尽くした
チョコボアドバイザーのおかげですね
