dialogue_en: Pure skill. I mean, nothing else really matters, right?
dialogue_jp:
当然　俺の腕だ
それ以外になにがある？

dialogue_en: My bird's kweh-k talonwork and my in-kweh-dible jockeying!
dialogue_jp:
それは　クエクエをクエーッと
クエしたからクエ！

dialogue_en: Oh, I see.
dialogue_jp: なるほど！

dialogue_en: Before we wrap things up, could we get a quick photo?
dialogue_jp:
それでは最後に
写真撮影をよろしいでしょうか

dialogue_en: Here you go. You can feed this to one of the chocobos.
dialogue_jp: はい　チョコボにごほうびをあげてみて

dialogue_en: Now hold your hand out─near their beak.
dialogue_jp: そっと　クチバシへ持っていってね

dialogue_en: Remember: if we're afraid of them, they'll be afraid of us.
dialogue_jp:
みんなが怖がると
チョコボも怖がっちゃいますからね～

dialogue_en: Joe handles Hyperion with such grace and authority.
dialogue_jp:
ジョーさんとトウホウフハイの走りは
気品があるんだよね

dialogue_en: Such power! I want him to grab me like he grips those reins.
dialogue_jp:
そうそう
手綱さばきがセクシーなんだよな～

dialogue_en: He's a born talent─and so charismatic too! Puts his opponents to shame for sure.
dialogue_jp:
あのスピードとカリスマ性でしょ？
いっしょに走る騎手はホント気の毒よね

dialogue_en: None of the other jockeys are even in his league!
dialogue_jp: ジョーさんの独壇場になっちゃうもんな

dialogue_en: Which is fine by me. I've only got eyes for Joe.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　俺はジョーさんが見られれば
それでいいんだけど

dialogue_en: Here comes a band of marching chocobos!♪
dialogue_jp: チョッコボ　みんなのチョコボ～♪

dialogue_en:
Kweh, kweh-kweh-kweh!
Wark, wark-wark-wark!♪
dialogue_jp:
クエックエックエックエックエ～
クエックエックエックエックエ～～～♪

dialogue_en: Choco-parade coming through, ladies and gentlemen!
dialogue_jp: は～い　チョコボの大行進が通りますよ

dialogue_en: Now why don't all of you out there join in with me!
dialogue_jp: みなさん　手拍子をお願いしま～す！

dialogue_en: Wark! Got Gold Saucer Points?
dialogue_jp: クエッ　ポイントをお持ちですか？

dialogue_en: Kweh! Want to exchange some of your points?
dialogue_jp: クエクエッ　ポイントの交換ですか？

dialogue_en: Thanks, and have a wonderful time!
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました　クエッ！

dialogue_en: Hope to see you back here sooner than later!
dialogue_jp: またお越しください　クエクエッ！

dialogue_en: Hey there! You treating your chocobos right?
dialogue_jp: ど～も　チョコボかわいがってる？

dialogue_en: Chocobo, choco-choco-chocobo! ♪
dialogue_jp: チョッコボ　チョコチョコ　チョコボ～！

dialogue_en: Catch ya later!
dialogue_jp: まったね～！

dialogue_en: Take good care of your chocobuddies!
dialogue_jp: チョコボはトモダチだよ

dialogue_en: Just lemme at those evil space goons!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃ　バンバン撃ち落とすぞ！

dialogue_en: What I wouldn't give for a space ranger uniform! Even a replica, I don't care!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の制服
レプリカでいいから欲しいな～

dialogue_en: This is an intriguing spacecraft... Perhaps I can get up close and analyze its propulsion systems.
dialogue_jp:
ふむ　あの宇宙空母の推進システム
詳細に科学的考察がなされているな！

dialogue_en: I love coming here. Get to feel like I'm taking a cruise through the stars!
dialogue_jp:
ここ　宇宙旅行をしているような
気分になれて好きなんだ

dialogue_en: Wanna know the secret to victory? Zap the baddies before they zap you! Simple as that!
dialogue_jp:
先手必勝　被弾するまえに倒す！
それがシューティングゲームのコツさ

dialogue_en: The captain of the space rangers is totally the coolest!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団のキャプテン
かっこいいな～

dialogue_en: You gotta read the comics and the novels to keep up with the Space Rangers series.
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団シリーズは　コミックも
ノベライズも押さえておくといいわよ

dialogue_en: I always freak out when the enemies start shooting at me. I hate it!
dialogue_jp:
敵にバンバン撃たれると
パニックになっちゃうんだよね

dialogue_en: Wasn't Shinra trying to go into space a while back? Whatever happened to that rocket of theirs?
dialogue_jp:
神羅も昔は宇宙を目指してたんだよね？
ロケットって　どうなったんだっけ

dialogue_en: I charged right into enemy lines and got myself totally roasted...
dialogue_jp:
私は　敵陣に突っ込んで
星になりました……

dialogue_en: When you get an order, you're supposed to say, "Roger that"!
dialogue_jp:
命令がきたときは
『ラジャー！』って言うんだぞ

dialogue_en: We gotta talk about our strategy too!
dialogue_jp: オレたちも作戦会議しとこうぜ！

dialogue_en: It's so cool when they do the space ranger salute!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の敬礼って
かっこいいよな！

dialogue_en: Watch out, evildoers! I'm a guardian of peace in the galaxy now!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙の平和はボクが守る
宇宙騎士団に　栄光あれ！

dialogue_en: I told my mom I wanted a space ranger uniform, and she made one just for me!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の制服がほしいって言ったら
ママが作ってくれるって！

dialogue_en: We all gotta fight really hard so we can help the space rangers win!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団が勝てるように
みんなで　がんばらないとね！

dialogue_en: I could teach you how to get an even higher score─if you ask nice.
dialogue_jp:
スコアを上げたいなら
わたしが教えてあげようか？

dialogue_en: Um, how come the space rangers and the Gilgamesh Army are fighting again?
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団とギルガメッシュ軍って
なんでケンカしてるの？

dialogue_en: The fate of the universe is in your hands, rangers!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙の平和は
君たちにかかっています

dialogue_en: Only together can you defeat evil and bring peace to the galaxy!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の一員として
ともに戦いましょう！

dialogue_en: Show these villains what it means to be a defender of the innocent! Space rangers, ho!
dialogue_jp:
訓練の成果を発揮する時がきました
宇宙騎士団に　栄光あれ！

dialogue_en: Many formidable fiends stand in our way.
dialogue_jp: 敵は危険な宇宙生物を従えています

dialogue_en: But we mustn't waver in the face of danger!
dialogue_jp:
決して油断なさらぬよう
お気をつけください

dialogue_en: We must fight together, to bring an end to this war!
dialogue_jp:
戦争を終わらせるために
ともに戦いましょう

dialogue_en: Space rangers, ho!
dialogue_jp: 宇宙騎士団に　栄光あれ！

dialogue_en: Everyone knows the space rangers began as part of the Gilgamesh Army, but they broke away to fight back against the corrupt leadership.
dialogue_jp:
そもそも宇宙騎士団は
ギルガメッシュ軍上層部の
横暴なやりかたに反発し
分離独立した派閥だからね

dialogue_en: So the Army is obviously in the wrong.
dialogue_jp: 事の発端はギルガメッシュ軍の腐敗さ

dialogue_en: I wonder...
dialogue_jp: そうかしら

dialogue_en: The space rangers basically staged a coup, so the Gilgamesh Army is just defending itself.
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団がクーデターを起こしたから
ギルガメッシュ軍は防戦しているだけよ

dialogue_en: So really, the rangers are the ones who're disturbing the galactic peace.
dialogue_jp:
宇宙の平和を乱しているのは
むしろ　宇宙騎士団のほうじゃない？

dialogue_en: No way. The real danger is the Gilgamesh Army's obsession with galactic domination.
dialogue_jp:
いや　宇宙全域を支配下に置こうとする
ギルガメッシュ軍の思想は危険だよ

dialogue_en: Like, it's literally their entire shtick.
dialogue_jp: 実際に　何度か行動も起こしているし

dialogue_en: Their purpose isn't control, it's to create harmony between the systems.
dialogue_jp:
ギルガメッシュ軍の目的は
支配ではなく融和だよ

dialogue_en: I mean, that's what their first commander in chief declared during the inaugural address. Don't you remember?
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団を設立した初代総統も
任命式の際に　そう宣言してるだろ？

dialogue_en: The Gilgamesh Proclamation, yes.
dialogue_jp: 有名な『ギルガメッシュ宣言』だね

dialogue_en: Though I doubt anyone would say their current approach is conducive to "harmony."
dialogue_jp:
とはいえ　いまのギルガメッシュ軍が
あの宣言を履行できているかは疑問だね

dialogue_en: I'm the galaxy's most incredible space ranger! And I'm gonna fight my hardest today to preserve peace for all!
dialogue_jp:
我こそは泣く子も黙る宇宙騎士！
今日も宇宙の平和を守るために戦うのだ

dialogue_en: Our victory is assured now that we have you on our side, Commander!
dialogue_jp: おお　団長殿がいれば百人力です！

dialogue_en: The evil forces of Gilgamesh don't stand a chance against you!
dialogue_jp:
ギルガメッシュ軍も恐れをなして
逃げていくことでしょう！

dialogue_en: They sure don't! Leave 'em to me!
dialogue_jp: うむ　まかせておけ！

dialogue_en: Okay, "Commander"─but if we get shot down again, let's not make a scene like yesterday.
dialogue_jp:
あらあら　昨日はすぐに撃墜されて
大泣きしてたけど　大丈夫なの？

dialogue_en: Mom! You promised not to talk about that!
dialogue_jp: お母さん　それは言っちゃダメ！

dialogue_en: That ship is a beauty! The perfect combination of form and function.
dialogue_jp:
この美しいフォルム
いや～　機能美の極致だな

dialogue_en: I still can't believe that the design is actually feasible.
dialogue_jp:
本当に宇宙で飛べるように
設計されてるんだって

dialogue_en: Developed by an engineer from Space and Aeronautics, I hear.
dialogue_jp:
宇宙開発部門のエンジニアが
監修したって聞いたな

dialogue_en: All that work for a display piece. Why did Shinra have to put the program on ice?
dialogue_jp:
あ～あ　なんで神羅は
宇宙開発を凍結しちゃったんだろ

dialogue_en: Good question. They'd probably have ships in orbit right now if they'd kept it going.
dialogue_jp:
開発を進めてたらいまごろ
宇宙に行けたかもしれないのにな

dialogue_en: Ugh, missed the leaderboard again.
dialogue_jp: またランキングに入れなかった……

dialogue_en: Your game's sloppy, that's why.
dialogue_jp: プレイが雑になってるよ

dialogue_en: You need to pay more attention to enemy behavior. And listen closely for audio cues.
dialogue_jp:
敵の挙動をもっとよく見ないと
あと　音もちゃんと聞いてね

dialogue_en: You're gonna have a tough time getting on the board if you don't make use of all your senses.
dialogue_jp:
五感をフルに使わないと
ランキング入りは難しいよ

dialogue_en: Thank you, ma'am! I'll take that to heart!
dialogue_jp:
はい　師匠
ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: Alright, I'm up next. Watch and you might learn something!
dialogue_jp:
次は　わたしがやるから
しっかり目に焼きつけて

dialogue_en: Understood! I'll watch your every move!
dialogue_jp:
はい　師匠
勉強させていただきます！

dialogue_en: Greetings, recruit. Here to exchange points?
dialogue_jp: 新兵諸君　ポイントを交換するかね？

dialogue_en: Care to exchange your points before takeoff?
dialogue_jp: 出撃のまえに　ポイントを交換しておくか？

dialogue_en: Make us proud, space ranger!
dialogue_jp: 宇宙騎士団に　栄光あれ！

dialogue_en: Best of luck out there, ranger!
dialogue_jp: それでは　健闘を祈る！

dialogue_en: What kinda brawls are we gonna get to see today!?
dialogue_jp: 今日はどんなバトルが見られるかな？

dialogue_en: I'm so friggin' hyped for this. It's gonna be insane!
dialogue_jp:
このヒリつくような熱気
たまんねえ～

dialogue_en: That last hit!? That was the stuff of legends!
dialogue_jp: 最後の一撃　めっちゃよかったな！

dialogue_en: Better grab a protein shake before heading in!
dialogue_jp:
入るまえに
プロテインジュース買おうぜ

dialogue_en: Hurry up! The match I wanna see is starting!
dialogue_jp: 急げ　目当ての試合が始まっちまう！

dialogue_en: Real flesh-and-blood fights top that virtual shit any day!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱ　３Ｄバトラーより
生身の殴りあいだよ

dialogue_en: A little rough-and-tumble brawling's good for the health, don'tcha think?
dialogue_jp: 血沸き肉躍る戦いは　健康にいいぞ！

dialogue_en: Time to go marvel at some glorious muscles!
dialogue_jp: さて　マッスルを愛でにいきますか

dialogue_en: This one fighter I absolutely adore is competing today!
dialogue_jp: 目を付けてるバトラーが出るんだよね

dialogue_en: I bought some protein powder to drop off backstage!
dialogue_jp: 差し入れにプロテインを買ってきたの

dialogue_en: I can't wait to see sweat drippin' and fists flyin'!
dialogue_jp: 今日は荒々しい肉弾戦が見たいな～

dialogue_en: Did you see yesterday's match? It was a one-hit KO! The crowd lost their minds!
dialogue_jp:
昨日の一撃ＫＯの試合　見た？
歓声でコロシアムが震えてたよ

dialogue_en: I brought binoculars since I'm in the nosebleeds. I'll be able to see the beads of sweat on their skin!
dialogue_jp:
うしろの席だから双眼鏡を持ってきたの
これで汗の粒まで見えるわ

dialogue_en: You see how buff the other team was? Makes you realize brains really are better than brawn.
dialogue_jp:
あんなに体格差があったのに
技術でねじ伏せちゃうなんてすごすぎ

dialogue_en: Are there gonna be any cactuars?
dialogue_jp: サボテンダーは試合に出る？

dialogue_en: I wanna learn how to do that superspecial move too!
dialogue_jp: さっきの必殺技　ボクもやりたい！

dialogue_en: Hey, so which fighter do you think's gonna win the next battle!?
dialogue_jp:
次のバトル
誰が勝つか予想しようよ！

dialogue_en: I'm gonna train to be a fighter someday!
dialogue_jp: 鍛えたら　私もバトラーになれる？

dialogue_en: Dio's got the most muscles outta everyone!
dialogue_jp:
いちばんマッスルなのは
ディオ園長だよ！

dialogue_en: All the fighters are so cool!
dialogue_jp: どのバトラーもカッコいいね！

dialogue_en: That's a whole lotta Shinra guards. Somethin' goin' down?
dialogue_jp:
神羅の警備兵がいるな
なにかあったのか？

dialogue_en: Not skimpin' on security.
dialogue_jp: やけに警備が厳重だな

dialogue_en: Maybe some Shinra bigwig's here.
dialogue_jp: お偉いさんでも見に来てんのかね

dialogue_en: What're Shinra troopers doing here?
dialogue_jp: なんで神羅の兵士がいるんだろう

dialogue_en: I heard one of the higher-ups is here on vacay.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の偉い人が遊びにきたんだって

dialogue_en: They tryin' their luck in the colosseum?
dialogue_jp: 兵隊さんがコロシアムに出るの？

dialogue_en: Report back to the director once you've taken witness statements.
dialogue_jp:
目撃情報を集めたら
園長に報告しろ

dialogue_en: Found a place to transport the bodies?
dialogue_jp: 遺体の収容場所は確保できたか？

dialogue_en: Get me a sitrep on the other squares.
dialogue_jp: ほかのスクエアの状況を確認してくれ

dialogue_en: I need you to step back please. This is a crime scene.
dialogue_jp:
現在　調査中です
なにもお答えできません

dialogue_en: Evacuate the guests first.
dialogue_jp: ゲストの避難が最優先よ

dialogue_en: This area is currently on lockdown.
dialogue_jp: こちらは現在　封鎖中です

dialogue_en: I'm sorry, but I can't let ya through here.
dialogue_jp: 申し訳ありません　お通しできません

dialogue_en: Has the colosseum ever hosted a match this big before?
dialogue_jp:
マッスルコロシアム始まって以来の
ビッグイベントだな

dialogue_en: We might just witness the birth of another Wall Market.
dialogue_jp:
第２のウォール・マーケットが
誕生しちまうかもな

dialogue_en: I am dyin' to know who Dio's Champions are.
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団のメンバーが気になるな

dialogue_en: Dio's rippling muscles'll carry the day, you'll see. Nobody can stop those buns of steel!
dialogue_jp:
俺は　ディオ園長の筋肉を信じる
筋肉は絶対に負けない！

dialogue_en: Dio's champs're in for a world of hurt if they think the family's going down easy, tell ya that much!
dialogue_jp:
コルネオを舐めてると痛い目にあうぜ
そういうヤツを何人も見てきたよ

dialogue_en: I'm pulling for Dio! The Gold Saucer wouldn't be the same without him.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーを守るためにも
ディオ園長を応援しないと！

dialogue_en: Who you think's gonna come out on top? The Champs or the Family?
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団とコルネオファミリー
どっちが勝つと思う？

dialogue_en: This kinda stuff is exactly what keeps me coming back. There's always something going on!
dialogue_jp:
こういうビッグイベントがあるから
ゴールドソーサーって飽きないのよね

dialogue_en: Anyone who knows anything about Wall Market could tell you just how much is riding on this match.
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケットを知ってる人なら
この試合のヤバさがわかるわよね

dialogue_en: Let's share a bottle if you win this one, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: 勝ったら　いっしょにお祝いしようね！

dialogue_en: Cloud, Cloud! Over here!
dialogue_jp: キャ～　こっち見てクラウド～！

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud! Gimme a high five!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさ～ん　ハイタッチして～！

dialogue_en: C'mon, you got this in the bag!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　勢いにのってけ！

dialogue_en: C'mon, Cloud! I wanna see you kick some ass!
dialogue_jp: アンタなら絶対勝てるよ　クラウド

dialogue_en: Time to knuckle down and bring it home!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　ファイト！

dialogue_en: I'm rootin' for you, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　がんばって！

dialogue_en: I believe in you, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　いけるよ！

dialogue_en: Show us how it's done, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　やっちゃって！

dialogue_en: Hell yeah, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　いいぞ！

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud! You rock!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　がんばって～！

dialogue_en: You show 'em who's boss, alright!?
dialogue_jp: クラウドさんなら　絶対勝てる！

dialogue_en: Don't let anyone stop you, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　応援するぜ

dialogue_en: I'm counting on you to win it all, man!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　期待してるぞ

dialogue_en: You got this one, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド　がんばれ！

dialogue_en: Can Corneo afford to do something like this? Isn't he on the run from Shinra?
dialogue_jp:
コルネオは神羅から逃げてるんでしょ
こんなに目立って大丈夫なの？

dialogue_en: Can we take a selfie? I mean, if you're not too busy!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん　勝ってください！

dialogue_en: Thanks a lot for standing up for the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーを守ってくれて
ありがとな！

dialogue_en: Holy shit, that ruled!
dialogue_jp: すげえイイ試合だったぞ！

dialogue_en: Lookin' forward to your next fight, Champs!
dialogue_jp: またディオ軍団で出場してくれよ！

dialogue_en: Wow! You guys were unstoppable!
dialogue_jp: 連戦連勝だったな　お疲れさん！

dialogue_en: Gotta say, you're one hell of a swordsman!
dialogue_jp: あんたの剣さばき　シビれたよ！

dialogue_en: Omigosh, you guys seriously cleaned up!
dialogue_jp: ディオ軍団　最高だったわよ！

dialogue_en: Thanks for showing that ugly skeezeball who's boss!
dialogue_jp:
コルネオをぶっ飛ばしてくれて
ありがとね～！

dialogue_en: Nice one! That's the best match I've seen in a minute!
dialogue_jp:
ナイスファイト！
最高の試合だったわ

dialogue_en: Glad we dodged that bullet. Can you imagine?
dialogue_jp:
コルネオランドにならなくて
ホントよかった

dialogue_en: That match lived up to its billing! Didn't think the president would show!
dialogue_jp:
ルーファウス社長が出てくるなんて
スペシャルにもほどがあるでしょ

dialogue_en: Tomorrow, Musclehead Colosseum will host an epic contest to decide the fate of the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
明日　ここバトルスクエアにてネーミングライツを
賭けた決戦　スペシャルマッチを開催いたします！

dialogue_en: Pick up your tickets for the match before it's too late!
dialogue_jp: 観戦希望の方はチケットをご購入ください！

dialogue_en: The very destiny of the Gold Saucer rests upon the shoulders of our Director Dio and his mighty champions.
dialogue_jp:
我らがカリスマディオ園長が明日ゴールドソーサーを
背負いスペシャルマッチに挑みます！

dialogue_en: Let's make sure they know we're all rooting for them!
dialogue_jp: 皆様　応援をよろしくお願いします！

dialogue_en: The battle of the ages is here!
dialogue_jp:
まもなく
スペシャルマッチが始まります

dialogue_en: To the victor go the naming rights to the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
ウォール・マーケットからの刺客
コルネオファミリーが

dialogue_en: This clash will pit the Corneo Family against Dio's Champions!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ軍団とネーミングライツを賭けて
熱いバトルを繰り広げます！

dialogue_en: You won't wanna miss it!
dialogue_jp: 決して　お見逃しのないように！

dialogue_en: Director Dio is about to lead his champions into battle against the Corneo Family at the Musclehead Colosseum.
dialogue_jp:
これより　園長率いるディオ軍団とコルネオ
ファミリーがマッスルコロシアムにて激突します！

dialogue_en: Tickets are still available, so grab yours now and show your support for the director!
dialogue_jp:
観戦チケットは　まだございます
いっしょにディオ園長を応援しましょう

dialogue_en: You want real gains!? Then you wanna slam one of our protein shakes after your match!
dialogue_jp:
熱い戦いの後には　プロテインを飲んで
上質な筋肉を手に入れましょう！

dialogue_en: The director himself drinks one every day! So get with the winning program already!
dialogue_jp:
ディオ園長も毎日飲んでいる
特製プロテイン　ぜひみなさんもどうぞ

dialogue_en: Hrg... Hn!
dialogue_jp: はあ～　ふんっ！

dialogue_en: Whoa! You're friggin' jacked today!
dialogue_jp: 今日もキレてるッスよ　兄貴！

dialogue_en: Hmph! ...Arg!
dialogue_jp: ふう～　むんっ！

dialogue_en: Those muscles are insane! You're cut like a behemoth!
dialogue_jp:
すげえッス
ベヒーモスの背中みたいッス！

dialogue_en: Urhn... Hya!
dialogue_jp: むう～　せいっ！

dialogue_en: Whoever's facing you in your next match is so dead!
dialogue_jp: これなら　次の試合も楽勝ッスね！

dialogue_en: This is our time, guys! We're gonna win this thing!
dialogue_jp: そろそろ出番だ　絶対に勝つぞ！

dialogue_en: Rah!
dialogue_jp: おう！

dialogue_en: Hooah!
And when we do, we're gonna party!
dialogue_jp: 勝ったら　みんなで飲み明かそうぜ！

dialogue_en: Hooah!
dialogue_jp: おう！

dialogue_en: Hooah!
I'm counting on you all, 'cause once we've hit it big...I'mma ask my girl to marry me.
dialogue_jp:
俺さ　この試合に勝ったら
彼女にプロポーズするんだ

dialogue_en: Yeah... Hmm...
dialogue_jp: お……おう

dialogue_en: Dunno about this next fight... Hope we don't blow it.
dialogue_jp: なんか　すごく負けそうな気がしてきた

dialogue_en: Come and get your spectator tickets for the Musclehead Colosseum!
dialogue_jp:
マッスルコロシアムの観戦チケットは
こちらで販売中です

dialogue_en: Watch the best of the best duking it out!
dialogue_jp: 極限のバトルに酔いしれてみませんか？

dialogue_en: Is spectating not enough? Wanna step inside the ring!? Head to our entrants' counter to learn more!
dialogue_jp:
コロシアムに参戦をご希望のお客様は
出場者用カウンターへお声がけください

dialogue_en: We still have a few tickets left for today's special contest!
dialogue_jp:
スペシャルマッチのチケットが
残りわずかとなっています！

dialogue_en: Don't miss your chance to see this once-in-a-lifetime event!
dialogue_jp:
観戦をご希望のお客様は
お早めに　お買い求めください！

dialogue_en: Lookin' for a Dio T-shirt? We got you covered!
dialogue_jp:
園長のＴシャツを買えるのは
ここだけ！

dialogue_en: Got Musclehead cups too─perfect for knocking back protein shakes!
dialogue_jp:
プロテインを飲むのに最適な
マッスルカップも　ごいっしょにどうぞ

dialogue_en: Stamp plushies right here! Get 'em before they're gone!
dialogue_jp:
忠犬スタンプのぬいぐるみ
入荷しました～！

dialogue_en: Buy a fat chocobo and moogle and save with our Pudgy Pair combo!
dialogue_jp:
デブチョコボとデブモーグリの
『ふくふくセット』はいかがですか？

dialogue_en: Grab our trio of iconic mascots, and take home a piece of the Gold Saucer!
dialogue_jp:
『チョコサボトン』を連れて帰って
ご自宅をゴールドソーサーにしませんか

dialogue_en: Oh. My. God. Look how cute they are! I want them all!
dialogue_jp:
わあ　カワイイ～
みんな連れて帰りたい！

dialogue_en: Oh c'mon, you can't be serious. Where would we even put them? Let's just keep it to one.
dialogue_jp:
ダメです　そんなに置くとこないだろ？
１つだけならいいよ

dialogue_en: Aww! At least let me get two!
dialogue_jp: そんな～　せめて２つ！

dialogue_en: You heard her. The chocobo and moogle are a pair! It'd be cruel to tear them apart!
dialogue_jp:
デブチョコボとデブモーグリは
絶対に連れて帰りたい～！

dialogue_en: You know we don't have room.
dialogue_jp: だから　ダメだって

dialogue_en: Look at the size of them. We'd have to throw away furniture!
dialogue_jp:
それによりによって
なんでそのデカい２つなんだよ

dialogue_en: Am I crazy, or did that stuffed cat just move?
dialogue_jp:
なんだ　いまのネコ？
動いたぞ

dialogue_en: If I can only have one, I want him!
dialogue_jp: ねえ　いまのネコちゃんが欲しい～！

dialogue_en: Muscle in and exchange your Gold Saucer Points for fabulous prizes!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドポイントの交換は
こちらでお受けしておりマッスル！

dialogue_en: Been workin' on your Point gains, bro?
dialogue_jp: ポイントを交換されマッスルか？

dialogue_en: We hope to see your sinewy self again soon!
dialogue_jp: またのお越しを　お待ちしておりマッスル！

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro! And remember: gotta hustle for that muscle!
dialogue_jp:
ありがとうございマッスル
それでは　よい筋肉ライフを！

dialogue_en: What's this "electrical trouble"?
dialogue_jp: 電気系統のトラブルってなんだろ

dialogue_en: Are the other squares still running?
dialogue_jp: ほかのスクエアはやってんのかな

dialogue_en: Well, now what?
dialogue_jp: これからどうする？

dialogue_en: Oh well. Gotta come back another time.
dialogue_jp: しかたないよ　また来ればいいさ

dialogue_en: All that waiting for nothing!
dialogue_jp: せっかく並んだのに～

dialogue_en: Back to the hotel for a bit?
dialogue_jp: いったん　ホテルに戻る？

dialogue_en: Wonder when they're gonna start it back up.
dialogue_jp: いつごろ再開するのかな

dialogue_en: Seems like overkill for electrical problems, don'tcha think?
dialogue_jp:
電気系統のトラブルにしては
ちょっと大げさすぎない？

dialogue_en: Once again, we are terribly sorry for the inconvenience!
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ありません
すみやかに　移動をお願いします

dialogue_en: Please follow the nearest staff members' instructions!
dialogue_jp: スタッフの誘導に従って　お進みください

dialogue_en: The entrance is heavily congested.
dialogue_jp: ただいま　出入口が非常に混雑しています

dialogue_en: If you're in a hurry, please use a guide moogle.
dialogue_jp: お急ぎの方は　Ｇモーグリをお使いください

dialogue_en: We strongly encourage you to make use of the guide moogles.
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ありません
Ｇモーグリでの移動をお願いします

dialogue_en: I'm... I'm totally not scared of heights, y'know.
dialogue_jp:
うう　高いところ
怖くないよな？

dialogue_en: So this'll be our, what─fifteenth ride?
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラに乗るのって
これで何度目だっけ？

dialogue_en: Whew... Can finally get off my feet for a bit.
dialogue_jp: ふう　座ってゆっくりできそうだな

dialogue_en: Let's figure out what we wanna do next once we're on the Skywheel.
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラに乗りながら
次　どこ行くか決めようぜ

dialogue_en: How long you think one full trip around the Skywheel takes?
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラって１周するのに
どれぐらいかかるんだろ？

dialogue_en: Ooh, I'm so excited!
dialogue_jp: ゴンドラ　楽しみだね

dialogue_en: I don't mind the long lines much at all. They give us more time to chat!
dialogue_jp:
並びながら　おしゃべりしてる時が
いっちばん楽しいかも

dialogue_en: Wow, look at all the couples.
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　カップルが多いね

dialogue_en: My heart's pounding...
dialogue_jp: ドキドキしてきた……

dialogue_en: You can't pass up a ride on the Skywheel.
dialogue_jp: まあ　ゴンドラは外せないよね

dialogue_en: There's no better place to make lasting memories than amongst the stars.
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラに揺られながら
ステキな思い出を作ってみませんか？

dialogue_en: Embark on a magical journey into the sky and see our golden paradise like never before!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　恋人の手をとって
黄金の景色を巡る旅に出かけましょう

dialogue_en: Are you ready to embark on an adventure through the skies?
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラの旅に出る準備は
整いましたか？

dialogue_en: We hope this experience is one that you'll cherish for the rest of your life.
dialogue_jp:
大切な人との特別な時間を
お楽しみください

dialogue_en: Why not exchange some of your points and get a gift for that special someone?
dialogue_jp:
ポイントで　恋人へのプレゼントを
購入されてみてはいかがでしょう？

dialogue_en: Care to spend some of your points?
dialogue_jp: ゴールドポイントをご利用ですか？

dialogue_en: If you're looking to escape the crowds, why not try the Skywheel?
dialogue_jp:
ゴンドラに乗って
ステキな思い出を作ってくださいね

dialogue_en: We hope you continue to enjoy your time at the Saucer.
dialogue_jp: 引き続き　ゴールドソーサーをお楽しみください

dialogue_en: Hehehe... I'd love to have his job.
dialogue_jp:
ヒヒヒヒヒ……
俺も吊られてみたいわ～

dialogue_en: Here at the Haunted Hotel, I can sleep like the dead...
dialogue_jp:
ここの部屋は　死体みたいに
よく眠れるんだよな

dialogue_en: I'm getting this tingling up and down my spine... Wait. Maybe I've got some kinda sixth sense?
dialogue_jp:
なんか背筋がゾクゾクしてきた
実はオレ　霊感があるんだよね

dialogue_en: Something tells me I'm going to have the worst nightmares when I go to bed.
dialogue_jp:
ここのベッドで寝ると
不思議な夢を見るらしいわ

dialogue_en: I heard one of the rooms is literally haunted.
dialogue_jp: 本当に　幽霊が出る部屋があるんだって

dialogue_en: The room service here is next level. A tonberry robot delivers your food right to your doorstep!
dialogue_jp:
ルームサービスもオススメよ
トンベリロボが料理を運んでくれるの

dialogue_en: Hehehe... Is fatigue haunting your every footstep? Take a load off.
dialogue_jp:
ヒヒヒ……お憑かれのようですね
休憩されますか？

dialogue_en: Care to rest in peace with us? Our beds are so comfortable, you'll sleep like the dead!
dialogue_jp:
永遠に目覚めないかもしれませんが
よろしいですか？　ヒヒヒ……

dialogue_en: We hope you drop in again soon. Hehehe!
dialogue_jp: またいつでもお越しください　ヒヒヒ……

dialogue_en: Farewell, and take care. Hehehe!
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ　ヒヒヒ……

dialogue_en: How can I help you...?
dialogue_jp: なにか　ご用かしら？

dialogue_en: Hee hee hee...
dialogue_jp: うふふふふ……

dialogue_en: Mwahaha...
dialogue_jp: イヒヒヒヒ……

dialogue_en: Gahaha!
dialogue_jp: ウヒヒヒヒヒ！

dialogue_en: Aaah!
dialogue_jp: キャアアア！

dialogue_en: Heh...hehehe...
dialogue_jp: うふふふ……

dialogue_en: So a friend told me this story.
dialogue_jp: 友達から聞いた話なんだけど

dialogue_en: One evening, right around midnight, he hears a sound outside his room.
dialogue_jp:
深夜零時ごろ
部屋の外から物音がしたんだって

dialogue_en: So he gets up, goes over to the door and looks through the peephole. Sees an old tonberry robot.
dialogue_jp:
それでドアスコープを覗いてみたら
そこには　トンベリロボがいて

dialogue_en: Battered little thing with a huge knife dripping blood as he shuffles down the hallway─real slow─till he's out of sight...
dialogue_jp:
血のしたたる包丁を握りしめながら
ゆ～っくり　ゆ～っくり……
廊下を歩いていたんだと

dialogue_en: C'mon, man...
dialogue_jp: マジかよ……

dialogue_en: Oh, it's true. Was looking for the jerk who smashed it up.
dialogue_jp:
むかし　心ない客に壊された
トンベリロボがいたらしい

dialogue_en: Night after night, that tonberry stalks the hotel halls─seeking revenge. And if it crosses paths with ill-mannered guests that remind it of the one who did it wrong...
dialogue_jp:
そいつは　夜な夜なホテルを徘徊し
マナーの悪い客を見つけ出しては
グサッ……グサッ……グサッ！

dialogue_en: Stab! Right through their heart.
dialogue_jp: 包丁を突き刺してるって話だ

dialogue_en: A robot with a grudge... Scary stuff.
dialogue_jp: トンベリロボのうらみ　おっかねえな

dialogue_en: You won't believe this, but I finally got the malboro room. I've heard it's to die for.
dialogue_jp:
聞いて　モルボルの部屋が取れたの！
ずっと泊ってみたかったんだ

dialogue_en: I can't wait to spend an entire night surrounded by malboro everything.
dialogue_jp:
アメニティが全部モルボルなんだよね
たのしみ～！

dialogue_en: Now that's the stuff of dreams. I'm in the mandragora room, myself.
dialogue_jp:
いいな～
私は今回もマンドラゴラ

dialogue_en: There's no better way to start your day at the Gold Saucer than to be woken by the sound of screams.
dialogue_jp:
悲鳴の目覚ましで早起きして
ゴールドソーサーを楽しむつもり

dialogue_en: I love it.
dialogue_jp: いいね！

dialogue_en: But now that I've managed to book the Malboro Suite, which should I try next? Decisions, decisions...
dialogue_jp:
さて　モルボルも取れたし
次はどの部屋に泊まろうかな～

dialogue_en: I'd like to stay in the behemoth, but alas, that one's reserved for families only...
dialogue_jp:
ベヒーモスルームを狙いたいけど
ファミリータイプなんだよね

dialogue_en: Oh, I know! Why don't we book it together? Half the cost, double the fun.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　じゃあいっしょに泊まろうよ
折半すれば安くなるし

dialogue_en: Are you sure? That would be perfect! One night in the behemoth room is all I need to complete my suite conquest!
dialogue_jp:
いいの？　やった
ベヒーモスで全ルーム制覇なんだよね

dialogue_en: Just so you know, I was bitten by a zombie a few days ago. If you want to exchange your points, you'd better hurry before I turn.
dialogue_jp:
私　数日前にゾンビに噛まれたんです……
ポイントを交換するなら　いまのうちですよ

dialogue_en: I think it's starting... Quick─your points, before it's too late!
dialogue_jp:
はあはあ……もうダメかも
ゴールドポイントを　はやく……！

dialogue_en: Come back soon! Because I don't think I have that much time left.
dialogue_jp: 私の意識があるうちに　また来てくださいね

dialogue_en: Run while you still can! Before I get you too!
dialogue_jp: いますぐ逃げて　私がゾンビになるまえに……

dialogue_en: Giiive meee poiiints...
dialogue_jp:
はあはあ……
ゴールドポイントを　はやく……

dialogue_en: Thaaank youuu...
dialogue_jp: ありがとうございました……

dialogue_en: I can't wait to see who wins the contest!
dialogue_jp: 歌詞コンテストの結果　楽しみだよね

dialogue_en: There's no way I didn't win the contest. Those are the absolute best lyrics I've ever written!
dialogue_jp:
歌詞コンテストは俺がもらったぜ
最高傑作を応募したからな！

dialogue_en: Is that seriously the time!? But I've only done Wonderment Square so far!
dialogue_jp:
えっ　もうこんな時間？
ワンダースクエアしか遊んでないのに

dialogue_en: I'm dying to see the rest of the park, but my kid refuses to budge!
dialogue_jp:
子供がワンダースクエアから
動こうとしないんです

dialogue_en: Now let's see, which game should I play?
dialogue_jp: さてと　どのゲームで遊ぼっかな

dialogue_en: You asked for it! Loser's buying tonight!
dialogue_jp: よし　負けたほうがおごりだぞ！

dialogue_en: Can't win at 3D Brawler with aggression alone. Positioning is key so you can punish mistakes.
dialogue_jp:
３Ｄバトラーこそ戦略を練らないと
勢いで戦っても勝てないぜ？

dialogue_en: I know there's all kinds of things to do here, but I always end up playing cards.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーにきても
やっぱりカードバウトしちまうんだよな

dialogue_en: The lights, the sounds─everything! I'm flipping out!
dialogue_jp: 興奮しすぎて　もう大変！

dialogue_en: Okay, time out! All these lights are hurting my eyes.
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと休憩
目がチカチカしてきちゃった

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... Time to unleash my inner gamer girl.
dialogue_jp:
ふふふ……
私の腕前を見せる時がきたわね

dialogue_en: So which game should I beat you at first?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　どのゲームから勝負する？

dialogue_en: After I saw 3D Brawler in the welcome show, I knew I had to try it!
dialogue_jp:
ウェルカムショーで３Ｄバトラーを見て
やってみたいと思ってたんだよね

dialogue_en: I got a little too into that bike game... My friend left and I didn't even notice!
dialogue_jp:
バイクゲームに熱中してたら
友達に置いていかれたんだけど

dialogue_en: Mom's watching a play, and dad's off at the colosseum, which means I get to play all the games I want. This rules!
dialogue_jp:
ママはお芝居　パパはコロシアム
僕はゲーム　自由時間サイコ～！

dialogue_en: No one can beat me at fighting games─not even a grown-up!
dialogue_jp:
３Ｄバトラーなら
大人にだって負けないよ

dialogue_en: My dad acted like a big baby when I kicked his virtual butt!
dialogue_jp:
パパを３Ｄバトラーで
コテンパンにしたら　すねちゃった

dialogue_en: I gotta practice as much as I can with G-Bike if I wanna make it into the mobile unit!
dialogue_jp:
神羅のバイク部隊に入るために
いまからＧバイクで練習しとくんだ

dialogue_en: Hey, what game are we gonna play now!?
dialogue_jp: ねえねえ　なにして遊ぶ？

dialogue_en: Whoooa! This place is like game heaven!
dialogue_jp:
わあ～　すごい
おあそびの天国みたい！

dialogue_en: My mom is like a completely different person when she plays that bike game.
dialogue_jp:
うちのママ　バイクに乗ると
性格が変わるんだよね

dialogue_en: Apparently they're working on setting up a whole new game here!
dialogue_jp:
ここに今度
新しいゲームができるんだって

dialogue_en: Rumors say it's a snow─ Um, actually, I'll leave it a surprise.
dialogue_jp:
噂ではスノー……
いや　やっぱナイショ

dialogue_en: C'mon, don't leave me hanging!
dialogue_jp: なに　教えてよ

dialogue_en: You'll see once it's done! We'll come back and play it together.
dialogue_jp:
できてからのお楽しみ～！
またいっしょに遊びにこようね

dialogue_en: Okay, everyone─let the art show begin!
dialogue_jp: さあ　おえかきショータイムの始まりよ

dialogue_en: Try and see if you can guess what I'm painting!
dialogue_jp: なにができあがるか　当ててみてね！

dialogue_en: Aaand all finished!
dialogue_jp: は～い　これで完成！

dialogue_en: Bow wow wow! Bow wow wow! If you guessed Stamp: you're right!
dialogue_jp:
ばうわう　ばうわう
『忠犬スタンプ』のできあがり！

dialogue_en: Now that's some sick cornering.
dialogue_jp: おっ　すげえコーナリング！

dialogue_en: That slow start's gonna cost 'em later.
dialogue_jp:
スタートで
もたついたのが響いてるな

dialogue_en: I oughta stick to that racing line too.
dialogue_jp: いまのライン取り　俺もマネしよう

dialogue_en: G-Bike is the coolest game.
dialogue_jp: Ｇバイク　かっこいいよね

dialogue_en: Takin' it real slow, huh? Nothin' wrong with playin' it safe.
dialogue_jp:
すっごく遅いけど
安全運転って感じでイイね

dialogue_en: Oof. Talk about a rough ride. Wouldn't wanna hop on the back of that bike.
dialogue_jp:
あらら～　ボロボロじゃん
このバイカーの後ろは乗りたくないな

dialogue_en: That combo I landed was sick. I was playin' out of my mind!
dialogue_jp:
どうだった　オレの超絶コンボ！
やばかったろ～

dialogue_en: Yeah, you must be out of your mind to beat the crap outta that girl. She was flirting with you!
dialogue_jp:
いや　せっかく仲良くなった女の子を
ボコボコにしてどうすんだよ

dialogue_en: You scared her off, dude!
dialogue_jp: どっか行っちゃったじゃねえか！

dialogue_en: Hmph! A true 3D Brawler never pulls his punches, no matter the opponent!
dialogue_jp:
ふっ　素人が相手でも手を抜かないのが
真の３Ｄバトラーってワケよ

dialogue_en: I'm about to "pull some punches" right into your idiot face!
dialogue_jp: なあ　こいつをボコボコにしようぜ

dialogue_en:
Got your deck in order?
If so, then it's time to throw down!
dialogue_jp:
カードの用意はいいですか？
さあ　レッツ・バウト！

dialogue_en: We've got a number of superstar cardslingers here today! Go on, show 'em what you got!
dialogue_jp:
凄腕のバウターたちがそろっていますよ
さあ　レッツ・エンジョイ！

dialogue_en: S'all good. Hope you find some other games to enjoy!
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　ほかのゲームをレッツ・エンジョイ！

dialogue_en: Be sure to come on back next time the card bug bites!
dialogue_jp: 遊びたくなったら　またきてくださいね！

dialogue_en: Hey there! Got a big pile of points to trade me?
dialogue_jp: ハァ～イ　ゴールドポイントは貯まってる～？

dialogue_en: Yoo-hoo! You can trade your points in right here. With me!
dialogue_jp: ヤッホ～　ポイントの交換所はここだよ～！

dialogue_en: Make sure to come back once you've racked up more points!
dialogue_jp: ポイントが貯まったら　またきてね～！

dialogue_en: Bye! Hope to see you again!
dialogue_jp: それじゃ　バイバ～イ！

dialogue_en: I am on today. Hope y'all ready to lose.
dialogue_jp:
今日は頭がさえてるから
負ける気しないよ

dialogue_en: I'm actually really into Queen's Blood right now.
dialogue_jp:
ぼく　クイーンズ・ブラッド
好きなんですよ

dialogue_en: Phew! Competition's so hot, I'm starting to feel a little feverish!
dialogue_jp:
勝ち負けより　楽しい時間を
過ごせたかどうかが大切なんですよ

dialogue_en: My head is pounding... Maybe I'm putting too much thought into this game.
dialogue_jp: 頭ガンガンする……知恵熱かな？

dialogue_en: Now I'm really gettin' fired up!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃ　燃えてきた～！

dialogue_en: Reflect on your matches as soon as they're over─while it's all still fresh. That's how you get good.
dialogue_jp:
勝負が終わったら　すぐ結果の分析
それが強くなるコツ

dialogue_en: Queen's Blood's just as much fun to watch as it is to play.
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドって
見てるだけでも面白いな

dialogue_en: Just watching stresses me out...
dialogue_jp: カードバウトの調子はどうだ？

dialogue_en: Ooh, that's a good play!
dialogue_jp: なるほど　そうきたか

dialogue_en: You got this! Just keep your head in the game!
dialogue_jp: 集中集中　がんばって！

dialogue_en: It's do-or-die now!
dialogue_jp: ここが正念場だぞ

dialogue_en: I just hope we get to see some real matches today.
dialogue_jp:
どんなバウトが見れるのかな
ワクワクする！

dialogue_en: Maybe I'll give Queen's Blood a try.
dialogue_jp: 次はクイーンズ・ブラッドやりたい！

dialogue_en: I can't say I've ever played this "Queen's Blood" thing...
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドって
やったことないんだけど

dialogue_en: Huh. Never seen anyone try that before.
dialogue_jp: むむ　オリジナリティあふれる一手

dialogue_en: Hey, it's okay! You haven't lost yet!
dialogue_jp: おお　そこから逆転狙うのね！

dialogue_en: That was transcendent.
dialogue_jp: ふう　最高だった……

dialogue_en: I've still got goose bumps all over.
dialogue_jp: 鳥肌が　まだおさまらん

dialogue_en: The leading lady was absolutely stunning.
dialogue_jp: 主演の女優がマジで圧巻だったな

dialogue_en: All those dancers in perfect sync? What a show!
dialogue_jp:
あの人数で踊ってピッタリ合うの
やばくないか？

dialogue_en: I'm still reeling from that performance.
dialogue_jp: 胸がいっぱいで動けないや

dialogue_en: Oh... It was just so beautiful!
dialogue_jp: うう……本当によかった～

dialogue_en: My heart's still racing! I can't make it stop!
dialogue_jp: どうしよう　まだドキドキしてる

dialogue_en: That set design was like nothing I've ever seen!
dialogue_jp: セットの作り込み　すごくなかった？

dialogue_en: I just start bawling the second the show starts!
dialogue_jp: 始まってすぐに泣いちゃうんだよね

dialogue_en: Their performance was just so enthralling!
dialogue_jp: 舞台に集中しすぎて疲れちゃった

dialogue_en: I wanna go to Wonderment Square!
dialogue_jp: はやくワンダースクエアに行きたい～

dialogue_en: Being an actor looks so fun! You get to sing and dance!
dialogue_jp:
役者って　歌っておどって
楽しそうだね

dialogue_en: I fell asleep.
dialogue_jp: ふわあ……寝ちゃった～

dialogue_en: I clapped so much my hands turned red!
dialogue_jp: 拍手しすぎて　手がまっかっか！

dialogue_en: I couldn't follow the story, but it was super pretty!
dialogue_jp:
おはなしは難しかったけど
キレイだったね

dialogue_en: How do they remember all their lines? There's so many!
dialogue_jp:
あんないっぱいのセリフ
どうやって覚えるんだろ？

dialogue_en: Oh, damn... They're all sold out!
dialogue_jp: 当日券は　もうないってよ！

dialogue_en: I scored us VIP seats, so we can sip some nice wine and enjoy the show!
dialogue_jp:
ＶＩＰ席を予約しておいたから
ワインを飲みながら　ゆっくり見ようよ

dialogue_en: Uh-oh, does this theater have a dress code?
dialogue_jp:
この劇場
ドレスコードってあったっけ？

dialogue_en: This place blows our town's piddly theater right outta the water!
dialogue_jp: 街の小さな劇場とは　なにもかも違うな

dialogue_en: I prefer the cheap seats. Actors play to the back row anyway!
dialogue_jp:
うしろの席から見ると
役者の実力がわかるぞ

dialogue_en: Loveless is such a classic. I can't wait to see this troupe's spin on it!
dialogue_jp:
不朽の名作をどうアレンジしてるか
見ものだな

dialogue_en: One day, I'm gonna be singing on that stage.
dialogue_jp: いつか俺も　ここの舞台に立つぞ！

dialogue_en: I managed to nab some tickets for the night show!
dialogue_jp: ギリギリでナイトショーが取れたよ

dialogue_en: This might be hard to follow, but try to stay awake.
dialogue_jp: かなり難解な話だけど　寝ないでね

dialogue_en: I can't believe I got the best seat in the house!
dialogue_jp: 神席すぎて　心臓が持つか心配

dialogue_en: Better fix my makeup before curtain-up.
dialogue_jp: 開演の前に　お化粧を直しとこっと

dialogue_en: This place is so nice! They gave us VIP tickets for our honeymoon!
dialogue_jp:
ホテルがサプライズでＶＩＰ席を
用意してくれたの　新婚祝いだって！

dialogue_en: The food in the VIP seats was to die for!
dialogue_jp:
ＶＩＰ席のお料理
どれも美味しかった～

dialogue_en: The lead was great, but it was the supporting cast that really stole the show.
dialogue_jp:
トップスターもいいけど
私は脇役のほうが味わい深くて好き

dialogue_en: From what I've heard, they're pulling out all the stops for tonight's production of Loveless!
dialogue_jp:
今夜の『LOVELESS』は　演出も音楽も
すべてが特別な豪華版らしいよ

dialogue_en: There's no way I didn't win the contest. Those are the absolute best lyrics I've ever written!
dialogue_jp:
歌詞コンテストは俺がもらったぜ
最高傑作を応募したからな！

dialogue_en: I'm so glad they put this show together. I've been waiting forever to see it in person!
dialogue_jp:
この公演をずっと楽しみにしてたんだよ
まさか　上演してくれるとは

dialogue_en: The G Edition of the show allows for audience participation. Isn't that exciting?
dialogue_jp:
『Gエディション』は
観客参加型の特別なプログラムらしいぜ

dialogue_en: I read all the entries for the songwriting contest, and I really liked the one by that Maycomb person.
dialogue_jp:
歌詞コンテストの作品を読んだけど
フラワーなんとかって人のが良かったな

dialogue_en: I can't wait to see who wins the contest!
dialogue_jp: 歌詞コンテストの結果　楽しみだよね

dialogue_en: Apparently, the reason Loveless got shelved for so long is 'cause the lead actress quit without warning.
dialogue_jp:
『LOVELESS・Gエディション』は
主演女優が降板して
ずっとお蔵入りしてたんだって

dialogue_en: I grew up in Sector 8, so trust me when I say I know everything about Loveless.
dialogue_jp:
わたし　八番街育ちだからね
『LOVELESS』にはうるさいわよ

dialogue_en: I've never seen Loveless like that before!
dialogue_jp: 新機軸の『LOVELESS』だったな！

dialogue_en: Who was that singer at the end of the show?
dialogue_jp: 最後に出てきた歌手って誰？

dialogue_en: Was the final number the one from the songwriting contest?
dialogue_jp:
エンディングの曲って
歌詞コンテストのやつだろ？

dialogue_en: That talent who played the Goddess was divine! I need to see what they're in next.
dialogue_jp:
女神役の役者が良かったな
次の作品も絶対に見るよ

dialogue_en: ...I don't know what to say... That was beautiful.
dialogue_jp:
うう……俺
感動でなにも言えねえ

dialogue_en: I've never seen a play like that before!
dialogue_jp: こんな舞台　はじめて！

dialogue_en: Maycomb Blume's lyrics hit me like an arrow straight to the heart.
dialogue_jp:
フラワー・キーパーさんの歌詞
胸に染みたわ

dialogue_en: I hope they release that song as a single. I need it!
dialogue_jp: 最後の曲　販売されたら絶対買う！

dialogue_en: I think I just became Alphreid's number one fan!
dialogue_jp: アルフリードのファンになっちゃった

dialogue_en: Wow... It felt like I was right there in the middle of the action.
dialogue_jp: 本当にお芝居の中にいるみたいだった

dialogue_en: I repeat─advance tickets for tonight's performance have sold out!
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ございません
本日の前売り券は完売となっております

dialogue_en: Same-day tickets will be available for purchase one hour before the show!
dialogue_jp:
当日券は　開演の１時間前より
先着順での販売となります

dialogue_en: Please line up here to wait!
dialogue_jp: ご希望のお客様は　お並びください

dialogue_en: I've seen this show I don't know how many times, but somehow it never hits me the same way.
dialogue_jp:
同じ演目を何度も見てるけど
毎回違うから　まったく飽きないよね

dialogue_en: It's great how a play can feel so different just by switching up the performers and adding new nuances.
dialogue_jp:
内容は同じでも　役者の体を通すことで
いい意味で揺らぎが生まれるんだよな

dialogue_en: I know, right? I've even come to appreciate those unexpected moments when an actor flubs their lines.
dialogue_jp:
そうそう　私ぐらいになると
役者がミスしてくれたほうが嬉しいよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, me too. I say bring on the ad-libs!
dialogue_jp: わかる　アドリブが増えて面白いよな

dialogue_en: I figured these actors could teach us a thing or two, but they're so good, they put our troupe to shame.
dialogue_jp:
勉強になるかと思ったけど
うちの劇団とはスケールが違いすぎたわ

dialogue_en: But hey, at least we know your scripts are good.
dialogue_jp: でも　脚本は負けてないと思いました

dialogue_en: Too bad our stage is too small for them.
dialogue_jp: 劇場の大きさはどうしようもないとして

dialogue_en: But the real problem is us. We can't do your characters justice. We just don't have the acting chops...
dialogue_jp:
問題は座長の脚本をうまく演じられない
僕たち役者陣の実力不足かと

dialogue_en: No, the fault lies with me. As the director, I'm the one who needs to bring it all together.
dialogue_jp:
劇団員を導けていない時点で
座長である私の力が足りてないのよ

dialogue_en: ...At least seeing the best of the best in action has helped us learn what we need to improve.
dialogue_jp:
ただ　最高峰を確認したことで
進むべき道が明確になったわね

dialogue_en: Right! So let's head back and work on our craft!
dialogue_jp:
ですね　さっそく帰って
稽古をしましょう！

dialogue_en: We're now accepting pre-orders for commemorative Alphreid photo books!
dialogue_jp:
ただいま　アルフリード様の
メモリアルブックの予約を受付中です！

dialogue_en: The limited first edition comes autographed!
dialogue_jp: 初回限定版は　なんとサイン付き！

dialogue_en: Buy now for a ticket to a meet and greet, and get your book from the hero himself!
dialogue_jp:
メモリアルブックをいま予約すると
お渡し会の参加券がついてきます

dialogue_en: Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity!
dialogue_jp: この機会にぜひ　お買い求めください！

dialogue_en: Not every family gets to see Loveless, or reads the epic upon which it's based.
dialogue_jp:
今日見る『LOVELESS』は
古来より伝わる叙事詩が原作の舞台だ

dialogue_en: A cultured young man will be expected to know it quite well.
dialogue_jp:
社交界では必須の教養だから
よく見ておくように

dialogue_en: But I already know it. I just didn't understand the ending.
dialogue_jp:
原作のほうなら読んだよ
最後がよくわからなかったな

dialogue_en: That's because it is not the ending. The final portion of the poem remains lost to time.
dialogue_jp:
その感想は正しい　原作の最終章は
いまだに発見されてないからな

dialogue_en: Many a passionate individual has found themselves enthralled by the mystery of it─myself included.
dialogue_jp:
その謎に多くの人間が魅了されてきた
かくいう私も　そのひとりだ

dialogue_en: So it's the mystery that makes it a timeless classic? I suppose...but I could do without the sappy romance.
dialogue_jp:
甘美な謎が不朽の名作にしたってワケか
僕にはすこしロマンチックすぎるな

dialogue_en: Attention all Event Square guests! Our Cactuar King show is about to begin!
dialogue_jp:
イベントスクエアにお越しの皆々さま
これより『サボテン大王』を始めます！

dialogue_en: Is everyone ready?
dialogue_jp: 準備は　よろしいですか？

dialogue_en: We're about to be whisked off to the desert, where cactuars reign supreme!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　灼熱の砂漠に
皆様をご案内しましょう！

dialogue_en: Once upon a time, a goblin named Kid G set out for the faraway kingdom of the cactuars.
dialogue_jp:
ある日　キッドＧという名前のゴブリンが
サボテン王国を目指して旅をしていました

dialogue_en: He walked for days and days across the hot sand, until finally he reached his destination.
dialogue_jp:
何日も何日も砂漠を歩き続け
ようやく　サボテン王国に辿り着きます

dialogue_en: All of a sudden, he was surrounded by colorful cactuars!
dialogue_jp:
しかし　そこに立ちふさがる
色とりどりのサボテンダーたち！

dialogue_en: Kid G grinned menacingly, clutching his glove.
dialogue_jp:
キッドＧは好戦的な笑みを浮かべ
グローブを握りしめます

dialogue_en: "Klang!" rang the gong!
dialogue_jp: カーンと鳴り響くゴング！

dialogue_en: The cactuars sprang into action, but Kid G was even faster!
dialogue_jp:
すばやく動きまわるサボテンダーたち
華麗なフットワークで応戦するキッドＧ

dialogue_en: Jab! Jab! Straight!
dialogue_jp: ジャブ　ジャブ　ストレート！

dialogue_en: With his every punch, he scored knockout after knockout! Ding ding ding!
dialogue_jp:
強烈なパンチが次々と決まり
見事ノックアウト　カンカンカン！

dialogue_en: Soon, only one cactuar remained: a big one, with a shiny crown on his head─the king!
dialogue_jp:
すると　激しい戦いを終えたキッドＧのまえに
王冠を被ったサボテン大王がやってきました

dialogue_en: Kid G told the king that he'd come to protect the treasure of the sands─to honor and fulfill an ancient pact.
dialogue_jp:
キッドＧは大王に　いにしえの盟約に従い
砂漠の秘宝を守りにきたのだと告げました

dialogue_en: The king welcomed Kid G.
dialogue_jp: 大王に認められたキッドＧは

dialogue_en: And from that day on, he took his place as guardian of the treasure of the sands.
dialogue_jp:
その日から　サボテンダーを従えて
砂漠の秘宝を守るようになりました

dialogue_en: Some believe that he's still out there, somewhere...
dialogue_jp: もしかしたら　いまでも砂漠のどこかでは

dialogue_en: doing battle with anyone who would try to steal the precious treasure of the sands.
dialogue_jp:
秘宝を狙う盗賊とゴブリンたちが
バトルを繰り広げているのかもしれませんね

dialogue_en: Thank you all for listening.
dialogue_jp: ご清聴　ありがとうございました

dialogue_en: After a short break, we'll return with the next show. Be sure to stick around for it!
dialogue_jp:
これより休憩タイムとなります
次の公演まで　しばらくお待ちください

dialogue_en: Good day and well met, most esteemed guest. Perchance you have points for me?
dialogue_jp:
ご機嫌うるわしゅう　我がお客様
ゴールドポイントはお持ちかな？

dialogue_en: May I say what a tremendous honor it is to exchange these points for you.
dialogue_jp:
お客様のゴールドポイントは
我が命を懸けて　交換いたしましょう

dialogue_en: I shall eagerly await our next interaction.
dialogue_jp: お客様と再会できる日を　心待ちにしています

dialogue_en: I pray you will entrust me with your points again. Till then, adieu.
dialogue_jp:
またいつか　この僕に
お客様のポイントを託してください

dialogue_en: Shit... Late again. I'm in for it now.
dialogue_jp:
減給かな
まさか　クビはないよな？

dialogue_en:
Wait, he wouldn't fire me, would he?
A pay cut, sure, but...
dialogue_jp: 終わった　またしても遅刻

dialogue_en: Man, everything about Battle Square was badass!
dialogue_jp: バトルスクエアの迫力　ヤバかったね！

dialogue_en: Son of a bitch! Shoulda just trusted my gut!
dialogue_jp:
くっそ～
クラウドに賭けときゃよかった

dialogue_en: I can't thank you enough for winning, Cloud! You're the best!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　勝ってくれて
本当にありがとう！

dialogue_en: What the hell was that?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　なんだ？

dialogue_en: World's gettin' kinda crazy, huh?
dialogue_jp: おいおい　どうなってんだよ

dialogue_en: Yo. Isn't that the Ultimate Party Animal?
dialogue_jp:
あそこにいるのって
究極の遊び人だろ？

dialogue_en: Oh snap, is the UPA gonna throw down?
dialogue_jp: おお　神羅課長が勝負するのか？

dialogue_en: Alright then, let's see what this challenger can do!
dialogue_jp: 挑戦者のお手並み拝見といこうか

dialogue_en: The Ultimate Party Animal's putting on his own event!
dialogue_jp: 究極の遊び人からの挑戦状だって！

dialogue_en: Like anybody'd have a chance against that dude!
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長に勝てるワケないのに

dialogue_en: I wonder who's gonna take on the champion.
dialogue_jp: だれが神羅課長に挑戦するの？

dialogue_en: Yep, nobody can touch the king.
dialogue_jp: やっぱ強えな　神羅課長

dialogue_en: That was a great match. Shame about the end.
dialogue_jp: いい勝負だったのに　残念だったな

dialogue_en: I'm looking forward to round two!
dialogue_jp: リベンジ　楽しみにしてるぞ

dialogue_en: The road to the top is rough and winding.
dialogue_jp: 究極への道は険しいわね

dialogue_en: You can do it─I believe in you!
dialogue_jp: 応援してるから　次も頑張って

dialogue_en: That guy's something else, huh?
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長が強すぎるのよ

dialogue_en: Dude, how crazy is it that you beat the party animal!
dialogue_jp:
すげえな！
究極の遊び人に勝っちまいやがった

dialogue_en: I can't believe the UPA actually lost.
dialogue_jp: まさか　神羅課長が負けるなんて

dialogue_en: Killer fight, dude! Great stuff!
dialogue_jp: ナイスファイト　面白かったぞ！

dialogue_en: The Ultimate Party Animal seriously lost?
dialogue_jp: 究極の遊び人が負けたってホント？

dialogue_en: The party animal lost!? No way!
dialogue_jp: うそ　挑戦者が勝っちゃったの？

dialogue_en: Didn't think anyone partied harder than him.
dialogue_jp: 神羅課長に遊びで勝つなんて……

dialogue_en: That was wild─like, clash-of-the-gods wild!
dialogue_jp:
最高峰の遊び人バトル
シビれたぜ！

dialogue_en: How's it feel to be crowned the new UPA?
dialogue_jp: 究極の遊び人になった気分はどうだ？

dialogue_en: I've never seen a match like that!
dialogue_jp: すげえ３Ｄバトルだったな！

dialogue_en: You two were amazing─inspirational!
dialogue_jp: ふたりの遊びっぷりに感動しちゃった

dialogue_en: Both of you guys belong in the party animal hall of fame!
dialogue_jp: クラウドと神羅課長　どっちも最高！

dialogue_en: I can't believe I got to witness the birth of a new legend!
dialogue_jp: 究極の遊び人・クラウドの誕生だね

dialogue_en: Space rangers! Your objective is to eliminate the enemy mother ship!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の諸君！
本作戦の目的は　敵母艦の破壊だ

dialogue_en: The fate of the universe is in your hands! Good hunting, cadets!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙の平和は君の手にかかっている
健闘を祈るぞ！

dialogue_en: Space rangers! Your objective is to breach enemy lines and eliminate their mother ship!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙騎士団の諸君！
これより　敵の防衛ラインを突破し母艦を叩く

dialogue_en: The fate of the universe is in your hands! Now make us proud!
dialogue_jp:
宇宙の平和は君の手にかかっている
では　行くぞ！

dialogue_en: Enemy sighted! Attack!
dialogue_jp: 敵機確認　撃ち落とせ！

dialogue_en: Engage! Now!
dialogue_jp: 敵におくれをとるなよ！

dialogue_en: Enemy incoming. Move to intercept!
dialogue_jp: 敵部隊接近中　迎撃するぞ！

dialogue_en: Enemy contact. We mustn't let them escape!
dialogue_jp: ターゲット発見　１機たりとも逃がすな！

dialogue_en: Nicely done!
dialogue_jp: 見事な回避だ！

dialogue_en: They can't get the drop on you!
dialogue_jp: 敵の動きが　よく見えているな

dialogue_en: Good! Show them what we're made of!
dialogue_jp: いいぞ　敵を翻弄してやれ！

dialogue_en: Great work! Keep it up, ranger!
dialogue_jp: よくやった　その調子で頼む！

dialogue_en: All enemies eliminated! Incredible!
dialogue_jp: 全機撃墜だ　すごいじゃないか！

dialogue_en: That was some fine shooting!
dialogue_jp: すばらしい命中率だ！

dialogue_en: No other enemy contacts detected. Prepare for the next wave!
dialogue_jp: 敵部隊の殲滅を確認　次の襲撃に備えろ！

dialogue_en: Very well done! I daresay you've earned yourself a medal!
dialogue_jp: 君の活躍には　目を見張るものがあるな

dialogue_en: Bravo! You've dealt a heavy blow to the enemy!
dialogue_jp: よーし　敵の戦力を大幅に削ったな！

dialogue_en: Victory is within reach! Now go and seize it!
dialogue_jp: 勝利は目前だ　必ず勝って帰るぞ！

dialogue_en: Behold the majesty of our galaxy! This is what we fight for!
dialogue_jp: 宇宙は広く美しい　我々の手で守らねばな

dialogue_en: Careful!
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫か！

dialogue_en: You gotta focus, ranger!
dialogue_jp: 相手の動きを　よく見ろ！

dialogue_en: Hang in there!
dialogue_jp: 持ち直せるか？

dialogue_en: You've sustained heavy damage. Heal up now!
dialogue_jp: 機体の損耗が激しい　回復を急げ！

dialogue_en: You're barely holding on, ranger! You won't last much longer!
dialogue_jp:
ダメージが蓄積している
このままだとやられるぞ！

dialogue_en: Energy reserves depleted. Hold tight until they've recharged!
dialogue_jp:
エネルギー切れだな
チャージ完了まで持ちこたえろ！

dialogue_en: You mustn't burn through your energy reserves unless absolutely necessary!
dialogue_jp:
エネルギー消費が激しい攻撃は
使いどころを見極めろ

dialogue_en: That's...an Enkidu-class warship!
dialogue_jp: あれは　敵のエンキドゥ級戦艦！

dialogue_en: Be advised─it's equipped with state-of-the-art mako weaponry.
dialogue_jp: 最新鋭の魔晄ビーム砲搭載機だ　ぬかるなよ

dialogue_en: Mother ship closing in!
dialogue_jp: 後方から　敵母艦接近！

dialogue_en: This is why we're here. Take it out at all costs!
dialogue_jp:
ギルガメッシュ軍の本隊だ
必ず仕留めるぞ！

dialogue_en: Space rangers! Follow my lead!
dialogue_jp: 勇気ある者は　私に続け！

dialogue_en: We must reduce their firepower! Disable the cannons!
dialogue_jp: まずは敵の戦力を削ぐ　砲台を狙え！

dialogue_en: Focus on taking out those cannons!
dialogue_jp: 砲台の各個撃破に集中しろ！

dialogue_en: With me, rangers! We can't allow them to make their escape!
dialogue_jp:
逃がすな
背後から狙うぞ　私に続け！

dialogue_en: Concentrate your fire on the engines to destroy the mother ship!
dialogue_jp:
動力部を叩く
誘爆させて　一気に沈めるぞ！

dialogue_en: The bigger they are, the harder they fall! Keep attacking those engines and we'll win!
dialogue_jp:
巨大な戦艦も　動力を失えば自滅する
攻撃の手を緩めるな！

dialogue_en: ...All ships, pull back! Get behind me!
dialogue_jp: 総員退避　私の背後につけ！

dialogue_en: I'll keep them busy! Retreat!
dialogue_jp: 私がしのぐ　うしろにまわれ！

dialogue_en: Hold the line!
dialogue_jp: やられはしない！

dialogue_en: Brace for impact!
dialogue_jp: 衝撃に備えろ！

dialogue_en: Well done, ranger! With your help, we have at long last restored peace to our galaxy!
dialogue_jp:
君のおかげで　宇宙の平和は守られた
宇宙騎士団に栄光あれ！

dialogue_en: The Gilgamesh Army will trouble us no more. Your deeds this day will go down in history!
dialogue_jp:
ギルガメッシュ軍の脅威は去った
君こそ　宇宙騎士団の英雄だ！

dialogue_en: No! How...can this be!? Curse you...Gilgamesh!
dialogue_jp:
おのれ　ギルガメッシュ軍め！
宇宙に平和のあらんことを……

dialogue_en: Come on out!
dialogue_jp: かくれんぼか　バレット？

dialogue_en: There he goes again, our fearless friend!
dialogue_jp: 相変わらず逃げてばっかだな　おまえは！

dialogue_en: I thought you were here to help me!
dialogue_jp: 俺を助けんじゃねえのかよ！

dialogue_en:
'Member when we had that rat problem?
You and me set traps, and you
got caught in one of 'em.
dialogue_jp:
昔よくネズミ捕りをしたっけな
おまえ　間違って罠にかかったろ

dialogue_en: I guess old habits die hard.
dialogue_jp: あの時は笑ったぜ　アハハハってなあ！

dialogue_en: Better watch where you're lookin'!
dialogue_jp: よそ見してんじゃねえぞ！

dialogue_en: Nowhere to run.
dialogue_jp: 遊びは終わりだ

dialogue_en: Bet you're shakin' in your boots.
dialogue_jp: せいぜい　怯えるんだな

dialogue_en: Look at me when I'm talkin'!
dialogue_jp: 俺を見ろ　バレット！

dialogue_en: I'm gonna kill you!
dialogue_jp: バレットオオオ！

dialogue_en: What've you done to yourself, man!?
dialogue_jp: どうしちまったんだよ　ダイン！

dialogue_en: It's okay, Dyne... You're gonna be okay!
dialogue_jp: ダイン　いま助けてやる

dialogue_en: Input error detected.
dialogue_jp: コックピットエラー発生

dialogue_en: Immediate correction strongly advised.
dialogue_jp: 搭乗者は　至急対処してください

dialogue_en: Oops! Uh, let's see now...
dialogue_jp: うひょ？　え～っとえっと……

dialogue_en: Was it this button, or...?
dialogue_jp: これかな　これかな？

dialogue_en: That's not good!
dialogue_jp: うひょ　わしピ～ンチ！

dialogue_en: Did I...step on something?
dialogue_jp: うひょ　なんか踏んだ？

dialogue_en: I'm on a roll!
dialogue_jp: うひょ～　結果オ～ライ！

dialogue_en: Well, look at that! I'm a natural!
dialogue_jp: もしかして　わし　うまい？

dialogue_en: I did that on purpose!
dialogue_jp: ワザとだもんね！

dialogue_en: That's what you get!
dialogue_jp: おほほほ　やったやった！

dialogue_en: You're gonna regret that.
dialogue_jp: 後悔させてやる

dialogue_en: Okay, I've had it up to here with you!
dialogue_jp: うわ～　腹立つ～！

dialogue_en: That does it!
dialogue_jp: イラっとしちゃった

dialogue_en: How dare you.
dialogue_jp: 舐められたものだ

dialogue_en: Oh, this guy is pissin' me off!
dialogue_jp: ム～カ～ツ～ク～！

dialogue_en:
Warning: exceeding maximum rated
output. Risk of limb failure high.
dialogue_jp:
ワーニング　出力１２０パーセント
脚部への負荷が増大中

dialogue_en:
Nothing to worry about
if I finish this quickly!
dialogue_jp: さっさと片付ければ　問題な～し！

dialogue_en:
Heavy damage sustained. Limbs
inoperable. Brace for potential rollover.
dialogue_jp:
両脚部の損傷を確認
コントロール不能　転倒に注意してください

dialogue_en: Oh dear, oh dear me...
dialogue_jp: ゲコゲコ～？

dialogue_en: You want something, you take it. That's just the way of the world.
dialogue_jp: 欲しいものは奪う　それがグリードよ

dialogue_en: What, what!? You got a problem, asshole?
dialogue_jp:
なんだコラ
見せモンじゃねえぞ

dialogue_en: Get a load of pretty boy here.
dialogue_jp: また　馬鹿がカモられにきやがった

dialogue_en: You look like you got gil to spare.
dialogue_jp: いいナリしてんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: I swear, all this sand up my ass...
dialogue_jp: くそ　ケツまでじゃりじゃりだぜ

dialogue_en: Hey, honey. You lost?
dialogue_jp: あら　迷子かしら？

dialogue_en: If you value your life, get out.
dialogue_jp:
痛い目にあわないうちに
出ていきな

dialogue_en: You're drawing a lot of attention.
dialogue_jp: あんた　目をつけられてるよ

dialogue_en: Not half bad for a prison, am I right?
dialogue_jp:
プリズンなんて言われてるけど
いいとこだろ？

dialogue_en: Hey! Lookin' for a way to kill time?
dialogue_jp: お兄さん　いまヒマ？

dialogue_en: Don't have a gil to your name, do you?
dialogue_jp: う～ん　お金は持ってなさそうだね

dialogue_en: Careful now. Handsome face like yours is bound to draw some attention.
dialogue_jp:
キレイな顔
ねえ　いっしょに働かない？

dialogue_en: So... You come here often?
dialogue_jp: うん　遊んでく？

dialogue_en: Screw the Saucer. Down here's where the real fun happens.
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサーでは味わえないこと
したくない？

dialogue_en: Take a picture, pal. It'll last longer.
dialogue_jp: なに見てんの　お金とるわよ

dialogue_en: Ahahaha!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッホー！

dialogue_en: So nice of you to drop in on us down here! Just so you get an idea of where you're at, hell's got nothing on this place.
dialogue_jp:
コレルプリズンによく来たな　ベイビー
ここは地獄よりもヘビーな楽園だぜ

dialogue_en: If you're lookin' for an easy time, best go crawlin' back to mommy.
dialogue_jp:
お遊びのつもりなら
ママのところに帰んな

dialogue_en: Ahahaha!
dialogue_jp: あは　あははは……

dialogue_en: Ooh, lookie here! New guy.
dialogue_jp: ほら見て　新しい人が来たよぉ

dialogue_en: Hehe... Wow! Never seen a chocobo-man before.
dialogue_jp:
あはははは　すご～い
チョコボ人間だぁ

dialogue_en: New world with new people and...new people things!
dialogue_jp:
新しい世界に新しい人
最高だわぁ

dialogue_en: Hey, it's the chocobo-man. Wassup?
dialogue_jp: こんにちはぁ　チョコボ人間さん

dialogue_en: Hey, choco-man! C'mere! I got some feed for you.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　チョコボ人間さんに
エサをあげなきゃ

dialogue_en: Hahaha!
dialogue_jp: あは　あはははは

dialogue_en: Hahaha! Dig in!
dialogue_jp:
うふ　うふふふふ
どうぞぉ？

dialogue_en: I dunno what's in it, but damn does it taste good.
dialogue_jp:
なにが入ってんのか
わかんねえのが　最高だよな

dialogue_en: Hehe! Yeah, it's good shit! Goes down smooth and warms ya up quick.
dialogue_jp:
へへへ　今日はアタリだぜ
頭がクラクラしやがる

dialogue_en: Yeah? Well, uh... I think I'm gonna call it.
dialogue_jp:
そうか？　オレは
なんか寒くなってきた

dialogue_en: Hrng... I ain't...feelin' so good.
dialogue_jp: オレは　気持ち悪くなってきた……

dialogue_en: Seriously, what the hell's in this?
dialogue_jp: この酒　なにが入ってんだ？

dialogue_en: Listen up, shithead. Round here, it's all about that gil.
dialogue_jp:
いいか新入り
金だ　なにごとも金

dialogue_en: If you can't pay your dues, then you're as good as dead. Got me?
dialogue_jp:
ここじゃ　お金がないと
安全も買えないの　わかった？

dialogue_en: I got it. Just don't hit me anymore!
dialogue_jp:
わっ　わかったから
もう殴らないでくれ！

dialogue_en: Pain makes the lesson stick. We're doing you a favor.
dialogue_jp:
うふふ　でも
痛い目をみないと覚えないでしょ？

dialogue_en: Bet you're glad we learned you real good. Ain'tcha, bitch?
dialogue_jp:
よかったじゃねえか
これでひとつ賢くなったろ

dialogue_en: This is the part where you pay me if you wanna stay my new best friend.
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ
安全を金で買ってもらおうか

dialogue_en: But...I don't got any gil!
dialogue_jp: かっ　金はないんだ

dialogue_en: Don't you worry your pretty little head about that. There are plenty of ways to earn your keep around here.
dialogue_jp:
大丈夫　心配しないで
お金を作る方法なら色々あるから

dialogue_en: So, Boss, about our next job...
dialogue_jp: 姐さん　次のヤマですが――

dialogue_en: Shh! Keep it down, idiot.
dialogue_jp: しっ　声を落としな

dialogue_en: Could hit a shipment of black market goods out of Midgar.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガルからの
横流し品を狙います

dialogue_en: Yeah, there's plenty to go around now that Corneo's in the wind.
dialogue_jp:
コルネオの野郎が消えて
ブツが　余ってるようです

dialogue_en: Sounds like easy pickin's.
dialogue_jp: へえ　面白いじゃないか

dialogue_en: I'll get into that golden paradise one of these days, I swear!
dialogue_jp:
ゴールドソーサー潜入チャレンジ
またも失敗……

dialogue_en: Oh! Maybe if I got my hands on a moogle costume...
dialogue_jp:
次は　キグルミを着て
忍びこんでみよっかな？

dialogue_en: Welcome one and all!
dialogue_jp: プリズンオークションへ　ようこそ

dialogue_en: We've got a fine selection for today's auction.
dialogue_jp:
本日も　選りすぐりの商品を
取りそろえております

dialogue_en: You're not gonna wanna miss out on these goods!
dialogue_jp: ぜひ　お買い逃がしのないように

dialogue_en: The bid for our first lot starts at a thousand gil!
dialogue_jp:
それでは　まずは
１０００ギルから始めましょう

dialogue_en: We thank you for joining us on this sweltering day.
dialogue_jp:
皆様　暑い中
よくいらっしゃいました

dialogue_en: As usual, everything here was kindly provided by the boss.
dialogue_jp:
本日の商品も
すべて　ゲス様からの贈り物です

dialogue_en: So let's show our gratitude with some sky high bids!
dialogue_jp:
ボスに感謝しつつ
競りを始めていきましょう

dialogue_en: This first lot'll be opening at one thousand gil!
dialogue_jp:
では　最初の商品は
１０００ギルからスタートです

dialogue_en: Fifteen hundred!
Two k!
Four k!
Eighteen hundred!
Three thousand!
dialogue_jp: 俺は３０００だ

dialogue_en: Thirteen hundred!
Three k here!
dialogue_jp: ３０００でどうだ

dialogue_en: Forty-five hundred!
I know that's not all you folks got!
dialogue_jp: さあ　ほかにいらっしゃいませんか？

dialogue_en: Better speak up fast or you're gonna miss your shot!
dialogue_jp:
早くしないと
落札してしまいますよ？

dialogue_en: Don't want anyone leavin' here with regrets, now do we?
dialogue_jp: いいですか皆様　後悔しませんか？

dialogue_en: I'll go fifty-three hundred!
Seven thousand!
dialogue_jp: こっちは７０００よ

dialogue_en: Nine thousand!
dialogue_jp: ９０００でどうだ

dialogue_en: Six thousand!
Seventy-five!
Dammit. Five and five!
Seventy-seven hundred!
dialogue_jp: 俺は７７００だ

dialogue_en: Eight thousand eight hundred!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　８８００よ

dialogue_en: Aw, dammit! Ten thousand!
dialogue_jp: ちくしょう　１００００だ！

dialogue_en: Twelve thousand! Ain't no one goin' higher!
dialogue_jp:
１２０００！
これ以上はねえだろ

dialogue_en: Twenty-five k! Try beating that, y'all!
dialogue_jp:
２５０００！
絶対　渡さねえぞ

dialogue_en: Ten thousand! You heard me!
Thirteen thousand! I know y'all ain't got more!
dialogue_jp: １３０００　これが限界よ！

dialogue_en: To hell with it! Twenty thousand!
dialogue_jp:
２００００
もう　どうにでもなれ！

dialogue_en: Any other bids?
dialogue_jp: ほかにいませんね

dialogue_en: Then it's sold!
dialogue_jp: では　落札です！

dialogue_en: Going once, going twice...and sold! Congratulations.
dialogue_jp:
これは　もういらっしゃらないでしょう
おめでとうございます　落札です！

dialogue_en: Sold! Better luck next time, folks.
dialogue_jp: すばらしい　見事落札です！

dialogue_en: Moving on to our next lot...
dialogue_jp: それでは　次へいきましょう

dialogue_en: We'll start the bidding at a thousand gil again.
dialogue_jp:
こちらの商品も
１０００ギルからスタートです

dialogue_en: And for the next lot, we have this lovely piece. I'm looking for a thousand gil.
dialogue_jp:
続きまして　新しい商品です
こちらも１０００ギルからいきましょう

dialogue_en: Are y'all ready for this next one? I hope so, 'cause it is one dazzlin' piece of work!
dialogue_jp:
では続いての商品です
皆様　準備はよろしいでしょうか

dialogue_en: Do I hear a thousand?
dialogue_jp: １０００ギルからスタートです

dialogue_en: Pay attention. Remember their faces.
dialogue_jp: 金持ち連中の顔を覚えとけよ

dialogue_en: "Private meetup"?
dialogue_jp: おっ　やんのか？

dialogue_en: Hey, if these folks wanna piss away all their gil, I say we help 'em.
dialogue_jp:
金が余ってるみたいだからな
いただいちまおうぜ

dialogue_en: Think we can help ourselves to the "goods" too?
dialogue_jp: 連中が競り勝ったブツを盗めねえかな

dialogue_en: That's a fine idea. Then we can take 'em right back here and...
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　そんでまた
その盗品を――

dialogue_en: Put 'em up for auction!
dialogue_jp: オークションに出すってワケだ

dialogue_en: Please, you gotta get me outta here!
dialogue_jp: 出せ　出してくれ！

dialogue_en: If it's gil you want, I know about a big score!
dialogue_jp: 金なら　盗んででも用意する！

dialogue_en: Is my wife alright? Is she? I need to know!
dialogue_jp: 妻は　妻は無事なんだろうな？

dialogue_en: I'm so hungry... I'll take anything...
dialogue_jp:
なんでもいい
食べ物をくれないか

dialogue_en: It ain't my fault! They made me do it!
dialogue_jp: 俺は　だまされただけなんだよ！

dialogue_en: Oh god, this is it. It's all over.
dialogue_jp: 終わりよ　なにもかも……

dialogue_en: You! You have to help me! Please!
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　あんた助けてよ！

dialogue_en: No, no, no... This can't be happening!
dialogue_jp: やだ……やだ……

dialogue_en: Get me outta here. I'm begging you!
dialogue_jp: 助けて　なんでもするから！

dialogue_en: Water... Just a few drops of water...
dialogue_jp: みず……水をちょうだい

dialogue_en: Put a sock in it! C'mon...
dialogue_jp:
静かにしろ！
ったく　うるさいヤツらだ

dialogue_en: Hehehe! Piss and moan some more, why don'tcha!
dialogue_jp:
ゲヘヘ　こいつらを見るのが
楽しくてさあ

dialogue_en: Don't you worry, we ain't gonna hurt ya. Promise. Though that's the least of your troubles.
dialogue_jp:
心配すんな　悪いようにはしねえからよ
まあ　イイようにもしねえがな

dialogue_en: All you gotta do is tough it out for three more days. Or was it four? Eh, it'll fly by.
dialogue_jp:
あと３日の我慢だ　いや４日だったか？
まあ　とにかく我慢だ

dialogue_en: Should take this time to think about the choices that brung you here. Not that it'll help you get out.
dialogue_jp:
しっかり反省するんだね
反省したところで　出られないけどね

dialogue_en: Knock it off with all that whining! No one's comin' for ya, so just shut the hell up!
dialogue_jp:
ピーチクパーチクうるさいよ
いくら叫んでも　助けは来ないよ

dialogue_en: Had to cut 'em all loose. Solemn Gus's orders.
dialogue_jp: ゲス様の命令で　みんな釈放したよ

dialogue_en: Shit. What am I s'posed to do now?
dialogue_jp: クソ　つまんねえな

dialogue_en: Thanks for puttin' me out of a job.
dialogue_jp: ああ～　ヒマだ

dialogue_en: Just between you and me, I'm one hundred percent behind letting everyone go.
dialogue_jp:
人を商品にするのはやめるってさ
俺は　賛成だよ

dialogue_en: What? You think I feel bad for makin' money?
dialogue_jp:
なんだい？
アタシらは反省なんてしないよ

dialogue_en: No room for argument when it's a direct order from the boss man himself.
dialogue_jp: 釈放はゲス様の命令だ　仕方ないね

dialogue_en: Keep a close watch on your wallet.
dialogue_jp: 金　落ちてねえか？

dialogue_en: They say you can sell sand with the right spin, but...
dialogue_jp:
オレ　砂漠の砂を
売ろうと思ってんだ

dialogue_en: Goddammit! Another price hike!?
dialogue_jp: クソ　また値上がりしてやがる

dialogue_en: There anything here that ain't shit?
dialogue_jp: ったく　ロクなもんがねえな

dialogue_en: Just water today. No alcohol. No sir.
dialogue_jp:
今日は水だけ
お酒は買わない　絶対

dialogue_en: Huh? Shit! My wallet's gone!
dialogue_jp:
あれ……？
あれ　財布がない！

dialogue_en: Eh. Not like it had anythin' in it anyway.
dialogue_jp:
まあ　いいか
どうせ１ギルも入ってなかったし

dialogue_en: That's what you get for spacin' out.
dialogue_jp:
うふふ
ボーッとしてるからすられるのさ

dialogue_en: Now, what'd I score today? Huh!? There isn't even a single gil in here!
dialogue_jp:
さて　本日の収穫は……って
１ギルも入ってないじゃないの！

dialogue_en: Keep your noses to the grindstone, people! You better pray you're able to make rent!
dialogue_jp:
しっかり働いて
ゲス様にショバ代を払えよ

dialogue_en: 'Cause you'll be eatin' more than just late fees!
dialogue_jp: 滞納は許されねえからな

dialogue_en: Remember: it's thanks to Gus that y'all get to do your business in peace.
dialogue_jp:
ゲス様のおかげで
安心して　店をやれてんだ

dialogue_en: So show him some gratitude!
dialogue_jp: ちゃんと感謝しねえとな

dialogue_en: Any y'all folks up to no good? 'Cause these fists of mine've been itchin' for a fight.
dialogue_jp:
悪さしてる奴はいねえか？
殴りたくて　ウズウズしてんだ

dialogue_en: Don't be shy now! I know some of y'all done some shit, so speak up! Don't make me start beatin' on people to get answers!
dialogue_jp:
ルールを破った奴は出てこい
気持ちよく殴らせてくれる奴でもいいぞ

dialogue_en: Here's this month's payment. And this is for last month.
dialogue_jp:
これが今月分
こっちは　先月分だ

dialogue_en: I seem to recall you still owe us for the month before that too.
dialogue_jp: 確かに　あとは先々月の分だね

dialogue_en: What? No, I'm sure I already paid that.
dialogue_jp:
えっ　いや
それは払ったはずだが

dialogue_en: Oh yeah? 'Cause I ain't got no memory of it.
dialogue_jp: いや　受け取った覚えはねえなあ

dialogue_en: Just check with Gus. I know he'll back me up.
dialogue_jp: ばかな　ゲス様に確認してくれ

dialogue_en: Now hold on. You callin' me a liar?
dialogue_jp:
なんだい
アタシたちを疑ってんのかい？

dialogue_en: Man with your kinda debt oughta be more careful with his words.
dialogue_jp: ったく滞納しといて　ひどい話だよ

dialogue_en: Keep talkin' like that and you might have to start payin' a premium.
dialogue_jp:
てめえ　こっちはいつでも
値上げできるんだぞ？

dialogue_en: Alright, alright. I'll pay.
dialogue_jp: わかった……払うよ

dialogue_en: Make a peep and you're gone. That's a promise.
dialogue_jp: 店で騒ぐヤツは　ぶっ飛ばす

dialogue_en: Shhh! Silence is sacrosanct.
dialogue_jp: シィー……　静寂がこの店のルールだ

dialogue_en: Take care of your weapons.
dialogue_jp: 武器は大切にな

dialogue_en: Don't skimp on gear.
dialogue_jp: 整備は欠かすなよ

dialogue_en: Shut up!
dialogue_jp: うるせえぞ！

dialogue_en: I don't sell to rulebreakers.
dialogue_jp: ルール違反者には売らねえよ

dialogue_en: Get your ass outta here!
dialogue_jp: とっとと　出てけ！

dialogue_en: I told you: be quiet or beat it!
dialogue_jp: はん　油断したな

dialogue_en: Word of warning: don't make a peep.
dialogue_jp: 絶対　音を立てんなよ

dialogue_en: Careful now... Silent as the grave...
dialogue_jp: そ～っと　そ～っと……

dialogue_en: Shh! Be quiet. Else you'll get it.
dialogue_jp:
しっ　静かに
ぶっ飛ばされっぞ

dialogue_en: This place and its rules, I swear...they terrify me!
dialogue_jp: この店……緊張する

dialogue_en: Whatever you do, do it quietly.
dialogue_jp: 足音に注意

dialogue_en: You'll get tossed out if you make any kinda noise.
dialogue_jp: 騒いだら　追い出されるわよ？

dialogue_en: Welcome to my humble establishment. Please─peruse the selection.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃいませ
ワタシの　ワタシの店へようこそ

dialogue_en: If you're looking to get stronger, my store has everything you'll need!
dialogue_jp:
強くなりたいなら
ワタシの店に　おまかせを

dialogue_en: My store will always be open to you!
dialogue_jp: また　ワタシの店に来てくださいね！

dialogue_en: What do you think of my store? Be honest─it's the best you've ever seen, right?
dialogue_jp: ワタシの店はどうでした　最高でしたよね？

dialogue_en: Now, where's the latest issue of Cactuar King?
dialogue_jp: サボテン大王の新刊はどこだ

dialogue_en: Gus's book should be around here somewhere...
dialogue_jp: ゲス様の自伝があるはずなんだが

dialogue_en: It's Gus's autobiography! Meditations on the Outlaw Life!
dialogue_jp:
これこれ！
ゲス様の『孤独のアウトロー』

dialogue_en: Only steal a book if you're lookin' to get caught.
dialogue_jp: 本を盗んでも　すぐバレんのよ

dialogue_en: Come on in!
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい！

dialogue_en: Meditations on the Outlaw Life─Gus's autobiography─now in stock!
dialogue_jp:
ゲス様の自伝
『孤独のアウトロー』が入荷したよ

dialogue_en: Read the only thing worth reading: your boss's book!
dialogue_jp: グリードのボス　ゲス様の自伝だよ

dialogue_en: The wisdom contained therein will give you the strength to take on the world!
dialogue_jp:
読んだだけで強くなれる
保証モンの名著だ

dialogue_en: Buy Gus's Meditations or I'll stab the shit outta you till you do!
dialogue_jp:
ゲス様の自伝『孤独のアウトロー』
買ってって！

dialogue_en: Don't read so good? Not a problem. Book's mostly pictures anyway.
dialogue_jp:
中身は単純明快！
文字はわずか　誰でも読める

dialogue_en: Take home Gus's Meditations on the Outlaw Life today!
dialogue_jp:
ゲス様の自伝『孤独のアウトロー』
よろしくね～！

dialogue_en: How the hell did I get roped into this bullshit?
dialogue_jp:
なんで　グリードのオレが
宣伝してんだ！

dialogue_en: I just came to collect Gus's dues, not stand around hawkin' his damn book.
dialogue_jp:
みかじめ料を取りにきたら
店主に押しつけられて　このザマよ

dialogue_en: This here shop's got Gus's seal of approval.
dialogue_jp: うちはゲス様御用達の　チョコボショップだよ

dialogue_en: No one wants a run-of-the-mill chocobo.
dialogue_jp: チョコボも　目立っていかないとね

dialogue_en: You have fun gussyin' up that bird of yours!
dialogue_jp: しっかりチョコボを　着飾ってやるんだね

dialogue_en: Go on and make 'em as flashy as Gus.
dialogue_jp: ゲス様みたいに　ド派手にしてやんな

dialogue_en: 'Sup.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい

dialogue_en: Need something?
dialogue_jp: なんか用か

dialogue_en: See ya.
dialogue_jp: じゃあな

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: まいどあり

dialogue_en: I don't know how you make such masterpieces.
dialogue_jp: 毎回思うが　見事なもんだな

dialogue_en: Thank you kindly.
dialogue_jp: そりゃどうも

dialogue_en: What's an artist like you doin' in a place like this, anyway?
dialogue_jp:
アンタほどの職人が
なんで　こんなとこにいるんだ

dialogue_en: Workin'. Free to live my life as I see fit here.
dialogue_jp:
べつに　ここだったら
自由に彫れるってだけさ

dialogue_en: Craziest tat you ever did?
dialogue_jp: なんか　やべえモンでも彫ったのか

dialogue_en: Oh, I don't know... Buck-naked President Shinra?
dialogue_jp:
まあ　いろいろと
素っ裸のプレジデントとかね

dialogue_en: I almost wanna meet that man!
dialogue_jp:
ハハハ　マジかよ
とんでもねえな！

dialogue_en: Don't laugh or it'll look like shit.
dialogue_jp: ほら　笑うとズレるよ

dialogue_en: Lookin' for a place to hole up? You found it.
dialogue_jp: 砂漠の巣穴へようこそ　兄弟

dialogue_en: Quiet as solitary─guaranteed.
dialogue_jp: 独房のように　ぐっすり眠れるぜ

dialogue_en: Feel free to drop by any time.
dialogue_jp: またいつでも来な　兄弟

dialogue_en: Enjoy your stay in hell, brother.
dialogue_jp: いい監獄ライフを　兄弟

dialogue_en: Hey, how 'bout that handsome fella over there?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　そこのお兄さんに
話しかけてみない？

dialogue_en: You know there's more to people than just looks.
dialogue_jp:
はあ　おまえってホント
面食いだな

dialogue_en: But appearance still counts for a lot.
dialogue_jp: 顔がイイに越したことないでしょ

dialogue_en: And this is why you never make your quota. You need to stop being so damn picky.
dialogue_jp:
あのね　そうやって選り好みするから
ノルマを達成できないのよ

dialogue_en: Hey! There's sand in my drink!
dialogue_jp: おい　砂が入ってんぞ？

dialogue_en: Dunno why I bother. This stuff's more water than booze.
dialogue_jp:
相変わらず　ウスいな！
ここの酒はよ

dialogue_en: What the hell's a guy gotta do to get shit-faced around here!?
dialogue_jp:
いくら飲んでも酔えねえ
どうなってんだ

dialogue_en: Son of a bitch... Musta been pickpocketed.
dialogue_jp: クソ　有り金ぜんぶスっちまった

dialogue_en: Shot of cactuar rum, and cut it with some sand!
dialogue_jp:
ひっく……
サボテン酒の砂割り持ってこい！

dialogue_en: Hahaha, I'm flying! I'm flying!
dialogue_jp:
フワフワするぅ
飛んでるみたぁ～い

dialogue_en: Ever wonder what mako tastes like? Take a swig of Shinra booze and you'll know.
dialogue_jp:
知ってる？　神羅の酒って
魔晄の味がすんの

dialogue_en: Gross! Was this cocktail cut with sewage!?
dialogue_jp:
おえ　このカクテル
下水でも入ってんの？

dialogue_en: Welcome to Bail Jumper, where all the good boys and girls go to drink 'emselves blind! Kick it!
dialogue_jp:
飲んだくれの酒場
ベイル・ジャンパーへようこそオマエら
行くぜ！

dialogue_en: Shinra and the Gold Saucer can eat our shit! This hellhole's ours─and so's the world!
dialogue_jp:
神羅もゴールドソーサーもクソくらえ
監獄から　世界を変えるぞ！

dialogue_en: We stole their guitars to bring the people our sweet music.
dialogue_jp:
今日も　盗んだギターを
かき鳴らしにきたぜ？

dialogue_en: Y'all ready to make some noise!?
dialogue_jp: 盛りあがっていけよ　オマエら！

dialogue_en: C'mon! We'll burn this mother down!
dialogue_jp:
クソみたいな世界を
いっしょにブッつぶそうぜ！

dialogue_en: Let's give 'em hell!
dialogue_jp: 行くぜ　オマエら！

dialogue_en: One! Two! One two three four!
dialogue_jp:
ワン　ツー
ワンツースリーフォー！

dialogue_en: Be careful not to lose it all. Like me.
dialogue_jp:
兄ちゃん
身ぐるみ剥がされんなよ

dialogue_en: Dammit! Anyone with eyes could see they were cheatin'!
dialogue_jp:
クソ　あんなの
イカサマに決まってる！

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh... I'm gonna be drinkin' good tonight!
dialogue_jp:
ひっひっひ
今夜はうまい酒が飲めそうだ

dialogue_en: That was everything I had to my name...
dialogue_jp: 俺の全財産が……

dialogue_en: Hey there, buddy. Got any gil to spare? I promise I'll pay you back.
dialogue_jp:
なあ　金を貸してくれ
ぜったい取り返すからよ

dialogue_en: Don't even think about snitchin'. 'Less you feel like diggin' your own grave.
dialogue_jp:
おい　上に密告すんじゃねぞ
捕まっちまうからな

dialogue_en: Now then... Which lucky idiot's gonna be my next mark?
dialogue_jp: さて　次は誰をカモろうかね

dialogue_en: Strapped for gil, honey? We've got the lowest interest rates around.
dialogue_jp:
お金に困ってない？
うちは利息も安いわよ

dialogue_en: Miss your chance to throw in your cards, and it's over.
dialogue_jp: 引き際を見失ったら終わりさ

dialogue_en: This place ain't for amateurs, so unless you wanna piss your money away─beat it.
dialogue_jp:
素人が手を出すんじゃないよ
捕まりたくないだろ？

dialogue_en: You fought in the Beast Battleground? You're crazy!
dialogue_jp:
おまえ　ビーストバトルグラウンドに
出たんだって？

dialogue_en: It was nothin'. May've busted a rib, but I made it back in one piece.
dialogue_jp:
まあな　あばらがイッちまったが
なんとか生きて帰ってきたよ

dialogue_en: That's still impressive, man. For real─respect.
dialogue_jp: 挑戦するだけでもすげえよ　尊敬する

dialogue_en: You seriously sign up for the boss's challenge?
dialogue_jp:
おまえ　ゲスパーティーに出るって
ホントか？

dialogue_en: Bet your ass I did. Always wanted to put my skills to the test.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　ずっと挑戦したいって
思ってたんだ

dialogue_en: Damn, man. You're somethin' else.
dialogue_jp: すっげえなあ

dialogue_en: Wait, but...don't you need a group of five people to compete? Who else you got?
dialogue_jp:
でもよ　ゲスパーティーって
５人組じゃないとダメだろ？

dialogue_en: Whoa...really?
dialogue_jp: そうなのか？

dialogue_en: Damn. I had no idea you couldn't fight solo. Was looking forward to showin' off, but rules are rules.
dialogue_jp:
クソ　せっかくジョーカーと戦えると
思ったけど　あきらめるしかないか

dialogue_en: Nah, s'all good! Don't wanna risk anyone else's lives, you know?
dialogue_jp:
大丈夫　大丈夫！
すご～く残念だけどあきらめるよ

dialogue_en: They're so far outta my league. Ain't no point in playing.
dialogue_jp: あいつら　強すぎてやる気しねえ

dialogue_en: Never heard of travelin' card sharks.
dialogue_jp: 流れ者のバウターらしいな

dialogue_en: Can't anyone beat these cheats for us?
dialogue_jp: 誰かヤツらを負かしてくれねえかな

dialogue_en: This ain't even a contest.
dialogue_jp: つまんないな～

dialogue_en: What's the point if you already know who's gonna win? This is bullshit.
dialogue_jp:
強すぎると
賭けが成立しないのよね

dialogue_en: I can't wait to see who gets ripped to shreds today!
dialogue_jp:
今日は　どんなヤツが
血祭りになるかな～！

dialogue_en: Nothing soothes the soul quite like howls of agony.
dialogue_jp:
悲鳴を聞いてると
心が安らぐんだよな

dialogue_en: Buyers from all over come here for our monsters. These murder babies are the best of the best.
dialogue_jp:
ここで育成されたモンスターを買いに
世界中から　バイヤーが集まるって話だ

dialogue_en: Hahaha! Get 'im! Tear his head off!
dialogue_jp:
ハハ　やっちまえ
やられちまえ！

dialogue_en: It's my dream to be a caretaker of monsters.
dialogue_jp:
アタシ　モンスターの飼育員を
目指してんの

dialogue_en: I can't wait to hear what you sound like when you scream.
dialogue_jp: さあ　アンタの悲鳴を聞かせてよ

dialogue_en: I'll take good care of your bones. If there's any left!
dialogue_jp: 骨は拾ってやるよ　残ってたらね

dialogue_en: Yeah, bring it! I wanna see some blood!
dialogue_jp: ゲスパーティー　イイぃ！

dialogue_en: Woo hoo!
dialogue_jp: フォウ！

dialogue_en: This asshole doesn't stand a chance!
dialogue_jp: ジョーカーを味わいな

dialogue_en: Oh, you're in for it now, shithead!
dialogue_jp: ゲスパーティーへ　ようこそ！

dialogue_en: Woo hoo!
dialogue_jp: フォウ！

dialogue_en: Ahahaha! Good luck!
dialogue_jp: アハハハ　がんばってね！

dialogue_en: You see that!? What a show, man!
dialogue_jp: 見たぞ　すげえパーティーだったな

dialogue_en: Where are the screams? The precious screams of pain!?
dialogue_jp:
まさか　ジョーカーを
倒しちまうなんて

dialogue_en: That was the shit! You're a stone-cold killer!
dialogue_jp: すげえ　やっちまったのかよ！

dialogue_en: How did you survive that? What are you?
dialogue_jp: マジかよ　生きて帰ったか

dialogue_en: How dare you, you...bully!
dialogue_jp: ジョーカーをいじめやがって

dialogue_en: Ain't never seen anything that intense!
dialogue_jp: ヒュ～　盛りあがったな！

dialogue_en: Now that was quality entertainment!
dialogue_jp: ゲスパーティー　最高！

dialogue_en: Oh, that was thrilling!
dialogue_jp: あ～ん　ゾクゾクしたわ

dialogue_en: How the hell did you do that!?
dialogue_jp: 最高のパーティー！

dialogue_en: Didja hear me cheerin' you on!? Didja!?
dialogue_jp:
キャーーー！
あたしの応援　聞こえた？

dialogue_en: You're not half bad. Wanna tussle with me next?
dialogue_jp:
あんた　やるわね
アタシとやらない？

dialogue_en:
Woo!
More! I wanna see more!
dialogue_jp:
フォーウ
ゲスパーティー最高！

dialogue_en: Woo-ha-hoo!
dialogue_jp: フォーフォーフォーウ！

dialogue_en: Yee-haw!
dialogue_jp: ヒャッハー！

dialogue_en: Outta the way!
dialogue_jp: どけどけ！

dialogue_en: Woohoo!
dialogue_jp: イヤッホー！

dialogue_en: Yeah! Be the wind!
dialogue_jp: 気持ちイイ～！

dialogue_en: Check it! I've spent three years working on this baby, and now she's complete! Sweet, huh?
dialogue_jp:
どうよ　このモンスターマシン
３年かけて改造した自慢の逸品よ

dialogue_en: Goddamn!
dialogue_jp: かっけ～！

dialogue_en: I can't believe you actually ride that thing in public.
dialogue_jp:
そんなのに乗ってる
アンタの気がしれないよ

dialogue_en: Sounds like someone's jealous.
dialogue_jp: なんだ　うらやましいのか？

dialogue_en: Doesn't matter how sweet it is if it doesn't get you paid, you know.
dialogue_jp:
大切なのは見た目じゃなくて
稼げるかどうかだよ

dialogue_en: Like a looker who can't hold down a job.
dialogue_jp: それは　男もバイクもいっしょ

dialogue_en: Take a look at this! It's got that official Shinra logo and everything.
dialogue_jp:
見てくれよ
神羅の純正パーツを手に入れてよ！

dialogue_en: Gah! Put that shit away! You wanna get rolled?
dialogue_jp:
おいバカ　隠せ！
盗まれちまうぞ

dialogue_en: Man, you worry too much.
dialogue_jp: そうビビんなって

dialogue_en: I paid Gus a fortune for this. You know I gotta flaunt it!
dialogue_jp:
いや～　ゲス様に
高い金払った甲斐があったぜ！

dialogue_en: So...you gonna put it on your bike or what?
dialogue_jp:
んで　そのパーツを使うバイクは
どこだよ？

dialogue_en: My...my pride and joy...someone took her!
dialogue_jp:
バイクは盗まれちまった
ううう……

dialogue_en: You wanna go!?
dialogue_jp: やんのか！

dialogue_en: Just try it!
dialogue_jp: やんのか？

dialogue_en: You...you wanna go...?
dialogue_jp: やん……のか……

dialogue_en: Just...just try it...
dialogue_jp: やん……のか……？

dialogue_en: All hail Solemn Gus─king of Corel Prison! Show respect─or get wrecked!
dialogue_jp:
ゲス様バンザーイ！
ここは　プリズンの王
ゲス様の屋敷よ

dialogue_en: Listen up, assholes. Watch your manners inside the mansion─or else it's a rusty nail bat to the head for you!
dialogue_jp:
屋敷の中では　礼儀正しくな
釘バットのサビになりたかねえだろ

dialogue_en: Whatchu doin'? Sneakin' around and shit?
dialogue_jp: なにコソコソしてんだ　コラ？

dialogue_en: Don't let me catch you wanderin'.
dialogue_jp: 勝手に歩きまわんなよ

dialogue_en: One false move and we'll be all over you like that!
dialogue_jp:
あやしいマネしやがったら
わかってんだろうな？

dialogue_en: Get outta my sight, shithead!
dialogue_jp: 目ざわりだよ　消えな

dialogue_en: Either you leave on your own or we drag your ass outside.
dialogue_jp:
ぶっ飛ばされるまえに
出ていくんだね

dialogue_en: Hey! No loiterin'.
dialogue_jp: ウロチョロすんじゃないよ

dialogue_en: Maybe a chocobo? Or a moogle? Though I could go for a cactuar...
dialogue_jp:
チョコボか　モーグリか
サボテンダーか……

dialogue_en: There's always the tonberry... Or a malboro for shock value.
dialogue_jp:
いっそ　トンベリ？
どっきりでモルボル？

dialogue_en: "Make art, not war!" "Do your worst, Wutai!" "Corel belongs to the people!"
dialogue_jp:
『戦争上等』
『来やがれウータイ！』
『砂漠でピース』……

dialogue_en: Nah, not feelin' it.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　なんて描こうかな

dialogue_en: Oh, I've got it! How about "Saluting the SRC"?
dialogue_jp:
『ようこそ　反神羅連絡会』
とかでもいいかも！

dialogue_en: How come y'all get to eat veggies? It ain't fair. No one'll notice if I sneak a few, right?
dialogue_jp:
いいよな　おまえらは野菜が食えて
ちょっとぐらい俺が食っても
バレねえよな？
